original: vāhlīkasya tu dāyādāḥ sapta vāhlīśvarā nṛpāḥ /

original: alpena tapasā yatra siddhiṃ prāpsyanti tāpasāḥ /
analyzed: alpena tapasā yatra siddhim prāpsyanti tāpasāḥ
yasya darśana mātreṇa sarva kalmaṣa nāśanam
mahā prapāta sampāta prapāta ādi gata ambubhiḥ
vāyu nītaiḥ sadā tṛpti kṛta deśam kvacid kvacid
samālabdha jalaiḥ śṛṅgaiḥ kvacid ca api samucchritaiḥ
nitya arka tāpa viṣamaiḥ agamyaiḥ manasā yutam
devadāru mahāvṛkṣa vraja śākhā nirantaraiḥ
vaṃśa stamba vana ākāraiḥ pradeśaiḥ upaśobhitam
hima chattra mahā śṛṅgam prapāta śata nirjharam
śabda labhya ambu viṣamam hima saṃruddha kandaram

original: dṛṣṭvaiva taṃ cārunitambabhūmiṃ mahānubhāvaḥ sa tu madranāthaḥ /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā eva tam cāru nitamba bhūmim mahā anubhāvaḥ sa tu madra nāthaḥ

original: babhrāma tatraiva mudā sametaḥ sthānaṃ tadā kiṃcidathāsasāda // MatsP_117.21 //
analyzed: babhrāma tatra eva mudā sametaḥ sthānam tadā kiṃcid atha āsasāda
matsyapurāṇa
sūtaḥ uvāca

original: agamyaṃ mānuṣair anyair daivayogād upāgataḥ // MatsP_118.1 //
analyzed: agamyam mānuṣaiḥ anyaiḥ daiva yogāt upāgataḥ
airāvatī sarit śreṣṭhā yasmāt deśāt vinirgatā

original: meghaśyāmaṃ ca taṃ deśaṃ drumakhaṇḍairanekaśaḥ // MatsP_118.2 //
analyzed: megha śyāmam ca tam deśam druma khaṇḍaiḥ anekaśas
śālaiḥ tālaiḥ tamālaiḥ ca karṇikāraiḥ sa śāmalaiḥ
nyagrodhaiḥ ca tathā aśvatthaiḥ śirīṣaiḥ śiṃśapa drumaiḥ
śleṣmātakaiḥ āmalakaiḥ harītaka vibhītakaiḥ

original: bhūrjaiḥ samuñjakair bāṇair vṛkṣaiḥ saptacchadadrumaiḥ // MatsP_118.4 //
analyzed: bhūrjaiḥ samuñjakaiḥ bāṇaiḥ vṛkṣaiḥ saptacchada drumaiḥ
mahānimbaiḥ tathā nimbaiḥ nirguṇḍībhiḥ haridrumaiḥ
devadāru mahāvṛkṣaiḥ tathā kāleyaka drumaiḥ
padmakaiḥ candanaiḥ bilvaiḥ kapitthaiḥ raktacandanaiḥ
mātāmra riṣṭaka akṣoṭaiḥ abdakaiḥ ca tathā arjunaiḥ
hastikarṇaiḥ sumanasaiḥ kovidāraiḥ su puṣpitaiḥ
prācīnāmalakaiḥ ca api dhanakaiḥ samarāṭakaiḥ
kharjūraiḥ nārikelaiḥ ca priyāla āmrātaka iṅgudaiḥ
tantumālaiḥ dhavaiḥ bhavyaiḥ kāśmīrī parṇibhiḥ tathā
jātīphalaiḥ pūgaphalaiḥ kaṭphala elā āvalī phalaiḥ
mandāraiḥ kovidāraiḥ ca kiṃśukaiḥ kusuma aṃśukaiḥ
yavāsaiḥ śami parṇāsaiḥ vetasaiḥ ambuvetasaiḥ
rakta atiraṅga nāraṅgaiḥ hiṅgubhiḥ sa priyaṅgubhiḥ
raktāśokaiḥ tathā aśokaiḥ ākallaiḥ avicārakaiḥ
mucukundaiḥ tathā kundaiḥ āṭarūṣa parūṣakaiḥ
kirātaiḥ kiṅkirātaiḥ ca ketakaiḥ śveta ketakaiḥ
śobhāñjanaiḥ añjanaiḥ ca
drumaśreṣṭhaiḥ tathā asanaiḥ
manmathasya śara ākāraiḥ sahakāraiḥ manoramaiḥ
pīta yūthikayā ca eva śveta yūthikayā tathā
jātyā campaka jātyā ca tumbaraiḥ ca api atumbaraiḥ
mocaiḥ locaiḥ tu lakucaiḥ tilapuṣpa kuśeśayaiḥ
tathā supuṣpa āvaraṇaiḥ cavyakaiḥ kāmivallabhaiḥ
puṣpa aṅkuraiḥ ca bakulaiḥ pāribhadra haridrakaiḥ
dhārākadambaiḥ kuṭajaiḥ kadambaiḥ girikuṭajaiḥ
kaṭphalaiḥ badaraiḥ nīpaiḥ dīpaiḥ iva mahā ujjvalaiḥ
raktaiḥ pālī vanaiḥ śvetaiḥ dāḍimaiḥ campaka drumaiḥ

original: bandhūkaiśca subandhūkaiḥ kuñjakānāṃ tu jātibhiḥ // MatsP_118.18 //
analyzed: bandhūkaiḥ ca subandhūkaiḥ kuñjakānām tu jātibhiḥ
kusumaiḥ pāṭalābhiḥ ca mallikā karavīrakaiḥ
kurabakaiḥ himavaraiḥ jambūbhiḥ nṛpajambubhiḥ
bījapūraiḥ sa karpūraiḥ gurubhiḥ ca aguru drumaiḥ
bimbaiḥ ca pratibimbaiḥ ca saṃtānaka vitānakaiḥ
tathā guggula vṛkṣaiḥ ca hintāla dhavala ikṣubhiḥ
tṛṇaśūnyaiḥ karavīraiḥ aśokaiḥ cakramardanaiḥ
pīlubhiḥ dhātakībhiḥ ca ciribilvaiḥ samākulaiḥ
tintiḍīkaiḥ tathā lodhraiḥ viḍaṅgaiḥ kṣīrikā drumaiḥ
aśmantakaiḥ tathā kālaiḥ jambīraiḥ śvaitaka drumaiḥ
bhallātakaiḥ indrayavaiḥ valgujaiḥ siddhisādhakaiḥ
nāgakesara vṛkṣaiḥ ca su kesara manoharaiḥ
karamardaiḥ kāsamardaiḥ ariṣṭaka variṣṭakaiḥ
rudrākṣaiḥ drākṣa sambhūtaiḥ sapta āhvaiḥ putrajīvakaiḥ
kaṅkolakaiḥ lavaṅgaiḥ ca tvagdrumaiḥ pārijātakaiḥ

original: pratānaiḥ pippalīnāṃ ca nāgavalyaśca bhāgaśaḥ // MatsP_118.25 //
analyzed: pratānaiḥ pippalīnām ca nāgavalyaḥ ca bhāgaśas
marīcasya tathā gulmaiḥ navamallikayā tathā
mṛdvīkā maṇḍapaiḥ mukhyaiḥ atimuktaka maṇḍapaiḥ

original: kūṣmāṇḍānāṃ pratānaiśca alābūnāṃ tathā kvacit // MatsP_118.27 //
analyzed: kūṣmāṇḍānām pratānaiḥ ca alābūnām tathā kvacid
cirbhiṭasya pratānaiḥ ca paṭolī kāravellakaiḥ
karkoṭakī vitānaiḥ ca vārtākaiḥ bṛhatī phalaiḥ
kaṇṭakaiḥ mūlakaiḥ mūlaśākaiḥ tu vividhaiḥ tathā

original: kahlāraiśca vidāryā ca rurūṭaiḥ svādukaṇṭakaiḥ // MatsP_118.29 //
analyzed: kahlāraiḥ ca vidāryā ca rurūṭaiḥ svādukaṇṭakaiḥ
sa bhāṇḍīra vidūsāra rājajambūka vālukaiḥ
suvarcalābhiḥ sarvābhiḥ sarṣapābhiḥ tathā eva ca
kākolī kṣīrakākolī chattrayā ca ati chatrayā
tathā kṣīraka śākena kālaśākena ca api atha
śimbī dhānyaiḥ tathā dhānyaiḥ sarvaiḥ niravaśeṣataḥ
auṣadhībhiḥ vicitrābhiḥ dīpyamānābhiḥ eva ca
āyuṣyābhiḥ yaśasyābhiḥ balyābhiḥ ca narādhipa
jarā mṛtyu bhaya ghībhiḥ kṣudh bhaya ghnībhiḥ eva ca
saubhāgya jananībhiḥ ca kutsnābhiḥ ca api anekaśas
tatra veṇu latābhiḥ ca tathā kīcaka veṇubhiḥ
kāśaiḥ śaśāṅka kāśaiḥ ca śara gulmaiḥ tathā eva ca
kuśa gulmaiḥ tathā ramyaiḥ gulmaiḥ ca ikṣoḥ manoramaiḥ
kārpāsa jāti vargeṇa durlabhena śubhena ca
tathā ca kadalī khaṇḍaiḥ manohāribhiḥ uttamaiḥ
tathā marakata prakhyaiḥ pradeśaiḥ śādvala anvitaiḥ
irā puṃṣpa samāyuktaiḥ kuṅkamasya ca bhāgaśas
tagara ativiṣā māṃsī granthikaiḥ tu surā gadaiḥ
suvarṇa puṣpaiḥ ca tathā bhūmi puṣpaiḥ tathā aparaiḥ
jambīrakaiḥ bhūstṛṇakaiḥ sa rasaiḥ sa śukaiḥ tathā
śaṅgavera ajamodābhiḥ kuberaka priyālakaiḥ

original: jalajaiśca tathā vaṇair nānāvarṇaiḥ sugandhibhiḥ // MatsP_118.37 //
analyzed: jala jaiḥ ca tathā vaṇaiḥ nānā varṇaiḥ sugandhibhiḥ
udaya āditya saṃkāśaiḥ sūrya candra nibhaiḥ tathā
tapanīya savarṇaiḥ ca atasī puṣpa saṃnibhaiḥ
śūkapattra nibhaiḥ ca anyaiḥ sthala pattraiḥ ca bhāgaśas
pañca varṇaiḥ samākīrṇaiḥ bahu varṇaiḥ tathā eva ca
draṣṭuḥ dṛṣṭyā hita mudaiḥ kumudaiḥ candra saṃnibhaiḥ
tathā vahniśikhā ākāraiḥ gaja vaktra utpalaiḥ śubhaiḥ
śṛṅgāṭaka mṛṇālaiḥ ca rājata utpalaiḥ
jala jaiḥ sthala jaiḥ mūlaiḥ phalaiḥ puṣpaiḥ viśeṣataḥ
vividhaiḥ ca eva nīvāraiḥ muni bhojyaiḥ narādhipa

original: na taddhānyaṃ na tatsasyaṃ na tacchākaṃ na tatphalam /

original: na tanmūlaṃ na tatkandaṃ na tatpuṣpaṃ narādhipa // MatsP_118.43 //

original: anūpotthaṃ vanotthaṃ ca tatra yannāsti pārthivaḥ // MatsP_118.44 //

kurarān kālakūṭān ca khaṭvāṅgān lubdhakān tathā

original: bhṛṅgarājān sīrapādān bhūliṅgān ḍiṇḍimān navān // MatsP_118.51 //
analyzed: bhṛṅgarājān sīrapādān bhūliṅgān ḍiṇḍimān navān
mañjulītaka dātyūhān bhāradvājān tathā
etān ca anyān ca su bahūn pakṣi saṃghān manoharān

original: taccāśramapadaṃ puṇyaṃ babhūvātreḥ purā nṛpam // MatsP_118.59 //

original: himapātaṃ ghanā yatra kurvanti sahitāḥ sadā // MatsP_118.67 //

original: tatrāsti cāparaṃ śṛṅgaṃ yatra toyaghanā ghanāḥ /
analyzed: tatra asti ca aparam śṛṅgam yatra toya ghanāḥ ghanāḥ
nityam evā abhivarṣanti śilābhiḥ śikharam varam
tat āśramam manohāri yatra kāma dharā dharā
sura mukhya upayogi tvāt śākhinām saphalāḥ phalāḥ

sarva pāpa kṣaya karam śailasya iva prahārakam
vānaraiḥ krīḍamānaiḥ ca deśāt deśāt narādhipa
hima puñjāḥ kṛtāḥ tatra candra bimba sama prabhāḥ

original: śailavāṭaiḥ parivṛtam agamyaṃ manujaiḥ sadā // MatsP_118.72 //

original: kṛtaṃ svayaṃ ruciramathātriṇā śubhaṃ śubhāvahaṃ ca hi dadṛśe sa madrarāṭ // MatsP_118.74 //
analyzed: kṛtam svayam ruciram atha atriṇā śubham śubha āvaham ca hi dadṛśe sa madra rāj

original: tatra yau tau mahāśṛṅgau mahāvarṇau mahāhimau /

original: tasyādhastādvṛkṣagaṇe diśāṃ bhāge ca paścime // MatsP_119.2 //

original: dṛṣṭvaiva kautukāviṣṭas taṃ viveśa mahīpatiḥ // MatsP_119.3 //

original: na tatra sūryastapati na virājati candramāḥ // MatsP_119.5 //
analyzed: na tatra sūryaḥ tapati na virājati candramāḥ

sauvarṇaiḥ rājataiḥ vṛkṣaiḥ vidrumaiḥ upaśobhitam

original: makarāṇāṃ ca matsyānāṃ caṇḍānāṃ kacchapaiḥ saha /

original: tatra marakatakhaṇḍāni vajrāṇāṃ ca sahasraśaḥ // MatsP_119.12 //
analyzed: tatra marakata khaṇḍāni vajrāṇām ca sahasraśas

original: puṣparāgāṇi sarvāṇi tathā karkoṭakāni ca // MatsP_119.13 //
analyzed: puṣparāgāṇi sarvāṇi tathā karkoṭakāni ca

original: tutthakasya tu khaṇḍāni tathā śeṣasya bhāgaśaḥ /
analyzed: tutthakasya tu khaṇḍāni tathā śeṣasya bhāgaśas
rājāvartasya mukhyasya rucira akṣasya ca api atha

original: jyotīrasasya ramyasya syamantasya ca bhāgaśaḥ // MatsP_119.15 //
analyzed: jyotīrasasya ramyasya syamantasya ca bhāgaśas

original: vajrasyaiva ca mukhyasya tathā brahmamaṇerapi // MatsP_119.17 //
analyzed: vajrasya eva ca mukhyasya tathā brahma maṇeḥ api
muktāphalāni muktānām tārā vigraha dhāriṇām
sukha uṣṇam ca eva tat toyam snānāt śīta vināśanam

original: vaiḍūryasya śilā madhye sarasastasya śobhanā // MatsP_119.19 //
analyzed: vaiḍūryasya śilā madhye sarasaḥ tasya śobhanā

original: pramāṇena tathā sā ca dve ca rājandhanuḥśate /
analyzed: pramāṇena tathā sā ca dve ca rājan dhanuḥ śate

original: caturasrā tathā ramyā tapasā nirmitātriṇā // MatsP_119.20 //
analyzed: caturasrā tathā ramyā tapasā nirmitā atriṇā

original: pradeśaḥ sa tu rājendra dvīpe tasminmanohare // MatsP_119.21 //
analyzed: pradeśaḥ sa tu rāja indra dvīpe tasmin manohare

analyzed: trayī vidyā daṇḍanītiḥ śuśrūṣā daṇḍaḥ eva ca

original: na tatra varṣaṃ nadyo vā śītoṣṇaṃ ca na vidyate // MatsP_123.24 //
analyzed: na tatra varṣam nadyaḥ vā śīta uṣṇam ca na vidyate
udbhidāni udakāni syuḥ giri prasravaṇāni ca

original: tulyottarakurūṇāṃ tu kālastatra tu sarvadā // MatsP_123.25 //
analyzed: tulya uttarakurūṇām tu kālaḥ tatra tu sarvadā
sarvatas sukha kālaḥ sau jarā kleśa vivarjitaḥ

original: sargastu dhātakīkhaṇḍe mahāvīte tathaiva ca // MatsP_123.26 //
analyzed: sargaḥ tu dhātakīkhaṇḍe mahāvīte tathā eva ca
evam dvīpāḥ samudraiḥ tu sapta saptabhiḥ āvṛtāḥ
dvīpasya anantaraḥ yaḥ tu samudraḥ tad samaḥ tu vai
evam dvīpa samudrāṇām vṛddhiḥ jñeyā parasparam

original: apāṃ caiva samudrekāt samudra iti saṃjñitaḥ // MatsP_123.28 //
analyzed: apām ca eva samudrekāt samudraḥ iti saṃjñitaḥ
ṛṣat vasantyaḥ varṣeṣu prajāḥ yatra caturvidhāḥ

original: ṛṣiratyeva ramaṇe varṣantvetena teṣu vai // MatsP_123.29 //
analyzed: ramaṇe varṣantu etena teṣu vai

original: udayatīndau pūrve tu samudraḥ pūryate sadā /
analyzed: pūrve tu samudraḥ pūryate sadā

original: prakṣīyamāne bahule kṣīyate 'stamite ca vai // MatsP_123.30 //
analyzed: prakṣīyamāne bahule kṣīyate stamite ca vai
āpūryamāṇaḥ hi udadhiḥ ātmanā eva abhipūryate

original: tato vai kṣīyamāṇe tu svātmanyeva hy apāṃ kṣayaḥ // MatsP_123.31 //
analyzed: tatas vai kṣīyamāṇe tu svātmani eva hi apām kṣayaḥ

original: udayātpayasāṃ yogāt puṣpanty āpo yathā svayam /
analyzed: udayāt payasām yogāt āpaḥ yathā svayam

original: tathā sa tu samudro 'pi vardhate śaśinodaye // MatsP_123.32 //
analyzed: tathā sa tu samudraḥ vardhate śaśinā udaye
anyūna anatirikta ātmā vardhanti āpaḥ hrasanti ca
udaye stamaye ca indoḥ pakṣayoḥ śukla kṛṣṇayoḥ
kṣaya vṛddhī samudrasya śaśi vṛddhi kṣaye tathā

original: daśottarāṇi pañcāhur aṅgulānāṃ śatāni ca // MatsP_123.34 //
analyzed: daśa uttarāṇi pañca āhuḥ aṅgulānām śatāni ca

original: apāṃ vṛddhiḥ kṣayo dṛṣṭaḥ samudrāṇāṃ tu parvasu /
analyzed: apām vṛddhiḥ kṣayaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ samudrāṇām tu parvasu

original: dvirāpatvāt smṛto dvīpo dadhanāccodadhiḥ smṛtaḥ // MatsP_123.35 //
analyzed: dvis āpa tvāt smṛtaḥ dvīpaḥ dadhanāt ca udadhiḥ smṛtaḥ
nigīrṇa tvāt ca girayaḥ parva bandhāt ca parvatāḥ

original: śākadvīpe tu vai śākaḥ parvatastena cocyate // MatsP_123.36 //
analyzed: śākadvīpe tu vai śākaḥ parvataḥ tena ca ucyate
kuśadvīpe kuśa stambaḥ madhye janapadasya tu

original: krauñcadvīpe giriḥ krauñcas tasya nāmnā nigadyate // MatsP_123.37 //
analyzed: krauñcadvīpe giriḥ krauñcaḥ tasya nāmnā nigadyate
śālmaliḥ śālmala dvīpe pūjyate sa mahā drumaḥ

original: gomedake tu gomedaḥ parvatastena cocyate // MatsP_123.38 //
analyzed: gomedake tu gomedaḥ parvataḥ tena ca ucyate
nyagrodhaḥ puṣkara dvīpe padmavat tena sa smṛtaḥ
pūjyate sa mahā devaiḥ brahmā aṃśaḥ vyakta sambhavaḥ

original: tasminsa vasati brahmā sādhyaiḥ sārdhaṃ prajāpatiḥ /
analyzed: tasmin sa vasati brahmā sādhyaiḥ sārdham prajāpatiḥ
tatra devāḥ upāsante trayastriṃśat mahā ṛṣibhiḥ
sa tatra pūjyate devaḥ devaiḥ mahā ṛṣi sattamaiḥ
jambūdvīpāt pravartante ratnāni vividhāni ca

original: dvīpeṣu teṣu sarveṣu prajānāṃ kramaśastu vai /
analyzed: dvīpeṣu teṣu sarveṣu prajānām kramaśas tu vai

original: ārjavādbrahmacaryeṇa satyena ca damena ca // MatsP_123.42 //
analyzed: ārjavāt brahmacaryeṇa satyena ca damena ca
ārogya āyuḥ pramāṇābhyām dviguṇam dviguṇam tatas

original: dvīpeṣu teṣu sarveṣu yathoktaṃ varṣakeṣu ca // MatsP_123.43 //
analyzed: dvīpeṣu teṣu sarveṣu yathoktam varṣakeṣu ca
gopāyante prajāḥ tatra sarvaiḥ sahaja paṇḍitaiḥ
bhojanam ca aprayatnena sadā svayam upasthitam

original: ṣaḍrasaṃ tanmahāvīryaṃ tatra te bhuñjate janāḥ /
analyzed: ṣaṣ rasam tat mahā vīryam tatra te bhuñjate janāḥ
pareṇa puṣkarasya atha āvṛtya avasthitaḥ mahān
svādu udaka samudraḥ tu sa samantāt aveṣṭayat
svādu udakasya paritas śailaḥ tu parimaṇḍalaḥ
prakāśaḥ ca aprakāśaḥ ca lokālokaḥ saḥ ucyate
ālokaḥ tatra ca arvāk ca nirālokaḥ tatas param
loka vistāra mātram tu pṛthivī ardham tu bāhyatas
praticchinnam samantāt tu udakena āvṛtam mahat
bhūmeḥ daśaguṇāḥ ca apaḥ samantāt pālayanti gām

original: adbhyo daśaguṇaścāgniḥ sarvato dhārayaty apaḥ // MatsP_123.49 //
analyzed: adbhyaḥ daśaguṇaḥ ca agniḥ sarvatas dhārayati apaḥ
agneḥ daśaguṇaḥ vāyuḥ dhārayan jyotiḥ āsthitaḥ

original: tiryakca maṇḍalo vāyur bhūtānyāveṣṭya dhārayan // MatsP_123.50 //
analyzed: tiryak ca maṇḍalaḥ vāyuḥ bhūtāni āveṣṭya dhārayan
daśa adhikam tathā ākāśam vāyoḥ bhūtāni adhārayat
bhūtādiḥ dhārayan vyoma tasmāt daśaguṇaḥ tu vai
bhūtāditaḥ daśaguṇam mahat bhūtāni adhārayat

original: mahattattvaṃ hyanantena avyaktena tu dhāryate // MatsP_123.52 //
analyzed: mahat tattvam hi anantena avyaktena tu dhāryate
ādhāra ādheya bhāvena vikārāḥ te vikāriṇām
pṛthvī ādayaḥ vikārāḥ te paricchinnāḥ parasparam
paraspara adhikāḥ ca eva praviṣṭāḥ ca parasparam

original: evaṃ parasparotpannā dhāryante ca parasparam // MatsP_123.54 //
analyzed: evam paraspara utpannāḥ dhāryante ca parasparam
yasmāt praviṣṭāḥ te nyonyam tasmāt te sthira tām gatāḥ
āsan te hi aviśeṣāḥ ca viśeṣāḥ anya veśanāt
pṛthvī ādayaḥ tu vāyu antāḥ paricchinnāḥ tu tatra te

original: bhūtebhyaḥ paratas tebhyo hy alokaḥ sarvataḥ smṛtaḥ // MatsP_123.56 //
analyzed: bhūtebhyaḥ paratas tebhyaḥ hi alokaḥ sarvatas smṛtaḥ
tathā hi āloke ākāśe paricchinnāni sarvaśas

original: pātre mahati pātrāṇi yathā hyantargatāni ca // MatsP_123.57 //
analyzed: pātre mahati pātrāṇi yathā hi antargatāni ca
bhavanti anyonya hīnāni paraspara samāśrayāt
tathā hi āloke ākāśe bhedāḥ tu antargata āgatāḥ
kṛtāni etāni tattvāni anyonyasya adhikāni ca
yāvat etāni tattvāni tāvat utpattiḥ ucyate
jantūnām iha saṃskāraḥ bhūteṣu antargateṣu vai

original: pratyākhyāyeha bhūtāni kāryotpattir na vidyate // MatsP_123.60 //
analyzed: pratyākhyāya iha bhūtāni kārya utpattiḥ na vidyate
tasmāt parimitāḥ bhedāḥ smṛtāḥ kārya ātmakāḥ tu vai
te kāraṇa ātmakāḥ ca eva syuḥ bhedāḥ mahat ādayaḥ
iti evam saṃniveśaḥ yam pṛthvī ākrāntaḥ tu bhāgaśas
sapta dvīpa samudrāṇām yāthātathyena vai mayā
vistārāt maṇḍalāt ca eva prasaṃkhyānena ca eva hi
viśva rūpam pradhānasya parimāṇa ekadeśinaḥ
etāvat saṃniveśaḥ tu mayā samyak prakāśitaḥ
etāvat eva śrotavyam saṃniveśasya pārthiva
matsyapurāṇa
sūtaḥ uvāca
atas ūrdhvam pravakṣyāmi sūrya candramasoḥ gatim
sūryācandramasau etau bhrājantau yāvat eva tu
sapta dvīpa samudrāṇām dvīpānām bhāti vistaraḥ
vistara ardham pṛthivyāḥ tu bhavet anyatra bāhyatas
paryāsa parimāṇam ca candra ādityau prakāśataḥ
paryāsa pārimāṇyāt tu budhaiḥ tulyam divaḥ smṛtam
trīn lokān prati sāmānyāt sūryaḥ yāti avilambataḥ

original: acirāttu prakāśena avanāttu raviḥ smṛtaḥ // MatsP_124.4 //
analyzed: acirāt tu prakāśena avanāt tu raviḥ smṛtaḥ
bhūyas bhūyas pravakṣyāmi pramāṇam candra sūryayoḥ
mahita tvāt mahat śabdaḥ hi asmin arthe nigadyate
asya bhārata varṣasya viṣkambhāt tulya vistṛtam
maṇḍalam bhāskarasya atha yojanaiḥ tat nibodhata
nava yojana sāhasraḥ vistāraḥ maṇḍalasya tu
vistārāt triguṇaḥ ca api maṇḍale
viṣkambhāt maṇḍalāt ca eva bhāskarāt dviguṇaḥ śaśī

original: ataḥ pṛthivyā vakṣyāmi pramāṇaṃ yojanaiḥ punaḥ // MatsP_124.8 //
analyzed: atas pṛthivyāḥ vakṣyāmi pramāṇam yojanaiḥ punar
sapta dvīpa samudrāyāḥ vistāraḥ maṇḍalasya tu
iti etat iha saṃkhyātam purāṇe parimāṇataḥ
tat vakṣyāmi prasaṃkhyāya sāmpratam ca abhimānibhiḥ

original: abhimānino hyatītā ye tulyāste sāmprataistviha // MatsP_124.10 //
analyzed: abhimāninaḥ hi atītāḥ ye tulyāḥ te sāmprataiḥ tu iha
deva adevaiḥ atītāḥ tu rūpaiḥ nāmabhiḥ eva ca
tasmāt vai sāmprataiḥ devaiḥ vakṣyāmi vasudhā talam
divyasya saṃniveśaḥ vai sāmprataiḥ eva kṛtsnaśas
śatārdha koṭi vistārā pṛthivī kṛtsnaśas smṛtā
tasyāḥ ca ardha pramāṇam ca meroḥ ca eva uttarottaram

original: merormadhye pratidiśaṃ koṭirekā tu sā smṛtā // MatsP_124.13 //
analyzed: meroḥ madhye pratidiśam koṭiḥ ekā tu sā smṛtā
tathā śata sahasrāṇām ekona navatim punar
pañcāśat ca sahasrāṇi pṛthivī ardhasya vistaraḥ
pṛthivyāḥ vistaram kṛtyam yojanaiḥ tam nibodhata

original: tisraḥ koṭyastu vistārāt saṃkhyātāstu caturdiśam // MatsP_124.15 //
analyzed: tisraḥ koṭyaḥ tu vistārāt saṃkhyātāḥ tu caturdiśam
tathā śata sahasrāṇām ekonāśītiḥ ucyate

original: saptadvīpasamudrāyāḥ pṛthivyāḥ sa tu vistaraḥ // MatsP_124.16 //
analyzed: sapta dvīpa samudrāyāḥ pṛthivyāḥ sa tu vistaraḥ
vistāram triguṇam ca eva pṛthivī antara maṇḍalam

original: gaṇitaṃ yojanānāṃ tu koṭyastvekādaśa smṛtāḥ // MatsP_124.17 //
analyzed: gaṇitam yojanānām tu koṭyaḥ tu ekādaśa smṛtāḥ
tathā śata sahasrāṇām saptatriṃśa adhikāḥ tu tāḥ
iti etat vai prasaṃkhyātam pṛthivī antara maṇḍalam
tārakā saṃniveśasya divi yāvat tu maṇḍalam
paryāpta saṃniveśasya bhūmeḥ tāvat tu maṇḍalam
paryāsa parimāṇam ca bhūmeḥ tulyam divaḥ smṛtam

original: meroḥ prācyāṃ diśāyāṃ tu mānasottaramūrdhani // MatsP_124.20 //
analyzed: meroḥ prācyām diśāyām tu mānasa uttara mūrdhani
vastu eka sārā māhendrī puṇyā hema pariṣkṛtā

original: dakṣiṇena punarmeror mānasasya tu pṛṣṭhataḥ // MatsP_124.21 //
analyzed: dakṣiṇena punar meroḥ mānasasya tu pṛṣṭhatas
vaivasvataḥ nivasati yamaḥ saṃyamane pure

original: pratīcyāṃ tu punarmeror mānasasya tu mūrdhani // MatsP_124.22 //
analyzed: pratīcyām tu punar meroḥ mānasasya tu mūrdhani

original: suṣā nāma purī ramyā varuṇasyāpi dhīmataḥ /
analyzed: suṣā nāma purī ramyā varuṇasya api dhīmataḥ
diśi uttarasyām meroḥ tu mānasasya eva mūrdhani
tulyā mahendra puryā api somasya api vibhāvarī
mānasottara pṛṣṭhe tu lokapālāḥ caturdiśam
sthitāḥ dharma vyavasthā artham loka saṃrakṣaṇāya ca
lokapāla upariṣṭāt tu sarvatas dakṣiṇāyane
kāṣṭhā gatasya sūryasya gatiḥ tatra nibodhata
dakṣiṇa upakrame sūryaḥ kṣipta iṣuḥ iva sarpati
jyotiṣām cakram ādāya satatam parigacchati
madhya gaḥ ca amarāvatyām yadā bhavati bhāskaraḥ
vaivasvate saṃyamane udyan sūryaḥ pradṛśyate
suṣāyām ardharātraḥ tu vibhāvaryāḥ astam eti ca
vaivasvate saṃyamane madhyāhne tu raviḥ yadā

original: suṣāyāmatha vāruṇyām uttiṣṭhansa tu dṛśyate // MatsP_124.29 //
analyzed: suṣāyām atha vāruṇyām uttiṣṭhan sa tu dṛśyate
vibhāvaryām ardharātram māhendryām astam eva ca

original: suṣāyāmatha vāruṇyāṃ madhyāhne tu raviryadā // MatsP_124.30 //
analyzed: suṣāyām atha vāruṇyām madhyāhne tu raviḥ yadā
vibhāvaryām soma puryām uttiṣṭhati vibhāvasuḥ
mahendrasya amarāvatyām udgacchati divākaraḥ
ardha rātram saṃyamane vāruṇyām astam eti ca
sa śīghram eva paryeti bhānuḥ ālāta cakra vat
bhraman vai bhramamāṇāni ṛkṣāṇi carate raviḥ

original: evaṃ caturṣu pārśveṣu dakṣiṇānteṣu sarpati // MatsP_124.33 //
analyzed: evam caturṣu pārśveṣu dakṣiṇa anteṣu sarpati
udaya astamaye vā asau uttiṣṭhati punar punar

original: pūrvāhṇe cāparāhṇe ca dvau dvau devālayau tu saḥ // MatsP_124.34 //
analyzed: pūrvāhṇe ca aparāhṇe ca dvau dvau devālayau tu saḥ

original: patatyekaṃ tu madhyāhne bhābhireva ca raśmibhiḥ /
analyzed: patati ekam tu madhyāhne bhābhiḥ eva ca raśmibhiḥ

original: udito vardhamānābhir madhyāhne tapate raviḥ // MatsP_124.35 //
analyzed: uditaḥ vardhamānābhiḥ madhyāhne tapate raviḥ

original: ataḥ paraṃ hrasantībhir gobhirastaṃ sa gacchati /
analyzed: atas param hrasantībhiḥ gobhiḥ astam sa gacchati

original: udayāstamayābhyāṃ ca smṛte pūrvāpare tu vai // MatsP_124.36 //
analyzed: udaya astamayābhyām ca smṛte pūrva apare tu vai
yādṛś purastāt tapati yādṛś pṛṣṭhe tu pārśvayoḥ

original: yatrodayastu dṛśyeta teṣāṃ sa udayaḥ smṛtaḥ // MatsP_124.37 //
analyzed: yatra udayaḥ tu dṛśyeta teṣām saḥ udayaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: praṇāśaṃ gacchate yatra teṣāmastaḥ sa ucyate /
analyzed: praṇāśam gacchate yatra teṣām astaḥ saḥ ucyate
sarveṣām uttare meruḥ lokālokasya dakṣiṇe
vidūra bhāvāt arkasya bhūmeḥ eṣā gatasya ca

original: śrayante raśmayo yasmāt tena rātrau na dṛśyate // MatsP_124.39 //
analyzed: śrayante raśmayaḥ yasmāt tena rātrau na dṛśyate
ūrdhvam śata sahasra aṃśuḥ sthitaḥ tatra pradṛśyate

original: evaṃ puṣkaramadhye tu yadā bhavati bhāskaraḥ // MatsP_124.40 //
analyzed: evam puṣkara madhye tu yadā bhavati bhāskaraḥ

original: triṃśadbhāgaṃ ca medinyā muhūrtena sa gacchati /
analyzed: triṃśat bhāgam ca medinyāḥ muhūrtena sa gacchati

original: yojanānāṃ sahasrasya imāṃ saṃkhyāṃ nibodhata // MatsP_124.41 //
analyzed: yojanānām sahasrasya imām saṃkhyām nibodhata
pūrṇam śata sahasrāṇām ekatriṃśat ca sā smṛtā
pañcāśat ca sahasrāṇi tathā anyāni adhikāni ca
mauhūrtikī gatiḥ hi eṣā sūryasya tu vidhīyate

original: etena kramayogeṇa yadā kāṣṭhāṃ tu dakṣiṇām // MatsP_124.43 //
analyzed: etena krama yogeṇa yadā kāṣṭhām tu dakṣiṇām
parigacchati sūryaḥ sau māsam kāṣṭhām udak dināt
madhyena puṣkarasya atha bhramate dakṣiṇāyane
mānasottara meroḥ tu antaram triguṇam smṛtam

original: sarvato dakṣiṇasyāṃ tu kāṣṭhāyāṃ tannibodhata // MatsP_124.45 //
analyzed: sarvatas dakṣiṇasyām tu kāṣṭhāyām tat nibodhata
nava koṭyaḥ prasaṃkhyātāḥ yojanaiḥ parimaṇḍalam

original: tathā śatasahasrāṇi catvāriṃśacca pañca ca // MatsP_124.46 //
analyzed: tathā śata sahasrāṇi catvāriṃśat ca pañca ca
ahorātrāt pataṃgasya gatiḥ eṣā vidhīyate
sau viṣuva sthaḥ yadā raviḥ
kṣīrodasya samudrasya uttaratas diśam caran
maṇḍalam viṣuvat ca api yojanaiḥ tat nibodhata
tisraḥ koṭyaḥ tu sampūrṇāḥ viṣuvasya api maṇḍalam
tathā śata sahasrāṇi viṃśati eka adhikāni tu
śrāvaṇe ca uttarām kāṣṭhām citrabhānuḥ yadā bhavet

original: gomedasya paradvīpe uttarāṃ ca diśaṃ caran // MatsP_124.50 //
analyzed: gomedasya para dvīpe uttarām ca diśam caran

original: uttarāyāḥ pramāṇaṃ tu kāṣṭhāyā maṇḍalasya tu /
analyzed: uttarāyāḥ pramāṇam tu kāṣṭhāyāḥ maṇḍalasya tu
dakṣiṇa uttara madhyāni tāni vindyāt yathākramam
sthānam jaradgavam madhye tathā airāvatam uttamam
vaiśvānaram dakṣiṇatas nirdiṣṭam iha tattvataḥ

original: nāgavīthyuttarā vīthī hy ajavīthis tu dakṣiṇā /
analyzed: nāgavīthī uttarā vīthī hi ajavīthiḥ tu dakṣiṇā

original: ubhe āṣāḍhamūlaṃ tu ajavīthyādayas trayaḥ // MatsP_124.53 //
analyzed: ubhe āṣāḍha mūlam tu ajavīthī ādayaḥ trayaḥ

original: aśvinī kṛttikā yāmyā nāgavīthyas trayaḥ smṛtāḥ // MatsP_124.54 //
analyzed: aśvinī kṛttikā yāmyā nāgavīthyaḥ trayaḥ smṛtāḥ
rohiṇī ārdrā mṛgaśiraḥ nāgavīthiḥ iti smṛtā

original: puṣyāśleṣā punarvasvor vīthī cairāvatī smṛtā // MatsP_124.55 //
analyzed: puṣya āśleṣā punarvasvoḥ vīthī ca airāvatī smṛtā

original: tisrastu vīthayo hyetā uttaro mārga ucyate /

analyzed: āpūryate paraḥ bhāgaḥ somasya tu ahar kramāt

original: tataḥ pītakṣayaṃ somaṃ yupagadvyāpayan raviḥ // MatsP_126.55 //
analyzed: tatas pīta kṣayam somam raviḥ
pītam pañcadaśa aham ca raśminā ekena bhāskaraḥ
āpūrayan dadau tena bhāgam bhāgam ahar kramāt
śukle vardhanti vai kalāḥ

original: tasmāddhrasanti vai kṛṣṇe śukle hyāpyāyayanti ca // MatsP_126.57 //
analyzed: tasmāt hrasanti vai kṛṣṇe śukle hi āpyāyayanti ca
iti evam sūrya vīryeṇa candrasya āpyāyate tanuḥ
paurṇamāsyām pradṛśyeta śuklaḥ sampūrṇa maṇḍalaḥ
evam āpyāyate somaḥ śuklapakṣeṣu ahar kramāt
tatas dvitīyā prabhṛti bahulasya caturdaśī
apām sāra mayasya indo rasa mātra ātmakasya ca

original: pibantyambumayaṃ devā madhu saumyaṃ tathāmṛtam // MatsP_126.60 //
analyzed: pibanti ambu mayam devāḥ madhu saumyam tathā amṛtam
saṃbhṛtam tu ardha māsena amṛtam sūrya tejasā
bhakṣa artham āgatam somam paurṇamāsyām upāsate
eka rātram surāḥ sārdham pitṛbhiḥ ṛṣibhiḥ ca vai

prakṣīyate pare hi ātmā pīyamāna kalā kramāt

original: trayaśca triṃśatā sārdhaṃ trayastriṃśacchatāni tu // MatsP_126.63 //
analyzed: trayaḥ ca triṃśatā sārdham trayastriṃśat śatāni tu

original: ityevaṃ pīyamānasya kṛṣṇe vardhanti tāḥ kalāḥ // MatsP_126.64 //
analyzed: iti evam pīyamānasya kṛṣṇe vardhanti tāḥ kalāḥ

original: kṣīyante ca tāḥ śuklāḥ kṛṣṇā hyāpyāyayanti ca /
analyzed: kṣīyante ca tāḥ śuklāḥ kṛṣṇāḥ hi āpyāyayanti ca

pitaraḥ ca upatiṣṭhanti amāvāsyām niśākaram
tatas pañcadaśe bhāge kiṃcid śeṣe niśākare
parāhṇe pitaraḥ jaghanya divase punar

original: pibanti dvikalaṃ kālaṃ śiṣṭāstāstu kalāstu yāḥ /
analyzed: pibanti dvi kalam kālam śiṣṭāḥ tāḥ tu kalāḥ tu yāḥ
viniḥsṛṣṭam tu amāvāsyām gabhastibhyaḥ tadā amṛtam
ardha māsa samāptau tu pītvā gacchanti te mṛtam

original: saumyā barhiṣadaścaiva agniṣvāttāśca ye smṛtāḥ // MatsP_126.69 //
analyzed: saumyāḥ barhiṣadaḥ ca eva agniṣvāttāḥ ca ye smṛtāḥ

original: kāvyāścaiva tu ye proktāḥ pitaraḥ sarva eva te /
analyzed: kāvyāḥ ca eva tu ye proktāḥ pitaraḥ sarve eva te

original: saṃvatsarāśca ye kāvyāḥ pañcābdā vai dvijāḥ smṛtāḥ // MatsP_126.70 //
analyzed: saṃvatsarāḥ ca ye kāvyāḥ pañca abdāḥ vai dvijāḥ smṛtāḥ
saumyāḥ su tapasaḥ jñeyāḥ saumyāḥ barhiṣadaḥ tathā
agniṣvāttāḥ trayaḥ ca eva pitṛ sarga sthitāḥ dvijāḥ

original: pitṛbhiḥ pīyamānāyāṃ pañcadaśyāṃ tu vai kalām /
analyzed: pitṛbhiḥ pīyamānāyām pañcadaśyām tu vai kalām

original: yāvacca kṣīyate tasmād bhāgaḥ pañcadaśastu saḥ // MatsP_126.72 //
analyzed: yāvat ca kṣīyate tasmāt bhāgaḥ pañcadaśaḥ tu saḥ

original: amāvāsyāṃ tathā tasya antarā pūryate paraḥ /
analyzed: amāvāsyām tathā tasya antarā pūryate paraḥ

original: vṛddhikṣayau vai pakṣādau ṣoḍaśyāṃ śaśinaḥ mṛtau /
analyzed: vṛddhi kṣayau vai pakṣa ādau ṣoḍaśyām śaśinaḥ mṛtau

original: evaṃ sūryanimitte te kṣayavṛddhī niśākare // MatsP_126.73 //
analyzed: evam sūrya nimitte te kṣaya vṛddhī niśākare
matsyapurāṇa
sūtaḥ uvāca

original: atha tejomayaḥ śubhraḥ somaputrasya vai rathaḥ // MatsP_127.1 //
analyzed: atha tejaḥ mayaḥ śubhraḥ somaputrasya vai rathaḥ
yuktaḥ hayaiḥ piśaṅgaḥ tu daśabhiḥ vāta raṃhasaiḥ

original: śvetaḥ piśaṅgaḥ sāraṅgo nīlaḥ śyāmo vilohitaḥ // MatsP_127.2 //
analyzed: śvetaḥ piśaṅgaḥ sāraṅgaḥ nīlaḥ śyāmaḥ vilohitaḥ
śvetaḥ ca haritaḥ ca eva pṛṣataḥ vṛṣṇiḥ eva ca
daśabhiḥ tu mahābhāgaiḥ uttamaiḥ vāta sambhavaiḥ
tatas bhauma rathaḥ ca api aṣṭa aṅgaḥ kāñcanaḥ smṛtaḥ
aṣṭabhiḥ lohitaiḥ aśvaiḥ sa dhvajaiḥ agni sambhavaiḥ
sarpate sau kumāraḥ vai ṛju vakra anuvakra gaḥ
atas ca āṅgirasaḥ vidvān deva ācāryaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ

original: gaurāśvena tu raukmeṇa syandanena visarpati // MatsP_127.5 //
analyzed: gaura aśvena tu raukmeṇa syandanena visarpati

original: abdaṃ vasati yo rāśau svadiśaṃ tena gacchati // MatsP_127.6 //
analyzed: abdam vasati yaḥ rāśau sva diśam tena gacchati
yuktena aṣṭābhiḥ aśvaiḥ ca sa dhvajaiḥ agni saṃnibhaiḥ
rathena kṣipra vegeṇa bhārgavaḥ tena gacchati

original: kārṣṇāyasaṃ samāruhya syandanaṃ yātyasau śaniḥ // MatsP_127.8 //

original: yāvattamanuparyeti dhruvaṃ ca jyotiṣāṃ gaṇaḥ // MatsP_127.14 //

śiśumāra ākṛtim jñātvā pravibhāgena sarvaśas

analyzed: oṣadhīṣu balam dhatte sudhām ca svadhayā punar

original: evaṃ raśmisahasraṃ tu sauraṃ lokārthasādhakam // MatsP_128.26 //

original: ityevaṃ maṇḍalaṃ śuklaṃ bhāsvaraṃ lokasaṃjñitam // MatsP_128.27 //
analyzed: iti evam maṇḍalam śuklam bhāsvaram loka saṃjñitam

original: harikeśaḥ purastāttu yo vai nakṣatrayonikṛt // MatsP_128.29 //

analyzed: ṣaṣṭhaḥ tu raśmiḥ yoniḥ sa hi bṛhaspateḥ

original: divyānāṃ pārthivānāṃ ca vaṃśānāṃ caiva sarvaśaḥ /

original: tapanastejaso yogād āditya iti gadyate // MatsP_128.35 //
analyzed: tapanaḥ tejasaḥ yogāt ādityaḥ iti gadyate

original: śuklatve hyamṛtatve ca śītatve hlādane 'pi ca // MatsP_128.37 //

jala tejaḥ maye śukle vṛtta kumbha nibhe śubhe

original: tāni devagṛhāṇi syuḥ sthānākhyāni bhavanti hi /

original: sauraṃ sūryo 'viśatsthānaṃ saumyaṃ somastathaiva ca // MatsP_128.40 //

original: bṛhaspatirbṛhattvaṃ ca lohitaṃ cāpi lohitaḥ // MatsP_128.41 //

original: jyotīṃṣi sukṛtām ete jñeyā devagṛhāstu vai // MatsP_128.43 //

original: manvantareṣu sarveṣu devasthānāni tāni vai // MatsP_128.44 //

analyzed: atītāḥ tu saha atītaiḥ bhāvyāḥ bhāvyaiḥ suraiḥ saha

original: budho manoharaścaiva śaśiputrastu sa smṛtaḥ // MatsP_128.48 //
analyzed: budhaḥ manoharaḥ ca eva śaśiputraḥ tu sa smṛtaḥ

original: agnirvikeśyāṃ jajñe tu yuvāsau lohitādhipaḥ // MatsP_128.49 //

original: sahasrāṃśutviṣaḥ sthānam ammayaṃ taijasaṃ tathā // MatsP_128.52 //

original: ādityātsa tu niṣkramya somaṃ gacchati parvasu // MatsP_128.61 //

bhārgavāt pāda hīnaḥ ca vijñeyaḥ vai bṛhaspatiḥ

vistāra maṇḍalābhyām tu pāda hīnaḥ tayoḥ budhaḥ
tārā nakṣatra rūpāṇi vapuṣmanti iha yāni vai
budhena sama rūpāṇi vistārāt maṇḍalāt tu vai
tārā nakṣatra rūpāṇi hīnāni tu parasparam

original: śatāni pañca catvāri trīṇi dve caikameva ca /

original: yāvanti caiva ṛkṣāṇi koṭyastāvanti tārakāḥ // MatsP_128.70 //
analyzed: yāvanti ca eva ṛkṣāṇi koṭyaḥ tāvanti tārakāḥ

original: vistīrṇaṃ maṇḍalaṃ kṛtvā tasyordhvaṃ carate śaśī // MatsP_128.71 //

ṛṣayaḥ ūcuḥ

anyadā ācarita āhārāḥ paṅkena ācita valkalāḥ

original: ādhāraṇe mahattve vā dharmaḥ sa tu nirucyate // MatsP_145.27 //
analyzed: ādhāraṇe mahattve vā dharmaḥ sa tu nirucyate
tatra iṣṭa prāpakaḥ dharmaḥ ācāryaiḥ upadiśyate
adharmaḥ ca aniṣṭa phalaḥ ācāryaiḥ na upadiśyate
vṛddhāḥ ca a lolupāḥ ca eva ātmavantaḥ hi a dāmbhikāḥ
samyak vinītāḥ mṛdavaḥ tān ācāryān pracakṣate
dharma jñaiḥ vihitaḥ dharmaḥ śrauta smārtaḥ dvijātibhiḥ
dāra agnihotra sambandham ijyā śrautasya lakṣaṇam
smārtaḥ varṇa āśrama ācāraḥ yamaiḥ ca niyamaiḥ yutaḥ
pūrvebhyaḥ vedayitvā iha śrautam saptarṣayaḥ bruvan

original: ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmāni brahmaṇo 'ṅgāni vai śrutiḥ /
analyzed: ṛcaḥ yajūṃṣi sāmāni brahmaṇaḥ ṅgāni vai śrutiḥ

original: evaṃ vai dvividho dharmaḥ śiṣṭācāraḥ sa ucyate // MatsP_145.33 //
analyzed: evam vai dvividhaḥ dharmaḥ śiṣṭa ācāraḥ saḥ ucyate
śiṣeḥ dhātoḥ ca niṣṭhā antāt śiṣṭa śabdam pracakṣate

original: manvantareṣu ye śiṣṭā iha tiṣṭhanti dhārmikāḥ // MatsP_145.34 //
analyzed: manvantareṣu ye śiṣṭāḥ iha tiṣṭhanti dhārmikāḥ
manuḥ saptarṣayaḥ ca eva loka saṃtāna kāriṇaḥ
tiṣṭhanti iha ca dharma artham tān śiṣṭān sampracakṣate

original: taiḥ śiṣṭaiścalito dharmaḥ sthāpyate vai yuge yuge /
analyzed: taiḥ śiṣṭaiḥ calitaḥ dharmaḥ sthāpyate vai yuge yuge
trayī vārttā daṇḍanītiḥ prajā varṇa āśrama īpsayā
śiṣṭaiḥ ācaryate yasmāt punar ca eva manu kṣaye
pūrvaiḥ pūrvaiḥ mata tvāt ca śiṣṭa ācāraḥ sa śāśvataḥ

original: dānaṃ satyaṃ tapo loko vidyejyā pūjanaṃ damaḥ /
analyzed: dānam satyam tapaḥ lokaḥ vidyā ijyā pūjanam damaḥ

original: aṣṭau tāni caritrāṇi śiṣṭācārasya lakṣaṇam // MatsP_145.38 //
analyzed: aṣṭau tāni caritrāṇi śiṣṭa ācārasya lakṣaṇam
śiṣṭāḥ yasmāt caranti enam manuḥ saptarṣayaḥ ca ha
manvantareṣu sarveṣu śiṣṭa ācāraḥ tatas smṛtaḥ
vijñeyaḥ śravaṇāt śrautaḥ smaraṇāt smārtaḥ ucyate
ijyā veda ātmakaḥ śrautaḥ smārtaḥ varṇa āśrama ātmakaḥ

original: pratyaṅgāni pravakṣyāmi dharmasyeha tu lakṣaṇam // MatsP_145.40 //
analyzed: pratyaṅgāni pravakṣyāmi dharmasya iha tu lakṣaṇam

original: dṛṣṭānubhūtamarthaṃ ca yaḥ pṛṣṭo na vigūhate /
analyzed: dṛṣṭa anubhūtam artham ca yaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ na vigūhate
yathā bhūta pravādaḥ tu iti etat satya lakṣaṇam
brahmacaryam tapaḥ maunam nirāhāra tvam eva ca

original: ityetattapaso rūpaṃ sughoraṃ tu durāsadam // MatsP_145.42 //
analyzed: iti etat tapasaḥ rūpam su ghoram tu durāsadam

original: ṛtvijāṃ dakṣiṇāyāśca saṃyogo yajña ucyate // MatsP_145.43 //
analyzed: ṛtvijām dakṣiṇāyāḥ ca saṃyogaḥ yajñaḥ ucyate
ātma vat sarva bhūteṣu yaḥ hitāya śubhāya ca

original: vartate satataṃ hṛṣṭaḥ kriyā śreṣṭhā dayā smṛtā // MatsP_145.44 //
analyzed: vartate satatam hṛṣṭaḥ kriyā śreṣṭhā dayā smṛtā
ākruṣṭaḥ bhihataḥ yaḥ tu na ākrośet praharet api

original: aduṣṭo vāṅmanaḥkāyais titikṣuḥ sā kṣamā smṛtā // MatsP_145.45 //
analyzed: aduṣṭaḥ vāc manaḥ kāyaiḥ titikṣuḥ sā kṣamā smṛtā

original: parasvānām anādānam alobha iti saṃjñitam // MatsP_145.46 //
analyzed: para svānām anādānam alobhaḥ iti saṃjñitam

original: ātmārthe vā parārthe vā indriyāṇīha yasya vai /
analyzed: ātma arthe vā para arthe vā indriyāṇi iha yasya vai

original: viṣaye na pravartante damasyaitattu lakṣaṇam // MatsP_145.48 //
analyzed: viṣaye na pravartante damasya etat tu lakṣaṇam

original: na krudhyeta pratihataḥ sa jitātmā bhaviṣyati // MatsP_145.49 //
analyzed: na krudhyeta pratihataḥ sa jita ātmā bhaviṣyati
yat yat iṣṭatamam dravyam nyāyena eva āgatam ca yat
tat tat guṇavate deyam iti etat dāna lakṣaṇam
śruti smṛtibhyām vihitaḥ dharmaḥ varṇa āśrama ātmakaḥ
śiṣṭa ācāra pravṛddhaḥ ca dharmaḥ yam sādhu saṃmataḥ
a pradveṣaḥ hi an iṣṭeṣu iṣṭam vai na abhinandati
prīti tāpa viṣādānām vinivṛttiḥ virakta tā
saṃnyāsaḥ karmaṇām nyāsaḥ kṛtānām akṛtaiḥ saha

original: kuśalākuśalābhyāṃ tu prahāṇaṃ nyāsa ucyate // MatsP_145.53 //
analyzed: kuśala akuśalābhyām tu prahāṇam nyāsaḥ ucyate
avyakta ādi viśeṣa antau ikāre smin nivartate

original: cetanācetanaṃ jñātvā jñāne jñānī sa ucyate // MatsP_145.54 //
analyzed: cetana acetanam jñātvā jñāne jñānī saḥ ucyate
pratyaṅgāni tu dharmasya ca iti etat lakṣaṇam smṛtam
ṛṣibhiḥ dharma tattva jñaiḥ pūrvaiḥ svāyambhuve ntare

original: atra vo varṇayiṣyāmi vidhiṃ manvantarasya tu /
analyzed: atra vaḥ varṇayiṣyāmi vidhim manvantarasya tu

original: tathaiva cāturhotrasya cāturvarṇyasya caiva hi // MatsP_145.56 //
analyzed: tathā eva cāturhotrasya cāturvarṇyasya ca eva hi
pratimanvantaram ca eva śrutiḥ anyā vidhīyate
ṛcaḥ yajūṃṣi sāmāni yathāvat pratidaivatam
vidhi stotram tathā hautram pūrvavat sampravartate

original: dravyastotraṃ guṇastotraṃ karmastotraṃ tathaiva ca // MatsP_145.58 //
analyzed: dravya stotram guṇa stotram karma stotram tathā eva ca

original: manvantareṣu sarveṣu yathā bhedā bhavanti hi // MatsP_145.59 //
analyzed: manvantareṣu sarveṣu yathā bhedāḥ bhavanti hi

original: pravartayanti teṣāṃ vai brahmastotraṃ punaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: pravartayanti teṣām vai brahmastotram punar punar
evam mantra guṇānām tu samutpattiḥ caturvidhā
atharva ṛk yajuḥ sāmnām vedeṣu iha pṛthak pṛthak

original: ṛṣīṇāṃ tapyatāṃ teṣāṃ tapaḥ paramaduścaram // MatsP_145.61 //
analyzed: ṛṣīṇām tapyatām teṣām tapaḥ parama duścaram
mantrāḥ prādurbhavanti ādau pūrva manvantarasya ha
asaṃtoṣāt bhayāt duḥkhāt mohāt śokāt ca pañcadhā
ṛṣīṇām tārakāḥ yena lakṣaṇena yadṛcchayā

original: ṛṣīṇāṃ yādṛśatvaṃ hi tadvakṣyāmīha lakṣaṇam // MatsP_145.63 //
analyzed: ṛṣīṇām yādṛśa tvam hi tat vakṣyāmi iha lakṣaṇam

original: tathā ṛṣīṇāṃ vakṣyāmi ārṣasyeha samudbhavam // MatsP_145.64 //
analyzed: tathā ṛṣīṇām vakṣyāmi ārṣasya iha samudbhavam
guṇa sāmyena vartante sarva saṃpralaye tadā
avibhāgena devānām anirdeśye tamaḥ maye
a buddhi pūrvakam tat vai cetanā artham pravartate
tena ārṣam buddhi pūrvam tu cetanena api adhiṣṭhitam

original: pravartate tathā te tu yathā matsyodakāvubhau /
analyzed: pravartate tathā te tu yathā matsya udakau ubhau
cetanā adhikṛtam sarvam prāvartata guṇa ātmakam
kārya kāraṇa bhāvena tathā tasya pravartate
viṣayaḥ viṣayi tvam ca tadā hi artha pada ātmakau
kālena prāpaṇīyena bhedāḥ ca kāraṇa ātmakāḥ
sāṃsiddhikāḥ tadā vṛttāḥ krameṇa mahat ādayaḥ
mahataḥ saḥ ahaṃkāraḥ tasmāt bhūta indriyāṇi ca
bhūta bhedāḥ ca bhūtebhyaḥ jajñire tu parasparam

original: saṃsiddhikāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ sadya eva vivartate // MatsP_145.70 //

original: tathā pravṛttāḥ kṣetrajñāḥ kālenaikena kāraṇāt // MatsP_145.71 //
analyzed: tathā pravṛttāḥ kṣetrajñāḥ kālena ekena kāraṇāt

original: tathā nivṛtto hyavyaktaḥ khadyota iva saṃjvalan // MatsP_145.72 //

original: tatraiva saṃsthito vidvāṃs tapaso 'nta iti śrutam /

jñānam vairāgyam aiśvaryam dharmaḥ ca iti catuṣṭayam

mahātmanaḥ śarīrasya caitanyāt siddhiḥ ucyate

original: puri śete yataḥ pūrvaṃ kṣetrajñānaṃ tathāpi ca // MatsP_145.76 //
analyzed: puri śete yatas pūrvam kṣetra jñānam tathā api ca

original: yasmāddharmātprasūte hi tasmādvai dhārmikastu saḥ // MatsP_145.77 //
analyzed: yasmāt dharmāt prasūte hi tasmāt vai dhārmikaḥ tu saḥ

original: evaṃ vivṛttaḥ kṣetrajñaḥ kṣetraṃ hyanabhisaṃdhitaḥ // MatsP_145.78 //
analyzed: evam vivṛttaḥ kṣetrajñaḥ kṣetram hi anabhisaṃdhitaḥ

original: ṛṣirhiṃsāgatau dhātur vidyā satyaṃ tapaḥ śrutam /

original: eṣa sannilayo yasmād brāhmaṇastutatas tv ṛṣiḥ // MatsP_145.80 //

original: ṛṣate paramaṃ yasmāt paramarṣistataḥ smṛtaḥ // MatsP_145.81 //

īśvarāṇām sutāḥ teṣām mānasāḥ ca aurasāḥ ca vai
ṛṣiḥ tasmāt para tvena bhūtādiḥ ṛṣayaḥ tatas
ṛṣi putrāḥ ṛṣīkāḥ tu maithunāt garbha sambhavāḥ
para tvena vai

original: ṛṣikāṇāṃ sutā ye tu vijñeyā ṛṣiputrakāḥ // MatsP_145.86 //

original: avyaktātmā mahātmā vā-haṃkārātmā tathaiva ca // MatsP_145.87 //
analyzed: avyakta ātmā mahātmā vā ahaṃkāra ātmā tathā eva ca
bhūtātmā ca indriyātmā ca teṣām tat jñānam ucyate
iti evam ṛṣi jātiḥ tu pañcadhā nāma viśrutā

original: manurdakṣo vasiṣṭhaśca pulastyaścāpi te daśa // MatsP_145.89 //
analyzed: manuḥ dakṣaḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ ca pulastyaḥ ca api te daśa

īśvarāṇām sutāḥ tu eṣām ṛṣayaḥ tān nibodhata

utathyaḥ vāmadevaḥ ca agastyaḥ kauśikaḥ tathā

original: ityete ṛṣayaḥ proktās tapasā ṛṣitāṃ gatāḥ /

teṣām putrān ṛṣīkān tu garbha utpannān nibodhata

ṛṣiḥ dīrghatamāḥ ca eva bṛhat vakṣāḥ śaradvataḥ

original: śṛṅgī ca śaṅkhapāc caiva rājā vaiśravaṇastathā // MatsP_145.95 //

original: ityete ṛṣikāḥ sarve satyena ṛṣitāṃ gatāḥ /

original: īśvarā ṛṣayaścaiva ṛṣīkā ye ca viśrutāḥ // MatsP_145.96 //
analyzed: īśvarāḥ ṛṣayaḥ ca eva ṛṣīkāḥ ye ca viśrutāḥ

original: bhṛguḥ kāśyapaḥ pracetā dadhīco hyātmavānapi // MatsP_145.97 //
analyzed: bhṛguḥ kāśyapaḥ pracetāḥ dadhīcaḥ hi ātmavān api
ūrṣaḥ tha jamadagniḥ ca vedaḥ sārasvataḥ tathā
ārṣṭiṣeṇaḥ cyavanaḥ ca vītahavyaḥ sa vedhasaḥ

ekonaviṃśatiḥ hi ete bhṛgavaḥ mantra kṛttamāḥ
aṅgirāḥ ca eva tritaḥ ca lakṣmaṇaḥ
kṛtavācaḥ tathā gargaḥ smṛti saṃkṛtiḥ eva ca
guruvītaḥ ca māndhātā ambarīṣaḥ tathā eva ca
yuvanāśvaḥ purukutsaḥ svaśravaḥ tu sadasyavān
ajamīḍhaḥ svahāryaḥ ca hi utkalaḥ kaviḥ eva ca
pṛṣadaśvaḥ virūpaḥ ca kāvyaḥ ca eva atha mudgalaḥ

apasya oṣaḥ sucittiḥ ca vāmadevaḥ tathā eva ca
ṛṣi jaḥ bṛhat śuklaḥ ca ṛṣiḥ dīrghatamāḥ api

original: kakṣīvāṃśca trayastriṃśat smṛtā hyaṅgirasāṃ varāḥ // MatsP_145.104 //
analyzed: kakṣīvān ca trayastriṃśat smṛtāḥ hi aṅgirasām varāḥ
ete mantra kṛtaḥ sarve kāśyapān tu nibodhata

original: kāśyapaḥ sahavatsāro naidhruvo nitya eva ca // MatsP_145.105 //
analyzed: kāśyapaḥ sahavatsāraḥ naidhruvaḥ nityaḥ eva ca
asitaḥ devalaḥ ca eva ṣaṭ ete brahma vādinaḥ

original: karṇakaśca ṛṣiḥ siddhas tathā pūrvātithiśca yaḥ // MatsP_145.107 //
analyzed: karṇakaḥ ca ṛṣiḥ siddhaḥ tathā pūrvātithiḥ ca yaḥ

vasiṣṭhaḥ ca eva śaktiḥ ca tṛtīyaḥ ca parāśaraḥ
tatas tu indra pratimaḥ pañcamaḥ tu bharadvasuḥ
ṣaṣṭhaḥ tu mitrāvaruṇaḥ sattamaḥ kuṇḍinaḥ tathā
iti ete sapta vijñeyāḥ vāsiṣṭhāḥ brahma vādinaḥ
viśvāmitraḥ ca gādheyaḥ devarātaḥ tathā balaḥ

aṣṭakaḥ lohitaḥ ca eva bhṛtakīlaḥ ca mā ambudhiḥ

original: śiśiraśca mahātejāḥ śālaṅkāyana eva ca // MatsP_145.112 //

trayodaśā ete vijñeyāḥ brahmiṣṭhāḥ kauśikāḥ varāḥ

brahmiṣṭha agastayaḥ hi ete trayaḥ parama kīrtayaḥ
manuḥ vaivasvataḥ ca eva ailaḥ rājā purūravāḥ

original: bhalandakaśca vāsāśvaḥ saṃkīlaścaiva te trayaḥ // MatsP_145.115 //
analyzed: bhalandakaḥ ca vāsāśvaḥ saṃkīlaḥ ca eva te trayaḥ

original: ete mantrakṛto jñeyā vaiśyānāṃ pravarāḥ sadā /

original: iti dvinavatiḥ proktā mantrāyaiśca bahiṣkṛtāḥ // MatsP_145.116 //
analyzed: iti dvinavatiḥ proktāḥ mantra ayaiḥ ca bahiṣkṛtāḥ

original: ṛṣīkāṇāṃ sutā hyete ṛṣiputrāḥ śrutarṣayaḥ // MatsP_145.117 //
analyzed: ṛṣīkāṇām sutāḥ hi ete ṛṣi putrāḥ śruta ṛṣayaḥ
matsyapurāṇa
ṛṣayaḥ ūcuḥ

original: durjanaḥ sujanatvāya kalpate na kadācana // MatsP_148.72 //
analyzed: durjanaḥ sujana tvāya kalpate na kadācana
su janaḥ svabhāvasya tyāgam vāñchet kadācana

original: evaṃ me budhyate buddhir yūyamatra vyavasyata // MatsP_148.73 //
analyzed: evam me budhyate buddhiḥ yūyam atra vyavasyata
evam uktaḥ sahasrākṣaḥ evam eva iti uvāca tam
kartavya tām sa saṃcintya provāca amara saṃsadi
indraḥ uvāca
sa avadhānena me vācam śṛṇudhvam nāka vāsinaḥ
bhavantaḥ yajña bhoktāraḥ tuṣṭa ātmānaḥ tisāttvikāḥ

original: sve mahimni sthitā nityaṃ jagataḥ paripālakāḥ /
analyzed: sve mahimni sthitāḥ nityam jagataḥ paripālakāḥ
bhavataḥ ca animittena bādhane dānava īśvarāḥ

original: teṣāṃ sāmādi naivāsti daṇḍa eva vidhīyatām /
analyzed: teṣām sāma ādi na eva asti daṇḍaḥ eva vidhīyatām

original: kriyatāṃ samarodyogaḥ sainyaṃ saṃyojyatāṃ mama // MatsP_148.77 //
analyzed: kriyatām samara udyogaḥ sainyam saṃyojyatām mama
ādriyantām ca śastrāṇi pūjyantām astra devatāḥ

original: vāhanāni ca yānāni yojayantu mamāmarāḥ // MatsP_148.78 //
analyzed: vāhanāni ca yānāni yojayantu mama amarāḥ
yamam senāpatim kṛtvā śīghram evam divaukasaḥ

original: ityuktāḥ samanahyanta devānāṃ ye pradhānataḥ // MatsP_148.79 //
analyzed: iti uktāḥ samanahyanta devānām ye pradhānataḥ
vājinām ayutena ājau hema ghaṇṭā pariṣkṛtam
nānā āścarya guṇa upetam samprāptam sarva daivataiḥ
ratham mātalinā kḷptam devarājasya durjayam
yamaḥ mahiṣam āsthāya senā agre samavartata
caṇḍa kiṃkara vṛndena sarvatas parivāritaḥ
kalpa kāla uddhata jvālā pūrita ambara locanaḥ
hutāśanaḥ chāga rūḍhaḥ śakti hastaḥ vyavasthitaḥ
pavanaḥ ṅkuśa pāṇiḥ tu vistārita mahā javaḥ
bhujaga indra samārūḍhaḥ jaleśaḥ bhagavān svayam
nara yukta rathe devaḥ rākṣasa īśaḥ viyat caraḥ
tīkṣṇa khaḍga yutaḥ bhīmaḥ samare samavasthitaḥ
candra ādityau aśvinau ca caturaṅga bala anvitau
rājabhiḥ sahitāḥ tasthuḥ gandharvāḥ hema bhūṣaṇāḥ
hema pīta uttarāsaṅgāḥ citra varma ratha āyudhāḥ
nāka pṛṣṭha śikhaṇḍāḥ tu vaiḍūrya makara dhvajāḥ
japā rakta uttarāsaṅgāḥ rākṣasāḥ rakta mūrdhajāḥ
gṛdhra dhvajāḥ mahā vīryāḥ nirmala ayaḥ vibhūṣaṇāḥ
musala asi gadā hastāḥ rathe ca uṣṇīṣa daṃśitāḥ
mahā megha ravāḥ nāgāḥ bhīma ulkā aśani hetayaḥ
yakṣāḥ kṛṣṇa ambara bhṛtaḥ bhīma bāṇa dhanuḥ dharāḥ
tāmra ulūka dhvajāḥ raudrāḥ hema ratna vibhūṣaṇāḥ
dvīpi carma uttarāsaṅgam niśācara balam babhau
gārdhra pattra dhvaja prāyam asthi bhūṣaṇa bhūṣitam
musala āyudha duṣprekṣyam nānā prāṇi mahā ravam
kiṃnarāḥ śveta vasanāḥ sita pattri patākinaḥ
matta ibha vāhana prāyāḥ tīkṣṇa tomara hetayaḥ
ketuḥ jala adhināthasya bhīma dhūmadhvaja analaḥ
padmarāga mahāratna viṭapam dhanadasya tu
dhvajam samucchritam bhāti gantu kāmam iva ambaram
vṛkeṇa kāṣṭha lohena yamasya āsīt mahā dhvajaḥ
rākṣasa īśasya ketoḥ vai pretasya mukham ābabhau
hema siṃha dhvajau devau candra arkau amita dyutī
kumbhena ratna citreṇa ketuḥ abhūt
hema mātaṃga racitam citra ratna pariṣkṛtam
dhvajam śatakratoḥ āsīt sita cāmara maṇḍitam
sa nāga yakṣa gandharvam aha uraga niśācarā
senā sā devarājasya durjayā bhuvanatraye
koṭayaḥ tāḥ trayastriṃśat deva deva nikāyinām
himācala ābhe sita karṇa cāmare suvarṇa padma amala sundara sraji
kṛta abhirāga ujjvala kuṅkuma aṅkure kapola līlā ali kadamba saṃkule
sthitaḥ tad airāvata nāma kuñjare mahā balaḥ citra vibhūṣaṇa ambaraḥ
viśāla vastra aṃśu vitāna bhūṣitaḥ prakīrṇa keyūra bhuja agra maṇḍalaḥ
sahasradṛś bandi sahasra saṃstutaḥ triviṣṭape śobhata pākaśāsanaḥ
turaṃga mātaṃga bala ogha saṃkulā sita ātapatra dhvaja rāji śālinī

original: camūśca sā durjayapattrisaṃtatā vibhāti nānāyudhayodhadustarā // MatsP_148.102 //
analyzed: camūḥ ca sā durjaya pattri saṃtatā vibhāti nānā āyudha yodha dustarā
matsyapurāṇa
sūtaḥ uvāca
sura asurāṇām sammardaḥ tasmin atyanta dāruṇe
tumulaḥ ti mahān āsīt senayoḥ ubhayoḥ api
garjatām deva daityānām śaṅkha bherī raveṇa ca

original: tūryāṇāṃ caiva nirghoṣair mātaṃgānāṃ ca bṛṃhitaiḥ // MatsP_149.2 //
analyzed: tūryāṇām ca eva nirghoṣaiḥ mātaṃgānām ca bṛṃhitaiḥ
hveṣatām haya vṛndānām ratha nemi svanena ca
jyā ghoṣeṇa ca śūrāṇām tumulaḥ ti mahān abhūt
samāsādya ubhaye sene paraspara jaya eṣiṇām
roṣeṇa ati parītānām tyakta jīvita cetasām
samāsādya tu te nyonyam prakrameṇa vilomataḥ
rathena āsakta pādātaḥ rathena ca turaṃgamaḥ
hastī padāti saṃyuktaḥ rathinā ca kvacid rathī
mātaṃgena aparaḥ hastī turaṃgaiḥ bahubhiḥ gajaḥ
padātiḥ ekaḥ bahubhiḥ gajaiḥ mattaiḥ ca yujyate
tatas prāsa aśani gadā bhindipāla paraśvadhaiḥ
śaktibhiḥ paṭṭiśaiḥ śūlaiḥ mudgaraiḥ kuṇapaiḥ gaḍaiḥ
cakraiḥ ca śaṅkubhiḥ ca eva tomaraiḥ aṅkuśaiḥ sitaiḥ
karṇi nālīka nārāca vatsadanta ardhacandrakaiḥ
bhallaiḥ ca śatapattraiḥ ca śukatuṇḍaiḥ ca nirmalaiḥ
vṛṣṭiḥ ati adbhuta ākārā gagane samadṛśyata
saṃpracchādya diśaḥ sarvāḥ tamaḥ mayam iva akarot
na prājñāyata te nyonyam tasmin tamasi saṃkule
alakṣyam visṛjantaḥ te heti saṃghātam uddhatam
patitam senayoḥ madhye nirīkṣante parasparam
tatas dhvajaiḥ bhujaiḥ chattraiḥ śirobhiḥ ca sa kuṇḍalaiḥ
gajaiḥ turaṃgaiḥ pādātaiḥ patadbhiḥ patitaiḥ api

original: ākāśasaraso bhraṣṭaiḥ paṅkajairiva bhūḥ stṛtā // MatsP_149.13 //
analyzed: ākāśa sarasaḥ bhraṣṭaiḥ paṅkajaiḥ iva bhūḥ stṛtā
bhagna dantāḥ bhinna kumbhāḥ chinna dīrgha mahā karāḥ

original: gajāḥ śalanibhāḥ petur dharaṇyāṃ rudhirasravāḥ // MatsP_149.14 //
analyzed: gajāḥ śala nibhāḥ petuḥ dharaṇyām rudhira sravāḥ
bhagna iṣādaṇḍa cakra akṣāḥ rathāḥ ca śakalīkṛtāḥ

original: petuḥ śakalatāṃ yātās turaṃgāśca sahasraśaḥ // MatsP_149.15 //
analyzed: petuḥ śakala tām yātāḥ turaṃgāḥ ca sahasraśas
tatas sṛghradaduḥ tārā pṛthivī samajāyata
nadyaḥ ca rudhira āvartāḥ harṣa dāḥ piśita āśinām
vetāla ākrīḍam abhavat tat saṃkula raṇa ajiram
matsyapurāṇa
sūtaḥ uvāca
atha grasanam ālokya yamaḥ krodha vimūrchitaḥ
vavarṣa śara varṣeṇa viśeṣeṇa agni varcasā
sa viddhaḥ bahubhiḥ bāṇaiḥ grasano tiparākramaḥ
kṛta pratikṛta ākāṅkṣī dhanuḥ ānamya bhairavam
śataiḥ pañcabhiḥ ati ugraiḥ śarāṇām yamam ardayat

original: sa vicintya yamo bāṇān grasanasyātipauruṣam // MatsP_150.3 //
analyzed: sa vicintya yamaḥ bāṇān grasanasya ati pauruṣam
bāṇa vṛṣṭibhiḥ ugrābhiḥ yamaḥ grasanam ardayat
kṛtānta śara vṛṣṭim tām viyati pratisarpiṇīm
cicheda śara varṣeṇa grasanaḥ dānava īśvaraḥ

original: viphalāṃ tāṃ samālokya yamastāṃ śarasaṃtatim // MatsP_150.5 //
analyzed: viphalām tām samālokya yamaḥ tām śara saṃtatim

original: sa vicintya śaravrātaṃ grasanasya rathaṃ prati /
analyzed: sa vicintya śara vrātam grasanasya ratham prati

original: cikṣepa mudgaraṃ ghoraṃ tarasā tasya cāntakaḥ // MatsP_150.6 //
analyzed: cikṣepa mudgaram ghoram tarasā tasya ca antakaḥ

original: sa taṃ mudgaram āyāntam utplutya gaganasthitam /
analyzed: sa tam mudgaram āyāntam utplutya gagana sthitam
jagrāha vāma hastena yāmyam dānava nandanaḥ

original: tameva mudgaraṃ gṛhya yamasya mahiṣaṃ ruṣā /
analyzed: tam eva mudgaram gṛhya yamasya mahiṣam ruṣā

original: pātayāmāsa vegena sa papāta mahītale // MatsP_150.8 //
analyzed: pātayāmāsa vegena sa papāta mahī tale
utplutya atha yamaḥ tasmāt mahiṣān niṣpatiṣyataḥ

original: prāsena tāḍayāmāsa grasanaṃ vadane dṛḍham // MatsP_150.9 //
analyzed: prāsena tāḍayāmāsa grasanam vadane dṛḍham
sa tu prāsa prahāreṇa mūrchitaḥ nyapatat bhuvi

original: grasanaṃ patitaṃ dṛṣṭvā jambho bhīmaparākramaḥ // MatsP_150.10 //
analyzed: grasanam patitam dṛṣṭvā jambhaḥ bhīma parākramaḥ
yamasya bhindipālena prahāram akarot hṛdi

original: yamastena prahāreṇa susrāva rudhiraṃ mukhāt // MatsP_150.11 //
analyzed: yamaḥ tena prahāreṇa susrāva rudhiram mukhāt
kṛtāntam marditam dṛṣṭvā gadā pāṇiḥ dhanādhipaḥ

original: vṛto yakṣāyutaśatair jambhaṃ pratyudyayau ruṣā // MatsP_150.12 //
analyzed: vṛtaḥ yakṣa ayuta śataiḥ jambham pratyudyayau ruṣā
jambhaḥ ruṣā tam āyāntam dānava anīka saṃvṛtaḥ

original: uvāca prājño vākyaṃ tu yathā snigdhena bhāṣitam // MatsP_150.13 //
analyzed: uvāca prājñaḥ vākyam tu yathā snigdhena bhāṣitam
grasanaḥ labdhasaṃjñaḥ yamasya prāhiṇot gadām
maṇi hema pariṣkārām gurvīm ari vimardinīm
tām apratarkyām samprekṣya gadām mahiṣavāhanaḥ
gadāyāḥ pratighāta artham jagat dalana bhairavam
daṇḍam mumoca kopena jvālā mālā samākulam

original: sa gadāṃ viyati prāpya rarāsāmbudharo yathā // MatsP_150.16 //
analyzed: sa gadām viyati prāpya rarāsa ambudharaḥ yathā
saṃghaṭṭam abhavat tābhyām śailābhyām iva duḥsaham
tābhyām niṣpeṣa nirhrāda jaḍīkṛta digantaram
jagat vyākula tām yātam pralaya āgama śaṅkayā
kṣaṇāt praśānta nirhrādam jvalat ulkā samācitam
niṣpeṣaṇe tayoḥ bhīmam abhūt gagana gocaram

original: nihatyātha gadāṃ daṇḍas tato grasanamūrdhani // MatsP_150.19 //
analyzed: nihatya atha gadām daṇḍaḥ tatas grasana mūrdhani
hṛtvā śriyam iva anarthaḥ durvṛttasya apatat dṛḍhaḥ

original: sa tu tena prahāreṇa dṛṣṭvā satimirā diśaḥ // MatsP_150.20 //
analyzed: sa tu tena prahāreṇa dṛṣṭvā sa timirāḥ diśaḥ
papāta bhūmau niḥsaṃjñaḥ bhūmi reṇu vibhūṣitaḥ
tatas hāhā ravaḥ ghoraḥ senayoḥ ubhayoḥ abhūt
tatas muhūrta mātreṇa grasanaḥ prāpya cetanām
apaśyat svām tanum dhvastām vilola ābharaṇa ambarām
sa ca api cintayāmāsa kṛte pratikṛti kriyām

original: madvidhe vastuni puṃsi prabhoḥ paribhavodayāt // MatsP_150.23 //
analyzed: madvidhe vastuni puṃsi prabhoḥ paribhava udayāt
mayi āśritāni sainyāni jite mayi vināśitā
asaṃbhāvitaḥ eva astu janaḥ svacchanda ceṣṭitaḥ
na tu vyartha śata udghuṣṭa saṃbhāvita dhanaḥ naraḥ

original: evaṃ saṃcintya vegena samuttasthau mahābalaḥ // MatsP_150.25 //
analyzed: evam saṃcintya vegena samuttasthau mahā balaḥ
mudgaram kāla daṇḍa ābham gṛhītvā giri saṃnibhaḥ
grasanaḥ ghora saṃkalpaḥ saṃdaṣṭa oṣṭha puṭa chadaḥ
rathena tvaritaḥ gacchan na āsasāda antakam raṇe

original: samāsādya yamaṃ yuddhe grasano bhrāmya mudgaram // MatsP_150.27 //
analyzed: samāsādya yamam yuddhe grasanaḥ bhrāmya mudgaram
vegena mahatā raudram cikṣepa yama mūrdhani

original: vilokya mudgaraṃ dīptaṃ yamaḥ saṃbhrāntalocanaḥ // MatsP_150.28 //
analyzed: vilokya mudgaram dīptam yamaḥ saṃbhrānta locanaḥ
vañcayāmāsa durdharṣam mudgaram sa mahā balaḥ
tasmin apasṛte dūram caṇḍānām bhīma karmaṇām

original: yāmyānāṃ kiṃkarāṇāṃ tu sahasraṃ niṣpipeṣa ha /
analyzed: yāmyānām kiṃkarāṇām tu sahasram niṣpipeṣa ha

original: tatastāṃ nihatāṃ dṛṣṭvā ghorāṃ kiṃkaravāhinīm // MatsP_150.30 //
analyzed: tatas tām nihatām dṛṣṭvā ghorām kiṃkara vāhinīm
agamat paramam kṣobham nānā praharaṇa udyataḥ

original: grasanastu samālokya tāṃ kiṃkaramayīṃ camūm // MatsP_150.31 //
analyzed: grasanaḥ tu samālokya tām kiṃkara mayīm camūm
mene yama sahasrāṇi sṛṣṭāni yama māyayā
nigrāhya grasanaḥ senām visṛjan astra vṛṣṭayaḥ
kalpa anta ghora saṃkāśaḥ babhūva krodha mūrchitaḥ
kāṃścid bibheda śūlena kāṃścid bāṇaiḥ ajihmagaiḥ
kāṃścid pipeṣa gadayā kān ca mudgara vṛṣṭibhiḥ
kecid prāsa prahāraiḥ ca dāruṇaiḥ tāḍitāḥ tadā
apare bahuśas tasya lalambuḥ bāhu maṇḍale
śilābhiḥ apare jaghnuḥ drumaiḥ anyaiḥ mahā ucchrayaiḥ
tasya apare tu gātreṣu daśanaiḥ api adaṃśayan

original: apare muṣṭibhiḥ pṛṣṭhaṃ kiṃkarāḥ praharanti ca // MatsP_150.36 //
analyzed: apare muṣṭibhiḥ pṛṣṭham kiṃkarāḥ praharanti ca
abhidrutaḥ tathā ghoraiḥ grasanaḥ krodha mūrchitaḥ

original: utsṛjya gātraṃ bhūpṛṣṭhe niṣpipeṣa sahasraśaḥ // MatsP_150.37 //
analyzed: utsṛjya gātram bhū pṛṣṭhe niṣpipeṣa sahasraśas
kāṃścid utthāya muṣṭibhiḥ jaghne kiṃkara saṃśrayān

original: sa tu kiṃkarayuddhena grasanaḥ śramamāptavān // MatsP_150.38 //
analyzed: sa tu kiṃkara yuddhena grasanaḥ śramam āptavān

original: tamālokya yamaḥ śrāntaṃ nihatāṃ ca svavāhinīm /
analyzed: tam ālokya yamaḥ śrāntam nihatām ca sva vāhinīm
ājagāma samudyamya daṇḍam mahiṣavāhanaḥ
grasanaḥ tu samāyāntam ājaghne gadayā urasi
a cintayitvā tat karma grasanasya antakaḥ rihā
jaghne rathasya mūrdhan yān vyāghrān daṇḍena kopanaḥ

original: sa ratho daṇḍamathitair vyāghrairardhair vikṛṣyate // MatsP_150.41 //
analyzed: sa rathaḥ daṇḍa mathitaiḥ vyāghraiḥ ardhaiḥ vikṛṣyate
saṃśayaḥ puruṣasya iva cittam daityasya tad ratham

original: samutsṛjya rathaṃ daityaḥ padātirdharaṇīṃ gataḥ // MatsP_150.42 //
analyzed: samutsṛjya ratham daityaḥ padātiḥ dharaṇīm gataḥ
yamam bhujābhyām ādāya yodhayāmāsa dānavaḥ
yamaḥ pi śastrāṇi utsṛjya bāhu yuddheṣu avartata
grasanaḥ kaṭi vastraiḥ tu yamam guhya bala uddhataḥ
bhrāmayāmāsa vegena pracittam iva sambhramaḥ
yamaḥ pi kaṇṭhe vaṣṭabhya daityam bāhu yugena tu
vegena bhrāmayāmāsa samutkṛṣya mahī talāt
tatas muṣṭibhiḥ anyonyam nirdayau tau nijaghnatuḥ
daitya indrasya atikāya tvāt tatas śrānta bhujaḥ yamaḥ
skandhe nidhāya daityasya mukham viśrāntim aicchata
tam ālakṣya tatas daityaḥ śrāntam antakam ojasā
niṣpipeṣa mahī pṛṣṭhe bahuśas pārṣṇi pāṇibhiḥ

original: yāvadyamasya vadanāt susrāva rudhiraṃ bahu // MatsP_150.48 //
analyzed: yāvat yamasya vadanāt susrāva rudhiram bahu

original: nirjīvitaṃ yamaṃ dṛṣṭvā tataḥ saṃtyajya dānavaḥ /
analyzed: nirjīvitam yamam dṛṣṭvā tatas saṃtyajya dānavaḥ

original: jayaṃ prāpyoddhataṃ daityo nādaṃ muktvā mahāsvanaḥ // MatsP_150.49 //
analyzed: jayam prāpya uddhatam daityaḥ nādam muktvā mahā svanaḥ
svayam sainyam samāsādya tasthau giriḥ iva acalaḥ
dhanādhipasya jambhena sāyakaiḥ marma bhedibhiḥ
diśaḥ varuddhāḥ kruddhena sainyam ca asya nikṛntitam
tatas krodha parītaḥ tu dhaneśaḥ jambha dānavam
hṛdi vivyādha bāṇānām sahasreṇa agni varcasām

original: sārathiṃ ca śatenājau dhvajaṃ daśabhireva ca // MatsP_150.52 //
analyzed: sārathim ca śatena ājau dhvajam daśabhiḥ eva ca
hastau ca pañca saptatyā mārgaṇaiḥ daśabhiḥ dhanuḥ
mārgaṇaiḥ barhi pattra aṅgaiḥ taila dhautaiḥ ajihmagaiḥ

original: siṃhamekena taṃ tīkṣṇair vivyādha daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ /
analyzed: siṃham ekena tam tīkṣṇaiḥ vivyādha daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
jambhaḥ tu karma tat dṛṣṭvā dhaneśasya ati duṣkaram
hṛdi dhairyam samālambya kiṃcid saṃtrasta mānasaḥ
jagrāha niśitān bāṇām śatru marma vibhedinaḥ
ākarṇa ākṛṣṭa cāpaḥ tu jambhaḥ krodha pariplutaḥ

original: vivyādha dhanadaṃ tīkṣṇaiḥ śarairvakṣasi dānavaḥ // MatsP_150.56 //
analyzed: vivyādha dhanadam tīkṣṇaiḥ śaraiḥ vakṣasi dānavaḥ
sārathim ca asya bāṇena dṛḍhena abhyahanat hṛdi
cicheda jyām atha ekena taila dhautena dānavaḥ
tatas tu niśitaiḥ bāṇaiḥ dāruṇaiḥ marma bhedibhiḥ
vivyādha urasi vitteśam daśabhiḥ krūra karma kṛt

original: mohaṃ paramato gacchan dṛḍhaviddho hi vittapaḥ /
analyzed: moham paramatas gacchan dṛḍha viddhaḥ hi vittapaḥ
sa kṣaṇāt dhairyam ālambya dhanuḥ ākṛṣya bhairavam
kiran bāṇa sahasrāṇi niśitāni dhanādhipaḥ

original: diśaḥ khaṃ vidiśo bhūmīr anīkānyasurasya ca // MatsP_150.60 //
analyzed: diśaḥ kham vidiśaḥ bhūmīḥ anīkāni asurasya ca
pūrayāmāsa vegena saṃchādya ravi maṇḍalam
jambhaḥ pi param ekaikam śaraiḥ bahubhiḥ āhave
cicheda laghu saṃdhānaḥ dhaneśasya ati pauruṣāt

original: tato dhaneśaḥ saṃkruddho dānavendrasya karmaṇā // MatsP_150.62 //
analyzed: tatas dhaneśaḥ saṃkruddhaḥ dānava indrasya karmaṇā
vyadhamat tasya sainyāni nānā sāyaka vṛṣṭibhiḥ

original: taddṛṣṭvā duṣkṛtaṃ karma dhanādhyakṣasya dānavaḥ // MatsP_150.63 //
analyzed: tat dṛṣṭvā duṣkṛtam karma dhanādhyakṣasya dānavaḥ
gṛhītvā mudgaram bhīmam āyasam hema bhūṣitam
dhanada anucarān yakṣān niṣpipeṣa sahasraśas
te vadhyamānāḥ daityena muñcantaḥ bhairavān ravān

original: rathaṃ dhanapateḥ sarve parivārya vyavasthitāḥ // MatsP_150.65 //
analyzed: ratham dhanapateḥ sarve parivārya vyavasthitāḥ
dṛṣṭvā tān arditān devaḥ śūlam jagrāha dāruṇam
tena daitya sahasrāṇi sūdayāmāsa sa tvaraḥ
kṣīyamāṇeṣu daityeṣu dānavaḥ krodha mūrchitaḥ

original: jagrāha paraśuṃ daityo mardanaṃ daityavidviṣām // MatsP_150.67 //
analyzed: jagrāha paraśum daityaḥ mardanam daitya vidviṣām
sa tena śita dhāreṇa dhanabhartuḥ mahā ratham

original: cicheda śataśo daityo hy ākhuḥ snigdhamivāmbaram // MatsP_150.68 //
analyzed: cicheda śataśas daityaḥ hi ākhuḥ snigdham iva ambaram
padātiḥ atha vitteśaḥ gadām ādāya bhairavīm
mahā āhava vimardeṣu dṛpta śatru vināśinīm
adhṛṣyām sarva bhūtānām bahu varṣa gaṇa arcitām
nānā candana digdha aṅgām divya puṣpa vivāsitām
nirmala ayaḥ mayīm gurvīm amoghām hema bhūṣaṇām

original: cikṣepa mūrdhni saṃkruddho jambhasya tu dhanādhipaḥ // MatsP_150.71 //
analyzed: cikṣepa mūrdhni saṃkruddhaḥ jambhasya tu dhanādhipaḥ
āyāntīm tām samālokya taḍit saṃghāta maṇḍitām

original: daityo gadābhighātārthaṃ śastravṛṣṭiṃ mumoca ha // MatsP_150.72 //
analyzed: daityaḥ gadā abhighāta artham śastra vṛṣṭim mumoca ha
cakrāṇi kuṇapān prāsān bhuśuṇḍīḥ paṭṭiśān api
hema keyūra naddhābhyām bāhubhyām caṇḍa vikramaḥ
vyarthīkṛtya tu tān sarvān āyudhān daitya vakṣasi
prasphurantī papāta ugrā mahā ulkā iva adri kandare
sa tayā abhihataḥ gāḍham papāta ratha kūbare
srotobhiḥ ca asya rudhiram susrāva gata cetasaḥ

original: jambhaṃ tu nihataṃ matvā kujambho bhairavasvanaḥ /
analyzed: jambham tu nihatam matvā kujambhaḥ bhairava svanaḥ
dhanādhipasya saṃkruddhaḥ vākyena atīva kopitaḥ

original: cakre bāṇamayaṃ jālaṃ dikṣu yakṣādhipasya tu /
analyzed: cakre bāṇa mayam jālam dikṣu yakṣādhipasya tu

original: cicheda bāṇajālaṃ tad ardhacandraiḥ śitaistataḥ // MatsP_150.77 //
analyzed: cicheda bāṇa jālam tat ardhacandraiḥ śitaiḥ tatas

original: mumoca śaravṛṣṭiṃ tu tasmai yakṣādhipo balī /
analyzed: mumoca śara vṛṣṭim tu tasmai yakṣādhipaḥ balī

original: sa taṃ daityaḥ śaravrātaṃ cicheda niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ // MatsP_150.78 //
analyzed: sa tam daityaḥ śara vrātam cicheda niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ

original: vyarthīkṛtāṃ tu tāṃ dṛṣṭvā śaravṛṣṭiṃ dhanādhipaḥ /
analyzed: vyarthīkṛtām tu tām dṛṣṭvā śara vṛṣṭim dhanādhipaḥ
śaktim jagrāha durdharṣām hema ghaṇṭā aṭṭahāsinīm
bāhunā ratna keyūra kānti saṃtāna hāsinā

original: sa tāṃ nirūpya vegena kujambhāya mumoca ha // MatsP_150.80 //
analyzed: sa tām nirūpya vegena kujambhāya mumoca ha
sā kujambhasya hṛdayam dārayāmāsa dāruṇam
vittehā su alpa sattvasya puruṣasya iva bhāvitā
atha asya hṛdayam bhittvā jagāma dharaṇī talam
tatas muhūrtāt asvasthaḥ dānavaḥ dāruṇa ākṛtiḥ
jagrāha paṭṭiśam daityaḥ prāṃśum śita śilā mukham

original: sa tena paṭṭiśenājau dhanadasya stanāntaram // MatsP_150.83 //
analyzed: sa tena paṭṭiśena ājau dhanadasya stanāntaram
vākyena tīkṣṇa rūpeṇa marma antara visarpiṇā
nirbibheda abhijātasya hṛdayam durjanaḥ yathā
tena paṭṭiśa ghātena dhaneśaḥ parimūrchitaḥ

original: nipapāta rathopasthe jarjaro dhūrvaho yathā // MatsP_150.85 //
analyzed: nipapāta rathopasthe jarjaraḥ dhūrvahaḥ yathā

original: tathāgataṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā dhaneśaṃ naravāhanam /
analyzed: tathāgatam tu tam dṛṣṭvā dhaneśam naravāhanam
abhidudrāva vegena kujambham bhīma vikramam

original: atha dṛṣṭvā tu durdharṣaṃ kujambho rākṣaseśvaram // MatsP_150.87 //
analyzed: atha dṛṣṭvā tu durdharṣam kujambhaḥ rākṣaseśvaram
codayāmāsa sainyāni rākṣasa indra vadham prati

original: sa dṛṣṭvā coditāṃ senāṃ bhallanānāstrabhīṣaṇām // MatsP_150.88 //
analyzed: sa dṛṣṭvā coditām senām bhalla nānā astra bhīṣaṇām
rathāt āplutya vegena bhūṣaṇa dyuti bhāsvaraḥ
khaḍgena kamalāni iva vikośena ambara tviṣā
cicheda ripu vaktrāṇi vicitrāṇi samantataḥ
tiryak pṛṣṭham adhas ca ūrdhvam dīrgha bāhuḥ mahā asinā
saṃdaṣṭa oṣṭha puṭa āṭopa bhrukuṭī vikaṭa ānanaḥ
pracaṇḍa kopa rakta akṣaḥ nyakṛntat dānavān raṇe
tatas niḥśeṣita prāyām vilokya svām anīkinīm
muktvā kujambhaḥ dhanadam rākṣasa indram abhidravan
jambhaḥ tu dhanādhyakṣa padānugān

original: jīvagrāhānsa jagrāha baddhvā pāśaiḥ sahasraśaḥ // MatsP_150.93 //
analyzed: jīva grāhān sa jagrāha baddhvā pāśaiḥ sahasraśas

original: mūrtimanti tu ratnāni vividhāni ca dānavāḥ /
analyzed: mūrtimanti tu ratnāni vividhāni ca dānavāḥ

original: vāhanāni ca divyāni vimānāni sahasraśaḥ // MatsP_150.94 //
analyzed: vāhanāni ca divyāni vimānāni sahasraśas
dhaneśaḥ tām avasthām vilokya tu
niḥśvasan dīrgham uṣṇam ca roṣāt tāmra vilocanaḥ

original: dhyātvāstraṃ gāruḍaṃ divyaṃ bāṇaṃ saṃdhāya kārmuke /
analyzed: dhyātvā astram gāruḍam divyam bāṇam saṃdhāya kārmuke

original: mumoca dānavānīke taṃ bāṇaṃ śatrudāraṇam // MatsP_150.96 //
analyzed: mumoca dānava anīke tam bāṇam śatru dāraṇam
prathamam kārmukāt tasya niśceruḥ dhūma rājayaḥ
anantaram sphuliṅgānām koṭayaḥ dīpta varcasām
tatas jvālā ākulam vyoma cakāra astram samantataḥ

original: tataḥ krameṇa durvāraṃ nānārūpaṃ tadābhavat // MatsP_150.98 //
analyzed: tatas krameṇa durvāram nānā rūpam tadā abhavat
amūrtaḥ ca abhavat lokaḥ hi andhakāra samāvṛtaḥ

original: tato 'ntarikṣe śaṃsanti tejaste tu pariṣkṛtam // MatsP_150.99 //
analyzed: tatas ntarikṣe śaṃsanti tejaḥ te tu pariṣkṛtam
kujambhaḥ tat samālocya dānavaḥ tiparākramaḥ
abhidudrāva vegena padātiḥ dhanadam nadan
atha abhimukham āyāntam daityam dṛṣṭvā dhanādhipaḥ
babhūva sambhrama āviṣṭaḥ palāyana parāyaṇaḥ
tatas palāyataḥ tasya mukuṭam ratna maṇḍitam
papāta bhū tale dīptam ravi bimbam iva ambarāt
śūrāṇām abhijātānām bhartari apasṛte raṇāt
martum saṃgrāma śirasi yuktam tad bhūṣaṇa agratas
iti vyavasya durdharṣāḥ nānā śastra astra pāṇayaḥ

original: yuyutsavaḥ sthitā yakṣā mukuṭaṃ parivārya tam // MatsP_150.104 //
analyzed: yuyutsavaḥ sthitāḥ yakṣāḥ mukuṭam parivārya tam
abhimāna dhanāḥ vīrāḥ dhanadasya padānugāḥ
tān amarṣāt ca samprekṣya dānavaḥ caṇḍa pauruṣaḥ
bhuśuṇḍīm bhairava ākārām gṛhītvā śaila gauravām
rakṣiṇaḥ mukuṭasya atha niṣpipeṣa niśācarān
tān pramathya atha danujaḥ mukuṭam tat svake rathe
samāropya amara ripuḥ jitvā dhanadam āhave

original: dhanāni ratnāni ca mūrtimanti tathā nidhānāni śarīriṇaśca /
analyzed: dhanāni ratnāni ca mūrtimanti tathā nidhānāni śarīriṇaḥ ca

original: ādāya sarvāṇi jagāma daityo jambhaḥ svasainyaṃ danujendrasiṃhaḥ /
analyzed: ādāya sarvāṇi jagāma daityaḥ jambhaḥ sva sainyam danuja indra siṃhaḥ

original: dhanādhipo vai vinikīrṇamūrdhajo jagāma dīnaḥ surabharturantikam // MatsP_150.108 //
analyzed: dhanādhipaḥ vai vinikīrṇa mūrdhajaḥ jagāma dīnaḥ sura bhartuḥ antikam
kujambhena atha saṃsaktaḥ rajanīcara nandanaḥ
māyām amoghām āśritya tāmasīm rākṣasa īśvaraḥ
mohayāmāsa daitya indram jagat kṛtvā tamaḥ mayam

original: tato viphalanetrāṇi dānavānāṃ balāni tu // MatsP_150.110 //
analyzed: tatas viphala netrāṇi dānavānām balāni tu

original: na śekuścalitaṃ tatra padādapi padaṃ tadā /
analyzed: na śekuḥ calitam tatra padāt api padam tadā
tatas nānā astra varṣeṇa dānavānām mahā camūm
jaghāna ghana nīhāra timira ātura vāhanām
vadhyamāneṣu daityeṣu kujambhe mūḍha cetasi
mahiṣaḥ dānava indraḥ tu kalpa anta ambhoda saṃnibhaḥ
astram cakāra sāvitram ulkā saṃghāta maṇḍitam
vijṛmbhati atha sāvitre parama astre pratāpini
praṇāśam agamat tīvram tamaḥ ghoram anantaram
tatas stram visphuliṅga aṅkam tamaḥ kṛtsnam vyanāśayat
praphulla aruṇa padma ogham śaradi iva amalam saraḥ
tatas tamasi saṃśānte daitya indrāḥ prāpta cakṣuṣaḥ

original: cakruḥ krūreṇa manasā devānīkaiḥ sahādbhutam // MatsP_150.116 //
analyzed: cakruḥ krūreṇa manasā deva anīkaiḥ saha adbhutam
śastraiḥ amarṣāt nirmuktaiḥ bhujaṃga astram vinoditam
athā ādāya dhanuḥ ghoram iṣūn ca āśīviṣa upamān
kujambhaḥ dhāvata kṣiptam rakṣaḥ rāja balam prati
rākṣasa indraḥ tam āyāntam vilokya sa padānugaḥ
vivyādha niśitaiḥ bāṇaiḥ krūra āśīviṣa bhīṣaṇaiḥ

original: tadādānaṃ ca saṃdhānaṃ na mokṣaścāpi lakṣyate // MatsP_150.119 //
analyzed: tad ādānam ca saṃdhānam na mokṣaḥ ca api lakṣyate
cicheda asya śara vrātān sva śaraiḥ atilāghavāt
dhvajam parama tīkṣṇena citrakarmā amara dviṣaḥ
sārathim ca asya bhallena rathanīḍāt apātayat

original: kujambhaḥ karma taddṛṣṭvā rākṣasendrasya saṃyuge // MatsP_150.121 //
analyzed: kujambhaḥ karma tat dṛṣṭvā rākṣasa indrasya saṃyuge
roṣa rakta īkṣaṇa yutaḥ rathāt āplutya dānavaḥ
khaḍgam jagrāha vegena śarad ambara nirmalam
carma ca udaya khaṇḍa indu daśakena vibhūṣitam
abhyadravat raṇe daityaḥ rakṣaḥ dhipatim ojasā
tam rakṣaḥ dhipatiḥ prāptam mudgareṇa ahanat hṛdi

original: sa tu tena prahāreṇa kṣīṇaḥ saṃbhrāntamānasaḥ // MatsP_150.124 //
analyzed: sa tu tena prahāreṇa kṣīṇaḥ saṃbhrānta mānasaḥ
tasthau aceṣṭaḥ danujaḥ yathā dhīraḥ dharādharaḥ
sa muhūrtam samāśvastaḥ dānava indraḥ ti durjayaḥ
ratham āruhya jagrāha rakṣaḥ vāma kareṇa tu

original: keśeṣu nirṛtiṃ daityo jānunākramya dhiṣṭhitam // MatsP_150.126 //
analyzed: keśeṣu nirṛtim daityaḥ jānunā ākramya dhiṣṭhitam
tatas khaḍgena ca śiraḥ chettum aicchat amarṣaṇaḥ
tasmin tad antare devaḥ varuṇaḥ pāṃpatiḥ drutam
pāśena dānava indrasya babandha ca bhuja dvayam
tatas baddha bhujam daityam viphalīkṛta pauruṣam
tāḍayāmāsa gadayā dayām utsṛjya pāśabhṛt

original: sa tu tena prahāreṇa srotobhiḥ kṣatajaṃ vaman // MatsP_150.129 //
analyzed: sa tu tena prahāreṇa srotobhiḥ kṣatajam vaman
dadhāra rūpam meghasya vidyut mālā latā āvṛtam
tad avasthā gatam dṛṣṭvā kujambham mahiṣa asuraḥ
vyāvṛtta vadane gādhe grastum aicchat surau ubhau
nirṛtim varuṇam ca eva tīkṣṇa daṃṣṭra utkaṭa ānanaḥ
tau abhiprāyam ālakṣya tasya daityasya dūṣitam
tyaktvā ratha patham bhītau mahiṣasya ati raṃhasā

original: bhṛśaṃ drutau javād digbhyām ubhābhyāṃ bhayavihvalau /
analyzed: bhṛśam drutau javāt digbhyām ubhābhyām bhaya vihvalau

original: jagāma nirṛtiḥ kṣipraṃ śaraṇaṃ pākaśāsanam // MatsP_150.133 //
analyzed: jagāma nirṛtiḥ kṣipram śaraṇam pākaśāsanam
kruddhaḥ tu mahiṣaḥ daityaḥ varuṇam samabhidrutaḥ
tam antaka mukha āsaktam ālokya himavat dyutiḥ
cakre soma astra niḥsṛṣṭam hima saṃghāta kaṇṭakam
vāyavyam ca astram atulam candraḥ cakre dvitīyakam

original: vāyunā tena candreṇa saṃśuṣkeṇa himena ca /
analyzed: vāyunā tena candreṇa saṃśuṣkeṇa himena ca

original: vyathitā dānavāḥ sarve śītocchinnā vipauruṣāḥ // MatsP_150.136 //
analyzed: vyathitāḥ dānavāḥ sarve śīta ucchinnāḥ vipauruṣāḥ
na śekuḥ calitum padbhyām na astrāṇi ādātum eva ca
mahā hima nipātena śastraiḥ candra pracoditaiḥ
gātrāṇi asura sainyānām adahyanta samantataḥ
mahiṣaḥ niṣprayatnaḥ tu śītena akampita ānanaḥ
kakṣau ālambya pāṇibhyām upaviṣṭaḥ hi adhomukhaḥ

original: sarve te niṣpratīkārā daityāścandramasā jitāḥ // MatsP_150.139 //
analyzed: sarve te niṣpratīkārāḥ daityāḥ candramasā jitāḥ
raṇa icchām dūratas tyaktvā tasthuḥ te jīvita arthinaḥ
tatra abravīt kālanemiḥ daityān kopena dīpitaḥ

original: bho bhoḥ śṛṅgāriṇaḥ śarāḥ sarve śastrāstrapāragāḥ /
analyzed: bho bhoḥ śṛṅgāriṇaḥ śarāḥ sarve śastra astra pāragāḥ
ekaikaḥ pi jagat sarvam śaktaḥ tulayitum bhujaiḥ
ekaikaḥ pi kṣamaḥ grastum jagat sarvam carācaram

original: ekaikasyāpi paryāptā na sarve 'pi divaukasaḥ // MatsP_150.142 //
analyzed: ekaikasya api paryāptāḥ na sarve divaukasaḥ
kalām pūrayitum yatnāt ṣoḍaśīm ati vikramāḥ
kim prayātāḥ ca tiṣṭhadhvam samare mara nirjitāḥ
na yuktam etat śūrāṇām viśeṣāt daitya janmanām
rājā ca antaritaḥ smākam tārakaḥ loka mārakaḥ
viratānām raṇāt asmāt kruddhaḥ prāṇān hariṣyati
śītena naṣṭa śrutayaḥ bhraṣṭa vāc pāṭavāḥ tathā
mūkāḥ tadā abhavan daityāḥ
tān dṛṣṭvā naṣṭa cetaskān daityān śītena sāditān
matvā kāla kṣamam kāryam kālanemiḥ mahā asuraḥ

original: āśritya dānavīṃ māyāṃ vitatya svaṃ mahāvapuḥ // MatsP_150.147 //
analyzed: āśritya dānavīm māyām vitatya svam mahā vapuḥ

original: pūrayāmāsa gaganaṃ diśo vidiśa eva ca /
analyzed: pūrayāmāsa gaganam diśaḥ vidiśaḥ eva ca
nirmame dānava indra īśaḥ śarīre bhāskara ayutam
diśaḥ ca māyayā caṇḍaiḥ pūrayāmāsa pāvakaiḥ
tatas jvālā ākulam sarvam trailokyam abhavat kṣaṇāt
tena jvālā samūhena himāṃśuḥ agamat śamam

original: tataḥ krameṇa vibhraṣṭaṃ śītadurdinam ābabhau // MatsP_150.150 //
analyzed: tatas krameṇa vibhraṣṭam śīta durdinam ābabhau
tat balam dānava indrāṇām māyayā kālaneminaḥ
tat dṛṣṭvā dānava anīkam labdha saṃjñam divākaraḥ
uvāca aruṇam udbhrāntaḥ kopāt loka eka locanaḥ
divākaraḥ uvāca
naya aruṇa ratham śīghram kālanemi rathaḥ yatas
vimardaḥ tatra viṣamaḥ bhavitā śūra saṃkṣayaḥ
jitaḥ eṣa śaśāṅko yat balam vayam āśritāḥ
iti uktaḥ codayāmāsa ratham garuḍa pūrvajaḥ
prayatna vidhṛtaiḥ aśvaiḥ sita cāmara mālibhiḥ

original: jagaddīpo 'tha bhagavāñ jagrāha vitataṃ dhanuḥ // MatsP_150.154 //
analyzed: jagaddīpaḥ tha bhagavān jagrāha vitatam dhanuḥ
śarau ca dvau mahābhāgaḥ divyau āśīviṣa dyutī

original: saṃcārāstreṇa saṃdhāya bāṇamekaṃ sasarja saḥ // MatsP_150.155 //
analyzed: saṃcāra astreṇa saṃdhāya bāṇam ekam sasarja saḥ
dvitīyam indrajālena yojitam pramumoca ha
saṃcāra astreṇa rūpāṇām kṣaṇāt cakre viparyayam

original: devānāṃ dānavaṃ rūpaṃ dānavānāṃ ca daivikam /
analyzed: devānām dānavam rūpam dānavānām ca daivikam
matvā surān svakān eva jaghne ghora astra lāghavāt
kālanemiḥ ruṣā āviṣṭaḥ kṛtāntaḥ iva saṃkṣaye
kāṃścid khaḍgena tīkṣṇena kāṃścid nārāca vṛṣṭibhiḥ

original: asambhrānto raṇe viṣṇur atha jagrāha kārmukam /
