śarān ca āśīviṣa ākārān taila dhautān ajihmagān
tatas daityān tān ākarṇa ākṛṣṭa kārmukaḥ

original: abhyadravadraṇe kruddho daityānīke tu pauruṣāt // MatsP_151.11 //
analyzed: abhyadravat raṇe kruddhaḥ daitya anīke tu pauruṣāt
nimim vivyādha viṃśatyā bāṇānām agni varcasām

original: mathanaṃ daśabhirbāṇaiḥ śumbhaṃ pañcabhireva ca // MatsP_151.12 //
analyzed: mathanam daśabhiḥ bāṇaiḥ śumbham pañcabhiḥ eva ca
ekena mahiṣam kruddhaḥ vivyādha urasi pattriṇā
jambham dvādaśabhiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ sarvān ca ekaikaśas ṣṭabhiḥ
tasya tat lāghavam dṛṣṭvā dānavāḥ krodha mūrchitāḥ
nardamānāḥ prayatnena cakruḥ atyadbhutam raṇam
cicheda atha dhanuḥ viṣṇoḥ nimiḥ bhallena dānavaḥ

original: saṃdhyamānaṃ śaraṃ haste cicheda mahiṣāsuraḥ // MatsP_151.15 //
analyzed: śaram haste cicheda mahiṣa asuraḥ
pīḍayāmāsa garuḍam jambhaḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ tu sāyakaiḥ
bhujam tasya ahanat gāḍham śumbhaḥ bhūdhara saṃnibhaḥ

original: chinne dhanuṣi govindo gadāṃ jagrāha bhīṣaṇām /
analyzed: chinne dhanuṣi govindaḥ gadām jagrāha bhīṣaṇām

original: tāṃ prāhiṇotsa vegena mathanāya mahāhave // MatsP_151.17 //
analyzed: tām prāhiṇot sa vegena mathanāya mahā āhave
tām aprāptām nimiḥ bāṇaiḥ cicheda tilaśas raṇe

original: tāṃ nāśamāgatāṃ dṛṣṭvā hīnāgre prārthanāmiva // MatsP_151.18 //
analyzed: tām nāśam āgatām dṛṣṭvā hīna agre prārthanām iva
jagrāha mudgaram ghoram divya ratna pariṣkṛtam

original: taṃ mumocātha vegena nimimuddiśya dānavam // MatsP_151.19 //
analyzed: tam mumoca atha vegena nimim uddiśya dānavam

original: tam āyāntaṃ viyatyeva trayo daityā nyavārayan /
analyzed: tam āyāntam viyati eva trayaḥ daityāḥ nyavārayan

original: gadayā jambhadaityastu grasanaḥ paṭṭiśena tu // MatsP_151.20 //
analyzed: gadayā jambha daityaḥ tu grasanaḥ paṭṭiśena tu
śaktyā ca mahiṣaḥ daityaḥ sva pakṣa jaya kāṅkṣayā

original: nirākṛtaṃ tamālokya durjane praṇayaṃ yathā // MatsP_151.21 //
analyzed: nirākṛtam tam ālokya durjane praṇayam yathā
jagrāha śaktim ugra agrām aṣṭa ghaṇṭā utkaṭa svanām
jambhāya tām samuddiśya prāhiṇot raṇa bhīṣaṇaḥ
tām ambara sthām jagrāha gajaḥ dānava nandanaḥ

original: gṛhītāṃ tāṃ samālokya śikṣāmiva vivekibhiḥ // MatsP_151.23 //
analyzed: gṛhītām tām samālokya śikṣām iva vivekibhiḥ
dṛḍham bhāra saham sāram anyat ādāya kārmukam
raudra astram abhisaṃdhāya tasmin bāṇam mumoca ha
tatas stra tejasā sarvam vyāptam lokam carācaram

original: tato bāṇamayaṃ sarvam ākāśaṃ samadṛśyata // MatsP_151.25 //
analyzed: tatas bāṇa mayam sarvam ākāśam samadṛśyata
bhūḥ diśaḥ vidiśaḥ ca eva bāṇa jāla mayāḥ babhuḥ
dṛṣṭvā tad astra māhātmyam suraḥ
brāhmam astram cakāra asau sarva astra vinivāraṇam

original: tena tatpraśamaṃ yātaṃ raudrāstraṃ lokaghasmaram // MatsP_151.27 //
analyzed: tena tat praśamam yātam raudra astram loka ghasmaram
astre pratihate tasmin viṣṇuḥ dānava sūdanaḥ
kāladaṇḍa astram akarot sarva loka bhayaṃkaram
saṃdhīyamāne tasmin tu mārutaḥ paruṣaḥ vavau

original: cakampe ca mahī devī daityā bhinnadhiyo 'bhavan // MatsP_151.29 //
analyzed: cakampe ca mahī devī daityāḥ bhinna dhiyaḥ bhavan
tat astram ugram dṛṣṭvā tu dānavāḥ yuddha durmadāḥ
cakruḥ astrāṇi divyāni nānā rūpāṇi saṃyuge

original: nārāyaṇāstraṃ grasano gṛhītvā cakraṃ nimiḥ svāstravaraṃ mumoca /
analyzed: nārāyaṇa astram grasanaḥ gṛhītvā cakram nimiḥ sva astra varam mumoca

original: aiṣīkamastraṃ ca cakāra jambhas tatkāladaṇḍāstranivāraṇāya // MatsP_151.31 //
analyzed: aiṣīkam astram ca cakāra jambhaḥ tad kāladaṇḍa astra nivāraṇāya

original: yāvanna saṃdhyā na daśāṃ prayānti daityeśvarāścāstranivāraṇāya /
analyzed: yāvat na saṃdhyā na daśām prayānti daitya īśvarāḥ ca astra nivāraṇāya

original: tāvatkṣaṇenaiva jaghāna koṭīr daityeśvarāṇāṃ sagajānsahāśvān // MatsP_151.32 //
analyzed: tāvat kṣaṇena eva jaghāna koṭīḥ daitya īśvarāṇām sa gajān saha aśvān
anantaram śāntam abhūt tat astram daitya astra yogeṇa tu kāla daṇḍam

original: śāntaṃ tadālokya hariḥ svaśastraṃ svavikrame manyuparītamūrtiḥ // MatsP_151.33 //
analyzed: śāntam tat ālokya hariḥ sva śastram sva vikrame manyu parīta mūrtiḥ
jagrāha cakram tapana ayuta ābham ugra āram ātmānam iva dvitīyam
cikṣepa senāpataye kaṇṭha sthalam vajra kaṭhoram ugram

original: cakraṃ tadākāśagataṃ vilokya sarvātmanā daityavarāḥ svavīryaiḥ /
analyzed: cakram tat ākāśa gatam vilokya sarva ātmanā daitya varāḥ sva vīryaiḥ

original: nāśaknuvanvārayituṃ pracaṇḍaṃ daivaṃ yathā karma mudhā prapannam // MatsP_151.35 //
analyzed: na aśaknuvan vārayitum pracaṇḍam daivam yathā karma mudhā prapannam

original: tamapratarkyaṃ janayannajayyaṃ cakraṃ papāta grasanasya kaṇṭhe /
analyzed: tam apratarkyam janayan ajayyam cakram papāta grasanasya kaṇṭhe

original: dvidhā tu kṛtvā grasanasya kaṇṭhaṃ tadraktadhārāruṇaghoranābhi /
analyzed: dvidhā tu kṛtvā grasanasya kaṇṭham tat rakta dhārā aruṇa ghora nābhi

original: jagāma bhūyo 'pi janārdanasya pāṇiṃ pravṛddhānalatulyadīpti // MatsP_151.36 //
analyzed: jagāma bhūyas pi janārdanasya pāṇim pravṛddha anala tulya dīpti
matsyapurāṇa
tasmin vinihate daitye grasane loka nāyake
nirmaryādam ayudhyanta hariṇā saha dānavāḥ
paṭṭiśaiḥ muśalaiḥ pāśaiḥ gadābhiḥ kuṇapaiḥ api

original: tīkṣṇānanaiśca nārācaiś cakraiḥ śaktibhireva ca // MatsP_152.2 //
analyzed: tīkṣṇa ānanaiḥ ca nārācaiḥ cakraiḥ śaktibhiḥ eva ca
tān astrān dānavaiḥ muktān citra yodhī janārdanaḥ
ekaikam śataśas cakre bāṇaiḥ agni śikhā upamaiḥ
tatas kṣīṇa āyudha prāṇāḥ dānavāḥ bhrānta cetasaḥ
astrāṇi ādātum abhavan asamarthāḥ yadā raṇe
tadā mṛtaiḥ gajaiḥ aśvaiḥ janārdanam ayodhayan
samantāt koṭiśas daityāḥ sarvatas pratyayodhayan
bahu kṛtvā vapuḥ viṣṇuḥ kiṃcid śānta bhujaḥ bhavat

original: uvāca ca garutmantaṃ tasminsutumule raṇe // MatsP_152.6 //
analyzed: uvāca ca garutmantam tasmin su tumule raṇe
garutman kaccit aśrāntaḥ tvam asmin api sāmpratam

original: yadyaśrānto 'si tadyāhi mathanasya rathaṃ prati // MatsP_152.7 //
analyzed: yadi a śrāntaḥ si tat yāhi mathanasya ratham prati
śrāntaḥ syatha muhūrtam tvam raṇāt apasṛtaḥ bhava
iti uktaḥ garuḍaḥ tena viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā
āsasāda raṇe daityam mathanam ghora darśanam
daityaḥ tu abhimukham dṛṣṭvā śaṅkha cakra gadā dharam
jaghāna bhindipālena śita bāṇena vakṣasi
tad prahāram a cintya eva viṣṇuḥ tasmin mahā āhave
jaghāna pañcabhiḥ bāṇaiḥ mārjitaiḥ ca śilā śitaiḥ

original: punardaśabhir ākṛṣṭais taṃ tatāḍa stanāntare // MatsP_152.11 //
analyzed: punar daśabhiḥ ākṛṣṭaiḥ tam tatāḍa stanāntare
viddhaḥ marmasu daitya indraḥ hari bāṇaiḥ akampata

original: sa muhūrtaṃ samāśvāsya jagrāha parighaṃ tadā // MatsP_152.12 //
analyzed: sa muhūrtam samāśvāsya jagrāha parigham tadā
jaghne janārdanam ca api parigheṇa agni varcasā
viṣṇuḥ tena prahāreṇa kiṃcid āghūrṇitaḥ bhavat
tatas krodha vivṛtta akṣaḥ gadām jagrāha mādhavaḥ

original: mathanaṃ sarathaṃ roṣān niṣpipeṣātha roṣataḥ // MatsP_152.14 //
analyzed: mathanam sa ratham roṣāt niṣpipeṣa atha roṣataḥ
sa papāta atha daitya indraḥ kṣaya kāle calaḥ yathā
tasmin nipatite bhūmau dānave vīrya śālini
avasādam yayuḥ daityāḥ kardame kariṇaḥ yathā
tatas teṣu vipanneṣu dānaveṣu atimāniṣu
prakopāt rakta nayanaḥ mahiṣaḥ dānava īśvaraḥ
pratyudyayau harim raudraḥ sva bāhu balam āsthitaḥ
tīkṣṇa dhāreṇa śūlena mahiṣaḥ harim ardayan

original: śaktyā ca garuḍaṃ vīro mahiṣo 'bhyahanaddhṛdi // MatsP_152.18 //
analyzed: śaktyā ca garuḍam vīraḥ mahiṣaḥ bhyahanat hṛdi
tatas vyāvṛtya vadanam mahā acala guhā nibham
grastum aicchat raṇe daityaḥ sa garutmantam acyutam
atha acyutaḥ pi vijñāya dānavasya cikīrṣitam
vadanam pūrayāmāsa divyaiḥ astraiḥ mahā balaḥ
mahiṣasya atha sasṛje bāṇa ogham garuḍadhvajaḥ
pidhāya vadanam divyaiḥ divya astra parimantritaiḥ
sa taiḥ bāṇaiḥ abhihataḥ cala saṃnibhaḥ

original: parivartitakāyo 'dhaḥ papāta na mamāra ca // MatsP_152.22 //
analyzed: parivartita kāyaḥ papāta na mamāra ca

original: mahiṣaṃ patitaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhūmau provāca keśavaḥ /
analyzed: mahiṣam patitam dṛṣṭvā bhūmau provāca keśavaḥ
mahiṣa asura mattaḥ tvam vadham na astraiḥ iha arhasi
yoṣit vadhyaḥ sākṣāt kamalayoninā
uttiṣṭha jīvitam rakṣa gaccha asmāt saṃgarāt drutam
tasmin parāṅmukhe daitye mahiṣe śumbha dānavaḥ
saṃdaṣṭa oṣṭha puṭaḥ kopāt bhrukuṭī kuṭila ānanaḥ
nirmathya pāṇinā pāṇim dhanuḥ ādāya bhairavam

original: sajyaṃ cakāra sa dhanuḥ śarāṃścāśīviṣopamān // MatsP_152.26 //
analyzed: sajyam cakāra sa dhanuḥ śarān ca āśīviṣa upamān

original: sa citrayodhī dṛḍhamuṣṭipātas tatastu viṣṇuṃ garuḍaṃ ca daityaḥ /
analyzed: sa citra yodhī dṛḍha muṣṭipātaḥ tatas tu viṣṇum garuḍam ca daityaḥ
bāṇaiḥ jvalat vahni śikhā nikāśaiḥ kṣiptaiḥ asaṃkhyaiḥ parighāta hīnaiḥ
viṣṇuḥ ca daitya indra śara āhataḥ bhuśuṇḍim ādāya kṛtānta tulyām

original: tayā bhuśuṇḍyā ca pipeṣa meṣaṃ śumbhasya pattraṃ dharaṇīdharābham // MatsP_152.28 //
analyzed: tayā bhuśuṇḍyā ca pipeṣa meṣam śumbhasya pattram dharaṇīdhara ābham

original: tasmādavaplutya hatācca meṣād bhūbhau padātiḥ sa tu daityanāthaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt avaplutya hatāt ca meṣāt padātiḥ sa tu daitya nāthaḥ

original: tato mahīsthasya hariḥ śaraughān mumoca kālānalatulyabhāsaḥ // MatsP_152.29 //
analyzed: tatas mahī sthasya hariḥ śara oghān mumoca kāla anala tulya bhāsaḥ

original: śaraistribhistasya bhujaṃ bibheda ṣaḍbhiśca śīrṣaṃ daśabhiśca ketum /
analyzed: śaraiḥ tribhiḥ tasya bhujam bibheda ṣaḍbhiḥ ca śīrṣam daśabhiḥ ca ketum

original: viṣṇurvikṛṣṭaiḥ śravaṇāvasānaṃ daityasya vivyādha vivṛttanetraḥ // MatsP_152.30 //
analyzed: viṣṇuḥ vikṛṣṭaiḥ śravaṇa avasānam daityasya vivyādha vivṛtta netraḥ

original: sa tena viddho vyathito babhūva daityeśvaro visrutaśoṇitaughaḥ /
analyzed: sa tena viddhaḥ vyathitaḥ babhūva daitya īśvaraḥ visruta śoṇita oghaḥ

original: tato 'sya kiṃcic calitasya dhairyād uvāca śaṅkhāmbujaśārṅgapāṇiḥ // MatsP_152.31 //
analyzed: tatas sya kiṃcid calitasya dhairyāt uvāca śaṅkha ambuja śārṅga pāṇiḥ
kumāri vadhyaḥ si raṇam vimuñca śumbha asura svalpataraiḥ ahobhiḥ

original: vadhaṃ na matto 'rhasi ceha mūḍha vṛthaiva kiṃ yuddhasamutsuko 'si // MatsP_152.32 //
analyzed: vadham na mattaḥ rhasi ca iha mūḍha vṛthā eva kim yuddha samutsukaḥ si

original: jambho vaco viṣṇumukhānniśamya nimiśca niṣpeṣṭumiyeṣa viṣṇum /
analyzed: jambhaḥ vacaḥ viṣṇu mukhāt niśamya nimiḥ ca niṣpeṣṭum iyeṣa viṣṇum

original: gadāmathodyamya nimiḥ pracaṇḍāṃ jaghāna gāḍhāṃ garuḍaṃ śirastaḥ // MatsP_152.33 //
analyzed: gadām athā udyamya nimiḥ pracaṇḍām jaghāna gāḍhām garuḍam śirastaḥ
śumbhaḥ pi viṣṇum parigheṇa mūrdhni pramṛṣṭa ratna ogha vicitra bhāsā

original: tau dānavābhyāṃ viṣamaiḥ prahārair nipetururvyāṃ ghanapāvakābhau // MatsP_152.34 //
analyzed: tau dānavābhyām viṣamaiḥ prahāraiḥ nipetuḥ urvyām ghana pāvaka ābhau

original: tatkarma dṛṣṭvā ditijāstu sarve jagarjuruccaiḥ kṛtasiṃhanādāḥ /
analyzed: tat karma dṛṣṭvā ditijāḥ tu sarve jagarjuḥ uccais kṛta siṃhanādāḥ
dhanūṃṣi ca āsphoṭya sura abhighātaiḥ vyadārayan bhūmim api pracaṇḍāḥ

original: vāsāṃsi caivādudhuvuḥ pare tu dadhmuśca śaṅkhānakagomukhaughān // MatsP_152.35 //
analyzed: vāsāṃsi ca eva ādudhuvuḥ pare tu dadhmuḥ ca śaṅkha ānaka gomukha oghān
atha saṃjñām avāpya āśu garuḍaḥ pi sa keśavaḥ
parāṅmukhaḥ raṇāt tasmāt palāyata mahā javaḥ
matsyapurāṇa
sūtaḥ uvāca
tam ālokya palāyantam vibhraṣṭa dhvaja kārmukam

original: hariṃ devaḥ sahasrākṣo mene bhagnaṃ durāhave // MatsP_153.1 //
analyzed: harim devaḥ sahasrākṣaḥ mene bhagnam durāhave
daityān ca muditān dṛṣṭvā kartavyam na adhyagacchata
athā ayāt nikaṭe viṣṇoḥ sureśaḥ pākaśāsanaḥ
uvāca ca enam madhuram protsāha paribṛṃhakam
kim ebhiḥ krīḍase deva dānavaiḥ duṣṭa mānasaiḥ
durjanaiḥ labdha randhrasya puruṣasya kutas kriyāḥ
śaktena upekṣitaḥ nīcaḥ manyate balam ātmanaḥ

original: tasmānna nīcaṃ matimān durgahīnaṃ hi saṃtyajet /
analyzed: tasmāt na nīcam matimān durga hīnam hi saṃtyajet
atha agresara saṃpattyā rathinaḥ jayam āpnuyuḥ
kaḥ te sakhā bhavat ca agre hiraṇyākṣa vadhe vibho
hiraṇyakaśipuḥ daityaḥ vīrya śālī mada uddhataḥ
tvām prāpya apaśyat asuraḥ viṣamam smṛti vibhramam

original: pūrve 'pyatibalā ye ca daityendrāḥ suravidviṣaḥ // MatsP_153.7 //
analyzed: pūrve pi atibalāḥ ye ca daitya indrāḥ sura vidviṣaḥ
vināśam āgatāḥ prāpya śalabhāḥ iva pāvakam

original: yuge yuge ca daityānāṃ tvamevāntakaro hare // MatsP_153.8 //
analyzed: yuge yuge ca daityānām tvam eva anta karaḥ hare
tathā eva adya iha magnānām bhava viṣṇo sura āśrayaḥ
evam uktaḥ tatas viṣṇuḥ vyavardhata mahā bhujaḥ
ṛddhyā paramayā yuktaḥ sarva bhūta āśrayaḥ rihā
athā uvāca sahasrākṣam kāla kṣamam adhokṣajaḥ

original: daityendrāḥ svairvadhopāyaiḥ śakyā hantuṃ hi nānyataḥ /
analyzed: daitya indrāḥ svaiḥ vadha upāyaiḥ śakyāḥ hantum hi nā anyatas

original: durjayastārako daityo muktvā saptadinaṃ śiśum // MatsP_153.11 //
analyzed: durjayaḥ tārakaḥ daityaḥ muktvā sapta dinam śiśum
kaścid strī vadhyatām prāptaḥ vadhe nyasya kumārikā

original: jambhastu vadhyatāṃ prāpto dānavaḥ krūravikramaḥ // MatsP_153.12 //
analyzed: jambhaḥ tu vadhya tām prāptaḥ dānavaḥ krūra vikramaḥ
tasmāt vīryeṇa divyena jahi jambham jagat varam

original: avadhyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ tvāṃ vinā sa tu dānavaḥ // MatsP_153.13 //
analyzed: avadhyaḥ sarva bhūtānām tvām vinā sa tu dānavaḥ
mayā guptaḥ raṇe jambham jagat kaṇṭakam uddhara
tat vaikuṇṭha vacaḥ śrutvā sahasrākṣaḥ marāri hā
samādiśat surān sarvān sainyasya racanām prati

original: yatsāraṃ sarvalokeṣu vīryasya tapaso 'pi ca // MatsP_153.15 //
analyzed: yat sāram sarva lokeṣu vīryasya ca
tat ekādaśa rudrān tu cakāra agresarān hariḥ
vyāla bhoga aṅga saṃnaddhāḥ balinaḥ nīla kaṃdharāḥ
śūla jvālā avalipta aṅgāḥ bhuja maṇḍala bhairavāḥ
piṅga uttuṅga jaṭā jūṭāḥ siṃha carma anuṣaṅgiṇaḥ
kapāli īśa ādayaḥ rudrāḥ vidrāvita mahā asurāḥ

original: ajeśaḥ śāsanaḥ śāstā śaṃbhuścaṇḍo dhruvastathā // MatsP_153.19 //
analyzed: aja īśaḥ śāsanaḥ śāstā śaṃbhuḥ caṇḍaḥ dhruvaḥ tathā
ete ekādaśā ananta balāḥ rudrāḥ prabhāviṇaḥ
pālayantaḥ balasya agre dārayantaḥ ca dānavān
āpyāyayantaḥ tridaśān garjantaḥ iva ca ambudāḥ
himācala ābhe mahati kāñcana amburuha sraji
pracalat ca amare hema ghaṇṭā saṃghāta maṇḍite
airāvate catur dante mātaṅge cala saṃsthite
mahā mada jala srāve kāmarūpe śatakratuḥ

original: tasthau himagireḥ śṛṅge bhānumāniva dīptimān // MatsP_153.23 //
analyzed: tasthau himagireḥ śṛṅge bhānumān iva dīptimān
tasya arakṣat padam savyam mārutaḥ mita vikramaḥ
jugopa aparam agniḥ tu jvālā pūrita diṅmukhaḥ
pṛṣṭha rakṣaḥ bhavat viṣṇuḥ sa sainyasya śatakratoḥ
ādityāḥ vasavaḥ viśve marutaḥ ca aśvinau api
gandharvāḥ rākṣasāḥ yakṣāḥ sa kiṃnara mahā uragāḥ
nānāvidha āyudhāḥ citrāḥ dadhānāḥ hema bhūṣaṇāḥ
koṭiśas koṭiśas kṛtvā vṛndam cihna upalakṣitam
viśrāmayantaḥ svām kīrtim bandi vṛnda puraḥsarāḥ
ceruḥ daitya vadhe hṛṣṭāḥ saha indrāḥ sura jātayaḥ
śatakratoḥ amara nikāya pālitā patākinī gaja śata vāji nāditā
sita unnata dhvaja paṭa koṭi maṇḍitā babhūva sā ditisuta śoka vardhinī
āyāntīm avalokya atha sura senām gaja asuraḥ
gaja rūpī mahā ambhoda saṃghātaḥ bhāti bhairavaḥ

original: mamarda ca raṇe devāṃś cikṣepānyānkareṇa tu // MatsP_153.30 //
analyzed: mamarda ca raṇe devān cikṣepa anyān kareṇa tu
parān paraśunā jaghne daitya indraḥ raudra vikramaḥ
tasya pātayataḥ senām yakṣa gandharva kiṃnarāḥ
mumucuḥ saṃhatāḥ sarve citra śastra astra saṃhatim
pāśān paraśvadhān cakrān bhindipālān sa mudgarān
kuntān prāsān asīn tīkṣṇān mudgarān ca api duḥsahān
tān sarvān saḥ grasat daityaḥ kavalān iva yūthapaḥ
kopa āsphālita dīrgha agrakara āsphoṭena pātayan

original: vicacāra raṇe devān duṣprekṣye gajadānavaḥ // MatsP_153.34 //
analyzed: vicacāra raṇe devān duṣprekṣye gaja dānavaḥ
yasmin yasmin nipatati sura vṛnde gaja asuraḥ
tasmin tasmin mahā śabdaḥ hāhākāra kṛtaḥ bhavat

original: atha vidravamāṇaṃ tad balaṃ prekṣya samantataḥ /
analyzed: atha vidravamāṇam tat balam prekṣya samantataḥ
rudrāḥ parasparam procuḥ ahaṃkāra utthita arciṣaḥ

original: bho bho gṛhṇīta daityendraṃ mardatainaṃ hatāśrayam /
analyzed: bho bho gṛhṇīta daitya indram mardata enam hata āśrayam

original: karṣatainaṃ śitaiḥ śūlair bhañjatainaṃ ca marmasu // MatsP_153.37 //
analyzed: karṣata enam śitaiḥ śūlaiḥ bhañjata enam ca marmasu
kapālī vākyam ākarṇya śūlam śita śikhā mukham
saṃmārjya vāma hastena saṃrambha vivṛta īkṣaṇaḥ
adhāvat bhṛkuṭī vakraḥ daitya indra abhimukhaḥ raṇe

original: dṛḍhena muṣṭibandhena śūlaṃ viṣṭabhya nirmalam // MatsP_153.39 //
analyzed: dṛḍhena muṣṭi bandhena śūlam viṣṭabhya nirmalam
jaghāna kumbha deśe tu kapālī gaja dānavam

original: tato daśāpi te rudrā nirmalāyomayai raṇe // MatsP_153.40 //
analyzed: tatas daśā api te rudrāḥ raṇe
jaghnuḥ śūlaiḥ ca daitya indram śaila varṣmāṇam āhave
sruta śoṇita randhraḥ tu śita śūla mukha arditaḥ
babhau kṛṣṇa chaviḥ daityaḥ śaradi iva amalam saraḥ
protphulla aruṇa nīla abja saṃghātaḥ sarvatodiśam
rudraiḥ haṃsaiḥ iva āvṛtaḥ
upasthita ārtiḥ daityaḥ tha pracalat karṇa pallavaḥ
śaṃbhum bibheda daśanaiḥ nābhi deśe gaja asuraḥ

original: dṛṣṭvā saktaṃ tu rudrābhyāṃ nava rudrāstato 'dbhutam // MatsP_153.44 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā saktam tu rudrābhyām nava rudrāḥ tatas dbhutam
tatakṣuḥ vividhaiḥ śastraiḥ śarīram amara dviṣaḥ

original: nirbhayā balino yuddhe raṇabhūmau vyavasthitāḥ // MatsP_153.45 //
analyzed: nirbhayāḥ balinaḥ yuddhe raṇa bhūmau vyavasthitāḥ
mṛtam mahiṣam āsādya vane gomāyavaḥ yathā
kapālinam parityajya gataḥ ca asura puṃgavaḥ
vegena kupitaḥ daityaḥ nava rudrān upādravat

original: mamarda caraṇāghātair dantaiścāpi kareṇa ca // MatsP_153.47 //
analyzed: mamarda caraṇa āghātaiḥ dantaiḥ ca api kareṇa ca
sa taiḥ tumula yuddhena śramam āsāditaḥ yadā

original: tadā kapālī jagrāha karaṃ tasyāmaradviṣaḥ // MatsP_153.48 //
analyzed: tadā kapālī jagrāha karam tasya amara dviṣaḥ

original: bhrāmayāmāsa vegena hy atīva ca gajāsuram /
analyzed: bhrāmayāmāsa vegena hi atīva ca gaja asuram
dṛṣṭvā śrama āturam daityam kiṃcid sphurita jīvitam
nirutsāham raṇe tasmin gata yuddha utsava udyamam

original: tataḥ patata evāsya carma cotkṛtya bhairavam // MatsP_153.50 //
analyzed: tatas patataḥ eva asya carma ca utkṛtya bhairavam
sravat sarva aṅga rakta ogham cakāra ambaram ātmanaḥ

original: dṛṣṭvā vinihataṃ daityaṃ dānavendrā mahābalāḥ // MatsP_153.51 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā vinihatam daityam dānava indrāḥ mahā balāḥ
vitresuḥ dudruvuḥ jagmuḥ nipetuḥ ca sahasraśas
dṛṣṭvā kapālinaḥ rūpam gaja carma ambara āvṛtam

original: dikṣu bhūmau tamevograṃ rudraṃ daityā vyalokayan /
analyzed: dikṣu bhūmau tam eva ugram rudram daityāḥ vyalokayan

original: evaṃ vilulite tasmin dānavendre mahābale // MatsP_153.53 //
analyzed: evam vilulite tasmin dānava indre mahā bale
dvipa adhirūḍhaḥ daitya indraḥ hata dundubhinā tatas
kalpa anta ambudhara ābheṇa durdhareṇa api dānavaḥ
nimiḥ abhyapatat tūrṇam sura sainyāni loḍayan

original: yāṃ yāṃ nimigajo yāti diśaṃ tāṃ tāṃ savāhanā /
analyzed: yām yām nimi gajaḥ yāti diśam tām tām sa vāhanā
saṃtyajya dudruvuḥ devāḥ bhaya ārtāḥ tyakta hetayaḥ
gandhena sura mātaṅgāḥ dudruvuḥ tasya hastinaḥ
palāyiteṣu sainyeṣu surāṇām pākaśāsanaḥ

original: tasthau dikpālakaiḥ sārdham aṣṭabhiḥ keśavena ca // MatsP_153.57 //
analyzed: tasthau dikpālakaiḥ sārdham aṣṭabhiḥ keśavena ca
samprāptaḥ nimi mātaṅgaḥ yāvat śakra gajam prati

original: tāvacchakragajo yāto muktvā nādaṃ sa bhairavam // MatsP_153.58 //
analyzed: tāvat śakra gajaḥ yātaḥ muktvā nādam sa bhairavam

original: dhriyamāṇo 'pi yatnena sa raṇe naiva tiṣṭhati /
analyzed: dhriyamāṇaḥ pi yatnena sa raṇe nā eva tiṣṭhati

original: palāyite gaje tasminn ārūḍhaḥ pākaśāsanaḥ // MatsP_153.59 //
analyzed: palāyite gaje tasmin ārūḍhaḥ pākaśāsanaḥ
viparīta mukhaḥ yudhyat dānava indra balam prati
śatakratuḥ tu vajreṇa nimim vakṣasi atāḍayat
gadayā dantinaḥ ca asya gaṇḍa deśe hanat dṛḍham
tad prahāram a cintya eva nimiḥ nirbhaya pauruṣaḥ
airāvaṇam kaṭī deśe mudgareṇa abhyatāḍayat

original: sa hato mudgareṇātha śakrakuñjara āhave // MatsP_153.62 //
analyzed: sa hataḥ mudgareṇa atha śakra kuñjaraḥ āhave
jagāma paścāt caraṇaiḥ dharaṇīm bhūdhara ākṛtiḥ
lāghavāt kṣipram utthāya tatas mara mahā gajaḥ
raṇāt apasasarpa āśu bhīṣitaḥ nimi hastinā
tatas vāyuḥ vavau rūkṣaḥ bahu śarkara pāṃsulaḥ
saṃmukhaḥ nimi mātaṅgaḥ javana acala kampanaḥ

original: srutarakto babhau śailo ghanadhātuhrado yathā // MatsP_153.65 //
analyzed: sruta raktaḥ babhau śailaḥ ghana dhātu hradaḥ yathā
dhaneśaḥ pi gadām gurvīm tasya dānava hastinaḥ
cikṣepa vegāt daitya indraḥ nipapāta asya mūrdhani
gajaḥ gadā nipātena sa tena parimūrchitaḥ
dantaiḥ bhittvā dharām vegāt papāta acala saṃnibhaḥ

original: patite tu gaje tasmin siṃhanādo mahānabhūt /
analyzed: patite tu gaje tasmin siṃha nādaḥ mahān abhūt
sarvatas sura sainyānām gaja bṛṃhita bṛṃhitaiḥ
hreṣā raveṇa ca aśvānām guṇa āsphoṭaiḥ ca dhanvinām

original: gajaṃ taṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā nimiṃ cāpi parāṅmukham // MatsP_153.69 //
analyzed: gajam tam nihatam dṛṣṭvā nimim ca api parāṅmukham
śrutvā ca siṃha nādam ca surāṇām atikopanaḥ

original: jambho jajvāla kopena pītājya iva pāvakaḥ // MatsP_153.70 //
analyzed: jambhaḥ jajvāla kopena pīta ājyaḥ iva pāvakaḥ
sa surān kopa rakta akṣaḥ dhanuṣi āropya sāyakam
tiṣṭhata iti abravīt tāvat sārathim ca api acodayat
vegena calataḥ tasya tad rathasya abhavat dyutiḥ
yathā āditya sahasrasya abhuditasya udaya acale
patākinā rathena ājau kiṅkiṇī jāla mālinā

original: śaśiśubhrātapatreṇa sa tena syandanena tu // MatsP_153.73 //
analyzed: sa tena syandanena tu
ghaṭṭayan sura sainyānām hṛdayam samadṛśyata
tam āyāntam abhiprekṣya dhanuṣi āhita sāyakaḥ
śatakratuḥ adīna ātmā dṛḍham ādhatta kārmukam
bāṇam ca taila dhauta agram ardhacandram ajihmagam

original: tenāsya saśaraṃ cāpaṃ raṇe cicheda vṛtrahā /
analyzed: tena asya sa śaram cāpam raṇe cicheda vṛtrahā

original: kṣipraṃ saṃtyajya taccāpaṃ jambho dānavanandanaḥ // MatsP_153.76 //
analyzed: kṣipram saṃtyajya tat cāpam jambhaḥ dānava nandanaḥ
anyat kārmukam ādāya vegavat bhāra sādhanam
śarān ca āśīviṣa ākārān taila dhautān ajihmagān

original: śakraṃ vivyādha daśabhir jatrudeśe tu pattribhiḥ /
analyzed: śakram vivyādha daśabhiḥ jatru deśe tu pattribhiḥ

original: hṛdaye ca tribhiścāpi dvābhyāṃ ca skandhayor dvayoḥ // MatsP_153.78 //
analyzed: hṛdaye ca tribhiḥ ca api dvābhyām ca skandhayoḥ dvayoḥ
dānava indrāya bāṇa jālam api īdṛśam
aprāptān dānava indraḥ tu śarān śakra bhuja īritān
cicheda daśadhā ākāśe śaraiḥ agni śikhā upamaiḥ
tatas tu śara jālena devendraḥ dānava īśvaram
ācchādayata yatnena varṣāsu iva ghanaiḥ nabhaḥ

original: daityo 'pi bāṇajālaṃ tad vyadhamatsāyakaiḥ śitaiḥ // MatsP_153.81 //
analyzed: daityaḥ pi bāṇa jālam tat vyadhamat sāyakaiḥ śitaiḥ
yathā vāyuḥ ghana āṭopam parivārya diśaḥ mukhe

original: śakro 'tha krodhasaṃrambhān na viśeṣayate yadā // MatsP_153.82 //
analyzed: krodha saṃrambhāt na viśeṣayate yadā
dānava indram tadā cakre gandharva astram mahā adbhutam
tad uttha tejasā vyāptam abhūt gamana gocaram
gandharvanagaraiḥ ca api nānā prākāra toraṇaiḥ
muñcadbhiḥ adbhuta ākāraiḥ astra vṛṣṭim samantataḥ
atha astra vṛṣṭyā daityānām hanyamānā mahā camūḥ
jambham śaraṇam āgacchat aprameya parākramam
vyākulaḥ pi svayam daityaḥ sahasrākṣa astra pīḍitaḥ
smaran sādhu samācāram bhīta trāṇa paraḥ bhavat
athā astram mausalam nāma mumoca diti nandanaḥ
tatas yomusalaiḥ sarvam abhavat pūritam jagat
eka prahāra karaṇaiḥ apradhṛṣyaiḥ samantataḥ
gandharva nagaram teṣu gandharva astra vinirmitam
gāndharvam astram saṃdhāya sura sainyeṣu ca aparam
ekaikena prahāreṇa gajān aśvān mahā rathān
ratha aśvān saḥ hanat kṣipram sahasraśas

original: tataḥ surādhipastvāṣṭram astraṃ ca samudīrayat // MatsP_153.90 //
analyzed: tatas surādhipaḥ tvāṣṭram astram ca samudīrayat
tatas tvāṣṭre niśceruḥ pāvaka arciṣaḥ
tatas yantra mayān divyān āyudhān duṣpradharṣiṇaḥ
taiḥ yantraiḥ abhavat baddham antarikṣe vitānakam

original: vitānakena tenātha praśamaṃ mausale gate // MatsP_153.92 //
analyzed: vitānakena tena atha praśamam mausale gate
śaila astram mumuce jambhaḥ yantra saṃghāta tāḍanam
vyāma pramāṇaiḥ upalaiḥ tatas varṣam avartata
tvāṣṭrasya nirmitāni āśu yantrāṇi tad anantaram
tena upala nipātena gatāni tilaśas tatas
yantrāṇi tilaśas kṛtvā śaila astram para mūrdhasu
nipapāta ativegena adārayat pṛthivīm tatas
tatas vajra astram akarot sahasrākṣaḥ puraṃdaraḥ
tadā upala mahā varṣam vyaśīryata samantataḥ
tatas praśānte śaila astre jambhaḥ bhūdhara saṃnibhaḥ
aiṣīkam astram akarot tiparākramaḥ
aiṣīkeṇa āgamat nāśam vajra astram śakra vallabham
vijṛmbhati atha ca aiṣīke parama astre ti durdhare
jajvaluḥ deva sainyāni sasyandana gajāni tu
dahyamāneṣu anīkeṣu tejasā sura sattamaḥ
āgneyam astram akarot balavān pākaśāsanaḥ

original: tenāstreṇa tadastraṃ ca babhraṃśe tadanantaram // MatsP_153.100 //
analyzed: tena astreṇa tat astram ca babhraṃśe tad anantaram
tasmin pratihate ca astre pāvaka astram vyajṛmbhata

original: jajvāla kāyaṃ jambhasya sarathaṃ ca sasārathim // MatsP_153.101 //
analyzed: jajvāla kāyam jambhasya sa ratham ca sa sārathim
tatas pratihataḥ saḥ tha daitya indraḥ pratibhānavān
vāruṇa astram mumoca atha śamanam pāvaka arciṣām
tatas jaladharaiḥ vyoma sphurat vidyut latā ākulaiḥ
gambhīra muraja dhvānaiḥ āpūritam iva ambaram
karīndra kara tulyābhiḥ jala dhārābhiḥ ambarāt
patantībhiḥ jagat sarvam kṣaṇena āpūritam babhau
śāntam āgneyam astram tat pravilokya surādhipaḥ
vāyavyam astram akarot megha saṃghāta nāśanam
vāyavya astra balena atha nirdhūte megha maṇḍale
babhūva vimalam vyoma nīlotpala dala prabham
vāyunā ca ati ghoreṇa kampitāḥ te tu dānavāḥ

original: na śekustatra te sthātuṃ raṇe 'tibalino 'pi ye // MatsP_153.107 //
analyzed: na śekuḥ tatra te sthātum raṇe ti balinaḥ pi ye
tadā jambhaḥ bhavat śailaḥ daśa yojana vistṛtaḥ
māruta pratighāta artham dānavānām bhaya apahaḥ
mukta nānā āyudha udagra tejaḥ abhijvalita drumaḥ

original: tataḥ praśamite vāyau daityendre parvatākṛtau // MatsP_153.109 //
analyzed: tatas praśamite vāyau daitya indre parvata ākṛtau
mahā aśanīm vajra mayīm mumoca āśu śatakratuḥ
tayā aśanyā patitayā daityasya acala rūpiṇaḥ
kandarāṇi vyaśīryanta samantāt nirjharāṇi tu

original: tataḥ sā dānavendrasya śailamāyā nyavartata // MatsP_153.111 //
analyzed: tatas sā dānava indrasya śaila māyā nyavartata
nivṛtta śaila māyaḥ dānava indraḥ mada utkaṭaḥ
babhūva kuñjaraḥ bhīmaḥ mahā śaila sama ākṛtiḥ
sa mamarda sura anīkam dantaiḥ ca api ahanat surān

original: babhañja pṛṣṭhataḥ kāṃścit kareṇāveṣṭya dānavaḥ // MatsP_153.113 //
analyzed: babhañja pṛṣṭhatas kāṃścid kareṇa āveṣṭya dānavaḥ
tatas kṣapayataḥ tasya sura sainyāni vṛtrahā

original: astraṃ trailokyadurdharṣaṃ nārasiṃhaṃ mumoca ha // MatsP_153.114 //
analyzed: astram trailokya durdharṣam nārasiṃham mumoca ha
tatas siṃha sahasrāṇi niśceruḥ mantra tejasā
kṛṣṇa daṃṣṭra aṭṭahāsāni krakaca ābha nakhāni ca
taiḥ vipāṭita gātraḥ sau gaja māyām vyapothayat
tatas ca āśīviṣaḥ ghoraḥ bhavat phaṇa śata ākulaḥ
viṣa niḥśvāsa nirdagdham sura sainyam mahā rathaḥ
tatas stram gāruḍam cakre śakraḥ cāru bhujaḥ tadā
tatas garutmataḥ tasmāt sahasrāṇi viniryayuḥ
taiḥ garutmadbhiḥ āsādya jambhaḥ bhujaga rūpavān

original: kṛtastu khaṇḍaśo daityaḥ sāsya māyā vyanaśyata // MatsP_153.118 //
analyzed: kṛtaḥ tu khaṇḍaśas daityaḥ sā asya māyā vyanaśyata

original: pranaṣṭāyāṃ tu māyāyāṃ tato jambho mahāsuraḥ /
analyzed: pranaṣṭāyām tu māyāyām tatas jambhaḥ mahā asuraḥ
cakāra rūpam atulam candra āditya patha anugam
vivṛtta vadanaḥ grastum iyeṣa sura puṃgavān
viviśuḥ vaktram sa mahā ratha kuñjarā
sura senā āviśat bhīmam pātāla uttāna tālukam
sainyeṣu grasyamāneṣu dānavena balīyasā

original: śakro dainyaṃ samāpannaḥ śrāntabāhuḥ savāhanaḥ // MatsP_153.121 //
analyzed: śakraḥ dainyam samāpannaḥ śrānta bāhuḥ sa vāhanaḥ
kartavya tām na adhyagacchat provāca idam janārdanam
kim anantaram atra asti kartavyasya avaśeṣitam
yat āśritya ghaṭāmaḥ u sya dānavasya yuyutsavaḥ
tatas hariḥ uvāca idam vajrāyudham udāra dhīḥ
na sāṃpratam raṇaḥ tyājyaḥ tvayā kātara bhairavaḥ

original: vardhasvāśu mahāmāyāṃ puraṃdara ripuṃ prati // MatsP_153.124 //
analyzed: vardhasva āśu mahā māyām puraṃdara ripum prati
mayā eṣa lakṣitaḥ daityaḥ dhiṣṭhitaḥ prāpta pauruṣaḥ

original: mā śakra mohamāgaccha kṣipramastraṃ smara prabho // MatsP_153.125 //
analyzed: mā śakra moham āgaccha kṣipram astram smara prabho

original: tataḥ śakraḥ prakupito dānavaṃ prati devarāṭ /
analyzed: tatas śakraḥ prakupitaḥ dānavam prati deva rāj
nārāyaṇa astram prayataḥ mumoca asura vakṣasi
etasmin antare daityaḥ vivṛta āsyaḥ grasat kṣaṇāt
trīṇi lakṣāṇi gandharvī kiṃnara uraga rākṣasān
tatas nārāyaṇa astram tat papāta asura vakṣasi

original: mahāstrabhinnahṛdayaḥ susrāva rudhiraṃ ca saḥ // MatsP_153.127 //
analyzed: mahā astra bhinna hṛdayaḥ susrāva rudhiram ca saḥ
raṇa āgāram iva udgāram tatyāja asura nandanaḥ

original: tadastratejasā tasya rūpaṃ daityasya nāśitam // MatsP_153.128 //
analyzed: tad astra tejasā tasya rūpam daityasya nāśitam
tatas ca antardadhe daityaḥ viyati anupalakṣitaḥ
gagana sthaḥ sa daitya indraḥ śastra asanam atīndriyam
mumoca sura sainyānām saṃhāre kāraṇam param
prāsān paraśvadhān cakrān bāṇān vajrān sa mudgarān
kuṭhārān saha khaḍgaiḥ ca bhindipālān ayaḥ guḍān

original: vavarṣa dānavo raudro hy abandhyānakṣayānapi // MatsP_153.131 //
analyzed: vavarṣa dānavaḥ raudraḥ hi abandhyān akṣayān api

original: sa bhaviṣyati hantā vai surārīṇāmasaṃśayam // MatsP_154.70 //
analyzed: sa bhaviṣyati hantā vai surārīṇām asaṃśayam
tvayā api dānavāḥ devi hantavyāḥ loka durjayāḥ
yāvat ca na satī deha saṃkrānta guṇa saṃcayā
tad saṃgamena tāvat tvam daityān hantum na śakṣyase
evam kṛte tapaḥ taptvā sṛṣṭi saṃhāra kāriṇī
samāpta niyamā devī yadā ca umā bhaviṣyati

original: tadā svameva tadrūpaṃ śailajā pratipatsyate // MatsP_154.73 //
analyzed: tadā svam eva tat rūpam śailajā pratipatsyate

original: rūpāṃśena tu saṃyuktā tvamumāyāṃ bhaviṣyasi // MatsP_154.74 //
analyzed: rūpa aṃśena tu saṃyuktā tvam umāyām bhaviṣyasi
ekānaṃśā iti lokaḥ tvām vara de pūjayiṣyati
bhedaiḥ bahuvidha ākāraiḥ sarva gā kāma sādhinī
oṃkāra vaktrā gāyatrī tvam iti brahma vādibhiḥ
ākrāntiḥ ūrjita ākārā rājabhiḥ ca mahā bhujaiḥ

original: tvaṃ bhūriti viśāṃ mātā śūdraiḥ śaivīti pūjitā /
analyzed: tvam bhūḥ iti viśām mātā śūdraiḥ śaivī iti pūjitā
kṣāntiḥ munīnām akṣobhyā dayā niyaminām iti
tvam mahā upāya saṃdohā nītiḥ naya visarpiṇām
paricchittiḥ tvam arthānām tvam īhā prāṇi hṛd śayā

original: tvaṃ muktiḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ tvaṃ gatiḥ sarvadehinām /
analyzed: tvam muktiḥ sarva bhūtānām tvam gatiḥ sarva dehinām

original: tvaṃ ca kīrtimatāṃ kīrtis tvaṃ mūrtiḥ sarvadehinām // MatsP_154.79 //
analyzed: tvam ca kīrtimatām kīrtiḥ tvam mūrtiḥ sarva dehinām
ratiḥ tvam rakta cittānām prītiḥ tvam hṛṣṭa darśinām

original: tvaṃ kāntiḥ kṛtabhūṣāṇāṃ tvaṃ śāntirduḥkhakarmaṇām // MatsP_154.80 //
analyzed: tvam kāntiḥ kṛta bhūṣāṇām tvam śāntiḥ duḥkha karmaṇām

original: tvaṃ bhrāntiḥ sarvabodhānāṃ tvaṃ gatiḥ kratuyājinām /
analyzed: tvam bhrāntiḥ sarva bodhānām tvam gatiḥ kratu yājinām

original: jaladhīnāṃ mahāvelā tvaṃ ca līlā vilāsinām // MatsP_154.81 //
analyzed: jaladhīnām mahā velā tvam ca līlā vilāsinām
saṃbhūtiḥ tvam padārthānām sthitiḥ tvam lokapālinī

iti anekavidhaiḥ devi rūpaiḥ loke tvam arcitā

original: ye tvāṃ stoṣyanti varade pūjayiṣyanti vāpi ye /
analyzed: ye tvām stoṣyanti vara de pūjayiṣyanti vā api ye

original: te sarvakāmānāpsyanti niyatā nātra saṃśayaḥ // MatsP_154.84 //
analyzed: te sarva kāmān āpsyanti niyatāḥ na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: ityuktā tu niśā devī tathetyuktvā kṛtāñjaliḥ /
analyzed: iti uktā tu niśā devī tathā iti uktvā kṛtāñjaliḥ

original: jagāma tvaritā tūrṇaṃ gṛhaṃ himagireḥ param // MatsP_154.85 //
analyzed: jagāma tvaritā tūrṇam gṛham himagireḥ param
tatra āsīnām mahā harmye ratna bhitti samāśrayām
dadarśa menām āpāṇḍu chavi vaktra saroruhām
kiṃcid śyāma mukha udagra stana bhāra avanāmitām
mahā oṣadhi gaṇa ābaddha mantrarāja niṣevitām
udvahat kanaka unnaddha jīva rakṣā mahā uragām
maṇi dīpa gaṇa jyotiḥ mahā āloka prakāśite
prakīrṇa bahu siddha arthe manoja parivārake
śucini aṃśuka saṃchanna bhū śayyā āstaraṇa ujjvale
dhūpa āmoda manaḥ ramye sarjagandhā upayogike

original: tataḥ krameṇa divase gate dūraṃ vibhāvarī // MatsP_154.90 //
analyzed: tatas krameṇa divase gate dūram vibhāvarī

prasupta prāya puruṣe nidrā bhūta upacārike
sphuṭa āloke śaśabhṛti bhrānti rātri vihaṃgame
rajanīcara bhūtānām saṃghaiḥ āvṛta catvare
gāḍha kaṇṭhagraha ālagna subhaga iṣṭa jane tatas
kiṃcid ākula tām prāpte menā netra ambuja dvaye
āviveśa mukhe rātriḥ sucira sphuṭa saṃgamā
janma dāyāḥ jaganmātuḥ krameṇa jaṭhara antare

original: āviveśāntaraṃ janma manyamānā kṣapā tu vai /
analyzed: āviveśa antaram janma manyamānā kṣapā tu vai
arañjayat chavim devyāḥ guhā araṇye vibhāvarī

original: brāhme muhūrte subhage vyasūyata guhāraṇim // MatsP_154.96 //
analyzed: brāhme muhūrte subhage vyasūyata guhā araṇim
tasyām tu jāyamānāyām jantavaḥ sthāṇu jaṅgamāḥ
abhavan sukhinaḥ sarve sarva loka nivāsinaḥ

original: abhavatkrūrasattvānāṃ cetaḥ śāntaṃ ca dehinām // MatsP_154.98 //
analyzed: abhavat krūra sattvānām cetaḥ śāntam ca dehinām
jyotiṣām api tejaḥ tvam abhavat surata unnatā

original: gandhavanti ca mālyāni vimalaṃ ca nabho 'bhavat /
analyzed: gandhavanti ca mālyāni vimalam ca nabhaḥ bhavat
mārutaḥ ca sukha sparśaḥ diśaḥ ca su manoharā
tena ca udbhūta phalita paripāka guṇa ujjvalāḥ
abhavat pṛthivī devī śāli mālā ākulā api ca
tapāṃsi dīrgha cīrṇāni munīnām bhāvitātmanām
tasmin gatāni sāphalyam kāle nirmala cetasām
vismṛtāni ca śastrāṇi prādurbhāvam prapedire
prabhāvaḥ tīrtha mukhyānām tadā puṇyatamaḥ bhavat
antarikṣe surāḥ ca āsan vimāneṣu sahasraśas
samahendra hari brahma vāyu vahni purogamāḥ
puṣpa vṛṣṭim pramumucuḥ tasmin tu hima bhūdhare
jaguḥ gandharva mukhyāḥ ca nanṛtuḥ ca apsaraḥ gaṇāḥ
meru prabhṛtayaḥ ca api mūrtimantaḥ mahā balāḥ
tasmin mahā utsave prāpte divya prabhṛta pāṇayaḥ
saritaḥ sāgarāḥ ca eva samājagmuḥ ca sarvaśas
himaśailaḥ bhavat loke tathā sarvaiḥ carācaraiḥ
sevyaḥ ca api abhigamyaḥ ca sa śreyān ca acala uttamaḥ
anubhūya utsavam devāḥ jagmuḥ svān ālayān mudā
deva gandharva nāga indra śaila śīla avanī guṇaiḥ
himaśaila sutā devī svayam pūrvikayā tatas
krameṇa vṛddhim ānītāḥ lakṣmīvān alasaiḥ budhaiḥ
krameṇa rūpa saubhāgya prabodhaiḥ bhuvanatrayam
ajayat bhūṣayat ca api niḥsādhāraiḥ naga ātmajā
etasmin antare śakraḥ nāradam deva saṃmatam

original: smṛtiṃ śakrasya vijñāya jātāṃ tu bhagavāṃstadā // MatsP_154.112 //
analyzed: smṛtim śakrasya vijñāya jātām tu bhagavān tadā

original: taṃ sa dṛṣṭvā sahasrākṣaḥ samutthāya mahāsanāt // MatsP_154.113 //
analyzed: tam sa dṛṣṭvā sahasrākṣaḥ samutthāya mahā āsanāt

original: śakrapraṇītāṃ tāṃ pūjāṃ pratigṛhya yathāvidhi // MatsP_154.114 //

original: pṛṣṭe ca kuśale śakraḥ provāca vacanaṃ prabhuḥ // MatsP_154.115 //
analyzed: pṛṣṭe ca kuśale śakraḥ provāca vacanam prabhuḥ
indraḥ uvāca
kuśalasya aṅkure tāvat sambhūte bhuvanatraye

original: nirvṛtiṃ paramāṃ yāti nivedyārthaṃ suhṛjjane // MatsP_154.117 //
analyzed: nirvṛtim paramām yāti nivedya artham suhṛd jane
tat yathā śailajā devī yogam yāyāt pinākinā
śīghram tad udyamaḥ sarvaiḥ asmad pakṣaiḥ vidhīyatām
avagamya artham akhilam tatas āmantrya nāradaḥ
śakram jagāma bhagavān himaśaila niveśanam

original: vandito himaśailena nirgatena puro muniḥ // MatsP_154.120 //
analyzed: vanditaḥ himaśailena nirgatena puras muniḥ

original: saha praviśya bhavanaṃ bhuvo bhūṣaṇatāṃ gatam /
analyzed: saha praviśya bhavanam bhuvaḥ bhūṣaṇa tām gatam

original: nivedite svayaṃ haime himaśaile na vistṛte // MatsP_154.121 //
analyzed: nivedite svayam haime himaśaile na vistṛte

original: yathārhaṃ cārghyapādyaṃ ca śailastasmai nyavedayat // MatsP_154.122 //
analyzed: yathārham ca arghya pādyam ca śailaḥ tasmai nyavedayat
muniḥ tu pratijagrāha tam argham vidhivat tadā

kuśalam tapasaḥ śailaḥ śanais phulla ānana ambujaḥ

nāradaḥ uvāca
aho vatāritāḥ sarve saṃniveśe mahā gire

original: pṛthutvaṃ manasā tulyaṃ kandarāṇāṃ tathācala // MatsP_154.125 //
analyzed: pṛthu tvam manasā tulyam kandarāṇām tathā acala

original: na ca lakṣmīstathā svarge kutrādhikatayā sthitā // MatsP_154.127 //

nānā tapobhiḥ munibhiḥ jvalana arka sama prabhaiḥ

original: aho dhanyo 'si śailendra yasya te kandaraṃ haraḥ /
analyzed: aho dhanyaḥ si śaila indra yasya te kandaram haraḥ

iti uktavati devarṣau nārade sādaram girā

original: tatra sthito munivaraḥ śailena sahito vaśī /

analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tu tejasaḥ rāśim munim śaila priyā tadā

original: tāṃ vilokya mahābhāgo maharṣir amitadyutiḥ // MatsP_154.134 //

original: smitānano mahābhāgo vākyaṃ provāca nāradaḥ // MatsP_154.145 //
analyzed: smita ānanaḥ mahābhāgaḥ vākyam provāca nāradaḥ
na syāḥ patiḥ bhadre lakṣaṇaiḥ ca vivarjitā

sva chāyayā bhaviṣyeyam kim anyat bahu bhāṣyate

original: yo jāyate hi yadbījo janituḥ sa hyasārthakaḥ // MatsP_154.149 //

original: janitā cāpi jātasya na kaściditi yatsphuṭam /

mānuṣāt ca sarīsṛpyām manuṣya tvena jāyate

original: daśaputrasamā kanyā yā na syācchīlavarjitā // MatsP_154.157 //

original: kanyā hi kṛpaṇā śocyā piturduḥkhavivardhinī // MatsP_154.158 //

original: aho muhyāmi śuṣyāmi glāmi sīdāmi nārada // MatsP_154.160 //
analyzed: aho muhyāmi śuṣyāmi glāmi sīdāmi nārada

original: durlabhaḥ satpatiḥ strīṇāṃ viguṇo 'pi patiḥ kila /

original: na prāpyate vinā puṇyaiḥ patirnāryā kadācana // MatsP_154.164 //
analyzed: na prāpyate vinā puṇyaiḥ patiḥ nāryā kadācana

original: dhanaṃ jīvitaparyāptaṃ patyau nāryāḥ pratiṣṭhitam // MatsP_154.165 //

original: daivataṃ paramaṃ nāryāḥ patiruktaḥ sadaiva hi // MatsP_154.166 //

original: tvayā coktaṃ hi devarṣe na jāto 'syāḥ patiḥ kila /

original: carācare bhūtasarge yadadyāpi ca no mune /

original: na sa jāta iti brūṣe tena me vyākulaṃ manaḥ // MatsP_154.168 //
analyzed: na sa jātaḥ iti brūṣe tena me vyākulam manaḥ
manuṣya deva jātīnām śubha aśubha nivedakam

original: tatrāpi śreyasāṃ hyāśā mune na pratibhāti naḥ /
analyzed: tatra api śreyasām hi āśā mune na pratibhāti naḥ

original: tvaṃ me sarvaṃ vijānāsi satyavāgasi cāpyataḥ /

original: muhyāmi muniśārdūla hṛdayaṃ dīryatīva me // MatsP_154.174 //

nāradaḥ uvāca

original: śaraṇyaḥ śāśvataḥ śāstā śaṃkaraḥ parameśvaraḥ // MatsP_154.178 //
analyzed: śaraṇyaḥ śāśvataḥ śāstā śaṃkaraḥ parameśvaraḥ

original: tasyaite parameśasya sarve krīḍanakā gire // MatsP_154.179 //

analyzed: naśyate dehaḥ eva atra na ātmanaḥ nāśaḥ ucyate

original: śṛṇu tasyāpi vākyasya samyaktvena vicāraṇam // MatsP_154.185 //
analyzed: śṛṇu tasya api vākyasya samyaktvena vicāraṇam

anantasya aprameyasya saubhāgyasya asya bhūdhara
na eva aṅkaḥ lakṣaṇa ākāraḥ śarīre saṃvidhīyate

original: ato 'syā lakṣaṇaṃ gātre śaila nāsti mahāmate /
analyzed: lakṣaṇam gātre śaila nā asti mahāmate

original: uttāno varadaḥ pāṇir eṣa devyāḥ sadaiva tu /

original: asyāḥ śṛṇu mamātrāpi vāgyuktiṃ śailasattama // MatsP_154.190 //
analyzed: asyāḥ śṛṇu mama atrā api vāc yuktim śaila sattama
caraṇau padma saṃkāśau asyāḥ svaccha nakha ujjvalau
sura asurāṇām namatām kirīṭa maṇi kāntibhiḥ
vicitra varṇaiḥ bhāsantau sva chāyā pratibimbitau
bhāryā jagadguroḥ hi eṣā vṛṣāṅkasya mahīdhara
jananī loka dharmasya sambhūtā bhūta bhāvanī

original: atyantaṃ hi mahatkāryaṃ devānāṃ himabhūdhara // MatsP_154.194 //

himācale cala guṇām prāpitaḥ smi samunnatim
ānanda divasa āhāri hṛdayam me dhunā mune

original: yadi vācāmadhīśaḥ syāṃ tvadguṇānāṃ vicāraṇe // MatsP_154.199 //
analyzed: yadi vācām adhīśaḥ syām tvad guṇānām vicāraṇe

original: tavāsmānprati cāpalyaṃ vyaktaṃ mama mahāmune // MatsP_154.200 //

original: munīnāṃ devatānāṃ ca svayaṃkartāpi kalmaṣam // MatsP_154.201 //
analyzed: munīnām devatānām ca svayam kartā api kalmaṣam

analyzed: sura kārye yaḥ evā arthaḥ tava api su mahattaraḥ

jagāma jagatī sāram sarala druma vedikam
śānta sattva samākīrṇam acala prāṇi saṃkulam

vetra pāṇinam avyagram ugra bhogi indra bhūṣaṇam

vaśi tvena bubodha īśaḥ vikṛtim madana ātmikām
īṣat kopa samāviṣṭaḥ dhairyam ālambya dhūrjaṭiḥ

analyzed: sa tayā māyayā āviṣṭaḥ jajvāla madanaḥ tatas

original: anuyāto 'tha hṛdyena mitreṇa madhunā saha // MatsP_154.241 //

original: tataḥ karaṇasaṃdeho viddhastu hṛdaye bhavaḥ // MatsP_154.244 //

bāhyam bahu samāsādya pratyūha prasava ātmakam
tatas kopa anala udbhūta ghora huṅkāra bhīṣaṇe
babhūva vadane netram tṛtīyam anala ākulam
rudrasya raudra vapuṣaḥ jagat saṃhāra bhairavam
tad antika sthe madane vyasphārayata dhūrjaṭiḥ
tad netra visphuliṅgena krośatām nāka vāsinām
gamitaḥ bhasmasāt tūrṇam kandarpaḥ kāmi darpakaḥ

original: sa tu taṃ bhasmasātkṛtvā haranetrodbhavo 'nalaḥ // MatsP_154.249 //
analyzed: sa tu tam bhasmasātkṛtvā hara netra udbhavaḥ nalaḥ

bhṛṅgeṣu kokila āsyeṣu vibhāgena smara analam

original: samprāpya snehasaṃpṛktaṃ kāmināṃ hṛdayaṃ kila // MatsP_154.253 //
analyzed: samprāpya sneha saṃpṛktam kāminām hṛdayam kila

original: vilalāpa ratiḥ krūraṃ bandhunā madhunā saha /

original: tato vilapya bahuśo madhunā parisāntvitā // MatsP_154.255 //

original: nirbadhya tu jaṭājūṭaṃ kuṭilair alakai ratiḥ // MatsP_154.257 //
analyzed: nirbadhya tu jaṭā jūṭam kuṭilaiḥ ratiḥ

original: namaḥ śivāyāstu nirāmayāya namaḥ śivāyāstu manomayāya /
analyzed: namaḥ śivāya astu nirāmayāya namaḥ śivāya astu manaḥ mayāya

original: namo bhavāyāstu bhavodbhavāya namo 'stu te dhvastamanobhavāya /

original: namo 'stu te gūḍhamahāvratāya namo 'stu māyāgahanāśrayāya // MatsP_154.260 //
analyzed: namaḥ stu te gūḍha mahā vratāya namaḥ stu māyā gahana āśrayāya

original: namo 'stu śarvāya namaḥ śivāya namo 'stu siddhāya purātanāya /
analyzed: namaḥ stu śarvāya namaḥ śivāya namaḥ stu siddhāya purātanāya

original: namo 'stu kālāya namaḥ kalāya namo 'stu te jñānavarapradāya // MatsP_154.261 //
analyzed: namaḥ stu kālāya namaḥ kalāya namaḥ stu te jñāna vara pradāya

namaḥ stu ameya andhaka mardakāya namaḥ śaraṇyāya namaḥ guṇāya

original: namo 'stu nānājagatāṃ vidhātre namo 'stu te citraphalaprayoktre // MatsP_154.263 //

original: namo 'stu bhaktābhimatapradātre namaḥ sadā te bhavasaṅgahartre // MatsP_154.264 //
analyzed: namaḥ stu bhakta abhimata pradātre namaḥ sadā te bhava saṅga hartre

original: anantarūpāya sadaiva tubhyam asahyakopāya namo 'stu tubhyam /

original: sāpi karmaṇa evoktā preraṇā vivaśātmanām // MatsP_154.359 //
analyzed: sā api karmaṇaḥ evā uktā preraṇā vivaśa ātmanām
yathā unmāda ādi juṣṭasya matiḥ eva hi sā bhavet
iṣṭāni eva yathā arthāni viparītāni manyate
lokasya vyavahāreṣu sṛṣṭeṣu sahate sadā
dharma adharma phala avāptau viṣṇuḥ eva nibodhitaḥ
atha anādi tvam asya asti sāmānyāt tu tad ātmanā

original: na hyasya jīvitaṃ dīrghaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ dehe tu kutracit // MatsP_154.362 //
analyzed: na hi asya jīvitam dīrgham dṛṣṭam dehe tu kutracid
bhavadbhiḥ yasya naḥ dṛṣṭam antar agram atha api vā
dehinām dharmaḥ eva eṣa kvacid jāyet kacid mriyet
kvacid garbha gataḥ naśyet kvacid jīvet jarā āmayaḥ

original: kvacitsamāḥ śataṃ jīvet kvacidbālye vipadyate // MatsP_154.364 //
analyzed: kvacid samāḥ śatam jīvet kvacid bālye vipadyate
śata āyuḥ puruṣaḥ yaḥ tu saḥ nantaḥ su alpa janmanaḥ

original: jīvito na mriyatyagre tasmātso 'mara ucyate // MatsP_154.365 //
analyzed: jīvitaḥ na mriyati agre tasmāt saḥ maraḥ ucyate
adṛṣṭa janma nidhanāḥ hi evam viṣṇu ādayaḥ matāḥ
etat saṃśuddham aiśvaryam saṃsāre kaḥ labhet iha
tatra kṣaya ādi yogāt tu nānā āścarya svarūpiṇi
tasmāt divaḥ carān sarvān malinān svalpa bhūtikān
na aham bhadrāḥ kila icchāmi ṛte śarvāt pinākinaḥ

original: sthitaṃ ca tāratamyena prāṇināṃ paramaṃ tvidam // MatsP_154.368 //
analyzed: sthitam ca tāratamyena prāṇinām paramam tu idam
dhī bala aiśvarya kārya ādi pramāṇam mahatām mahat
yasmāt na kiṃcid aparam sarvam yasmāt pravartate
yasya aiśvaryam anādi antam tam aham śaraṇam gatā
eṣa me vyavasāyaḥ ca
yāta vā tiṣṭhata eva atha munayaḥ mad vidhāyakāḥ

original: evaṃ niśamya vacanaṃ devyā munivarāstadā // MatsP_154.371 //
analyzed: evam niśamya vacanam devyāḥ muni varāḥ tadā
ānanda aśru parīta akṣāḥ sasvajuḥ tām tapasvinīm

original: ūcuśca paramaprītāḥ śailajāṃ madhuraṃ vacaḥ // MatsP_154.372 //
analyzed: ūcuḥ ca parama prītāḥ śailajām madhuram vacaḥ
ṛṣayaḥ ūcuḥ
atyadbhutā asi aho putri jñāna mūrtiḥ iva amalā
prasādayati naḥ bhāvam bhava bhāva pratiśrayāt
nanu vidmaḥ vayam tasya devasya aiśvaryam adbhutam
tvad niścayasya dṛḍha tām vettum vayam iha āgatāḥ
acirāt eva tanvaṅgi kāmaḥ te yam bhaviṣyati

original: kvādityasya prabhā yāti ratnebhyaḥ kva dyutiḥ pṛthak // MatsP_154.375 //
analyzed: kva ādityasya prabhā yāti ratnebhyaḥ kva dyutiḥ pṛthak

original: ko 'rtho varṇālikāvyaktaḥ kathaṃ tvaṃ giriśaṃ vinā /
analyzed: kaḥ rthaḥ varṇa alika avyaktaḥ katham tvam giriśam vinā
yāmaḥ na eka abhyupāyane tam abhyarthayitum vayam

original: asmākamapi vai so 'rthaḥ sutarāṃ hṛdi vartate /
analyzed: asmākam api vai saḥ rthaḥ sutarām hṛdi vartate

original: atastvameva sā buddhir yato nītistvameva hi // MatsP_154.377 //
analyzed: atas tvam eva sā buddhiḥ yatas nītiḥ tvam eva hi
atas niḥsaṃśayam kāyam vidhāsyati

original: ityuktvā pūjitā yātā munayo girikanyayā // MatsP_154.378 //
analyzed: iti uktvā pūjitāḥ yātāḥ munayaḥ giri kanyayā
prayayuḥ giriśam draṣṭum prastham himavataḥ mahat
gaṅgā ambu plāvita ātmānam piṅga baddha jaṭā saṭam
bhṛṅga anuyāta pāṇi stha mandāra kusuma srajam

original: gireḥ samprāpya te prasthaṃ dadṛśuḥ śaṃkarāśramam // MatsP_154.380 //
analyzed: gireḥ samprāpya te prastham dadṛśuḥ śaṃkara āśramam
praśānta aśeṣa sattva ogham nava stimita kānanam
niḥśabda akṣobha salila prapātam sarvatodiśam
tatra apaśyan tatas dvāri vīrakam vetra pāṇinam

original: sapta te munayaḥ pūjyā vinītāḥ kāryagauravāt // MatsP_154.382 //
analyzed: sapta te munayaḥ pūjyāḥ vinītāḥ kārya gauravāt
ūcuḥ madhura bhāṣiṇyā vācā te vāgminām varāḥ
draṣṭum vayam iha āyātāḥ śaraṇyam gaṇanāyakam
trilocanam vijānīhi sura kārya pracoditāḥ

original: tvameva no gatistattvaṃ yathā kālānatikramaḥ // MatsP_154.384 //
analyzed: tvam eva naḥ gatiḥ tattvam yathā kāla anatikramaḥ
sā prārthanā eṣā prāyeṇa pratīhāra mayaḥ prabhuḥ

original: ityukto munibhiḥ so 'tha gauravāttānuvāca saḥ // MatsP_154.385 //
analyzed: iti uktaḥ munibhiḥ saḥ tha gauravāt tān uvāca saḥ
savanasya aparām saṃdhyām snātum mandākinī jale

original: kṣaṇena bhavitā viprās tatra drakṣyatha śūlinam // MatsP_154.386 //
analyzed: kṣaṇena bhavitā viprāḥ tatra drakṣyatha śūlinam
iti uktāḥ munayaḥ tasthuḥ te tad kāla pratīkṣiṇaḥ
gambhīra ambudharam prāvṛṣ tṛṣitāḥ cātakāḥ yathā
tatas kṣaṇena niṣpanna samādhāna kriyā vidhiḥ
vīrāsanam bibheda īśaḥ mṛga carma nivāsitam
tatas vinītaḥ jānubhyām avalambya mahī sthitim
uvāca vīrakaḥ devam praṇāma eka samāśrayaḥ

original: samprāptā munayaḥ sapta tvāṃ draṣṭuṃ dīptatejasaḥ /
analyzed: samprāptāḥ munayaḥ sapta tvām draṣṭum dīpta tejasaḥ
vibho samādiśa draṣṭum avagantum iha arhasi
te bruvan deva kāryeṇa tava darśana lālasāḥ
iti uktaḥ dhūrjaṭiḥ tena vīrakeṇa mahātmanā

original: bhūbhaṅgasaṃjñayā teṣāṃ praveśājñāṃ dadau tadā // MatsP_154.391 //
analyzed: bhū bhaṅga saṃjñayā teṣām praveśa ājñām dadau tadā
mūrdhnaḥ kampena tān sarvān mahā munīn
ājuhāva avidūra sthān darśanāya pinākinaḥ
tvarā baddha ardha cūḍāḥ te lambamāna ajina ambarāḥ
viviśuḥ vedikām siddhām giriśasya vibhūtibhiḥ
baddha pāṇi puṭa ākṣipta nāka puṣpa utkarāḥ tatas
pināki pāda yugalam vandyam nāka nivāsinām
tatas snigdha īkṣitāḥ śāntāḥ munayaḥ śūlapāṇinā

original: manmathāriṃ tato hṛṣṭāḥ samaṃ tuṣṭuvurādṛtāḥ // MatsP_154.395 //
analyzed: manmathārim tatas hṛṣṭāḥ samam tuṣṭuvuḥ ādṛtāḥ
munayaḥ ūcuḥ

original: aho kṛtārthā vayameva sāṃprataṃ sureśvaro 'pyatra varo bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: aho kṛtārthāḥ vayam eva sāṃpratam sureśvaraḥ pi atra varaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: bhavatprasādāmalavārisekataḥ phalena kācit tapasā niyujyate // MatsP_154.396 //
analyzed: bhavat prasāda amala vāri sekataḥ phalena kācid tapasā niyujyate

original: jayatyasau dhanyataro himācalas tadāśrayaṃ yasya sutā tapasyati /
analyzed: jayati asau dhanyataraḥ himācalaḥ tad āśrayam yasya sutā tapasyati

original: sa daityarājo 'pi mahāphalodayo vimūlitāśeṣasuro hi tārakaḥ // MatsP_154.397 //
analyzed: sa daitya rājaḥ pi mahā phala udayaḥ vimūlita aśeṣa suraḥ hi tārakaḥ

original: tvadīyamaṃśaṃ pravilokya kalmaṣāt svakaṃ śarīraṃ parimokṣyate hi yaḥ /
analyzed: tvadīyam aṃśam pravilokya kalmaṣāt svakam śarīram parimokṣyate hi yaḥ

original: sa dhanyadhīrlokapitā caturmukho hariśca yatsaṃbhramavahnidīpitaḥ // MatsP_154.398 //
analyzed: sa dhanya dhīḥ loka pitā caturmukhaḥ hariḥ ca yad saṃbhrama vahni dīpitaḥ
tvad aṅghri yugmam hṛdayena bibhrataḥ mahā abhitāpa praśama eka hetukam

original: tvameva caiko vividhākṛtakriyaḥ kileti vācā vidhurair vibhāṣyate // MatsP_154.399 //
analyzed: tvam eva ca ekaḥ vividha akṛta kriyaḥ kila iti vācā vidhuraiḥ vibhāṣyate

original: athādya ekastvamavādi nānyathā jagattathā nirghṛṇatāṃ tava spṛśet /
analyzed: atha adya ekaḥ tvam avādi na anyathā jagat tathā nirghṛṇa tām tava spṛśet

original: na vetsi vā duḥkhamidaṃ prajātmakaṃ vihanyate te khalu sarvataḥ kriyā // MatsP_154.400 //
analyzed: na vetsi vā duḥkham idam prajā ātmakam vihanyate te khalu sarvatas kriyā

original: upekṣase cej jagatāmupadravaṃ dayāmayatvaṃ tava kena kathyate /
analyzed: upekṣase ced jagatām upadravam dayā maya tvam tava kena kathyate
sva yoga māyā mahimā guhā āśrayam na vidyate nirmala bhūti gauravam

original: vayaṃ ca te dhanyatarāḥ śarīriṇāṃ yadīdṛśaṃ tvāṃ pravilokayāmahe /
analyzed: vayam ca te dhanyatarāḥ śarīriṇām yadi īdṛśam tvām pravilokayāmahe

original: adarśanaṃ tena manoratho yathā prayāti sāphalyatayā manogatam // MatsP_154.402 //
analyzed: adarśanam tena manorathaḥ yathā prayāti sāphalya tayā manogatam

original: vinemuritthaṃ munayo visṛjya tāṃ giraṃ girīśaśrutibhūmisaṃnidhau // MatsP_154.403 //
analyzed: vinemuḥ ittham munayaḥ visṛjya tām giram girīśa śruti bhūmi saṃnidhau

original: utkṛṣṭakedāra ivāvanītale subījamuṣṭiṃ suphalāya karṣakāḥ // MatsP_154.404 //
analyzed: utkṛṣṭa kedāre iva avanī tale su bīja muṣṭim su phalāya karṣakāḥ

original: teṣāṃ śrutvā tu tāṃ ramyāṃ prakramopakramakriyām /
analyzed: teṣām śrutvā tu tām ramyām prakrama upakrama kriyām
vācam vācaspatiḥ tuṣṭaḥ provāca smita sundarīm
śarvaḥ uvāca
jāne loka vidhānasya kanyā satkāryam uttamam
jātā prāleyaśailasya saṃketaka nirūpaṇāḥ
satyam utkaṇṭhitāḥ sarve deva kārya artham udyatāḥ

original: teṣāṃ tvaranti cetāṃsi kiṃtu kāryaṃ vivakṣitam // MatsP_154.407 //
analyzed: teṣām tvaranti cetāṃsi kiṃtu kāryam vivakṣitam
lokayātrā anugantavyā viśeṣeṇa vicakṣaṇaiḥ

original: sevante te yato dharmaṃ tatprāmāṇyātpare sthitāḥ // MatsP_154.408 //
analyzed: sevante te yatas dharmam tad prāmāṇyāt pare sthitāḥ
iti uktāḥ munayaḥ jagmuḥ tvaritāḥ tu himācalam
tatra te pūjitāḥ tena himaśailena sādaram
ūcuḥ muni varāḥ prītāḥ svalpa varṇam tvarā anvitāḥ
munayaḥ ūcuḥ

original: devo duhitaraṃ sākṣāt pinākī tava mārgate /
analyzed: devaḥ duhitaram sākṣāt pinākī tava mārgate
tat śīghram pāvaya ātmānam āhutyā iva anala arpaṇāt
kāryam etat ca devānām su ciram parivartate
jagat uddharaṇāya eṣa kriyatām vai samudyamaḥ
iti uktaḥ taiḥ tadā śailaḥ harṣa āviṣṭaḥ vadan munīn
asamarthaḥ bhavat vaktum uttaram prārthayan śivam
tatas menā munīn vīkṣya provāca sneha viklavā
duhituḥ tān munīn ca eva caraṇa āśrayam artha vid
menā uvāca
yad artham duhituḥ janma na icchanti api mahā phalam
tat eva upasthitam sarvam prakrameṇa eva sāṃpratam

original: varastasyāpi cāhūya sutā deyā hyayācataḥ // MatsP_154.415 //

iti uktāḥ munayaḥ te tu priyayā himabhūbhṛtaḥ
ūcuḥ punar udāra artham nārī citta prasādakam
munayaḥ ūcuḥ
aiśvaryam avagacchasva śaṃkarasya sura asuraiḥ
ārādhyamāna pāda abja yugala tvāt su nirvṛtaiḥ

original: yasyopayogi yadrūpaṃ sā ca tatprāptaye ciram /

original: ghoraṃ tapasyate bālā tena rūpeṇa nirvṛtiḥ // MatsP_154.419 //
analyzed: ghoram tapasyate bālā tena rūpeṇa nirvṛtiḥ

analyzed: tatra sā avahitā tāvat tasmāt sā eva bhaviṣyati

original: ityuktvā giriṇā sārdhaṃ te yayuryatra śailajā /
analyzed: iti uktvā giriṇā sārdham te yayuḥ yatra śailajā
jita arka jvalana jvālā tapaḥ tejaḥ mayī hi umā

original: ramyaṃ priyaṃ manohāri mā rūpaṃ tapasā daha // MatsP_154.422 //
analyzed: ramyam priyam manohāri mā rūpam tapasā daha

original: prātaste śaṃkaraḥ pāṇim eṣa putri grahīṣyati /

original: pitrā saha gṛhaṃ gaccha vayaṃ yāmaḥ svamandiram // MatsP_154.424 //
analyzed: pitrā saha gṛham gaccha vayam yāmaḥ sva mandiram

original: ityuktā tapasaḥ satyaṃ phalamastīti cintya sā /
analyzed: iti uktā tapasaḥ satyam phalam asti iti cintya sā
tvaramāṇā yayau veśma pituḥ divya artha śobhitam

original: sā tatra rajanīṃ mene varṣāyutasamāṃ satī /
analyzed: sā tatra rajanīm mene varṣa ayuta samām satī
hara darśana saṃjāta mahā utkaṇṭhā himādrijā

original: tato muhūrte brāhme tu tasyāścakruḥ surastriyaḥ /
analyzed: tatas muhūrte brāhme tu tasyāḥ cakruḥ sura striyaḥ
nānā maṅgala saṃdohān yathāvat krama pūrvakam
divya maṇḍanam aṅgānām mandire bahu maṅgale

original: upāsata giriṃ mūrtā ṛtavaḥ sārvakāmikāḥ // MatsP_154.428 //
analyzed: upāsata girim mūrtāḥ ṛtavaḥ sārvakāmikāḥ
vāyavaḥ vāridāḥ ca āsan saṃmārjana vidhau gireḥ

original: harmyeṣu śrīḥ svayaṃ devī kṛtanānāprasādhanā // MatsP_154.429 //
analyzed: harmyeṣu śrīḥ svayam devī kṛta nānā prasādhanā
kāntiḥ sarveṣu bhāveṣu ṛddhiḥ ca abhavat ākulā
cintāmaṇi prabhṛtayaḥ ratnāḥ śailam samantataḥ
upatasthuḥ nagāḥ ca api kalpa kāma mahā drumāḥ
oṣadhyaḥ mūrtimatyaḥ ca divya oṣadhi samanvitāḥ
rasāḥ ca dhātavaḥ ca eva sarve śailasya kiṃkarāḥ

original: nadyaḥ samudrā nikhilāḥ sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ ca yat /
analyzed: nadyaḥ samudrāḥ nikhilāḥ sthāvaram jaṅgamam ca yat
tat sarvam himaśailasya mahimānam avardhayat
abhavan munayaḥ nāgāḥ yakṣa gandharva kiṃnarāḥ
śaṃkarasya api vibudhāḥ gandhamādana parvate
sarve maṇḍana saṃbhārāḥ tasthuḥ nirmala mūrtayaḥ
śarvasya api jaṭā jūṭe candra khaṇḍam pitāmahaḥ
babandha praṇaya udāra visphārita vilocanaḥ
kapāla mālām vipulām cāmuṇḍā mūrdhni abandhayat

original: uvāca cāpi vacanaṃ putraṃ janaya śaṃkara /
analyzed: uvāca ca api vacanam putram janaya śaṃkara

original: yo daityendrakulaṃ hatvā māṃ raktaistarpayiṣyati // MatsP_154.437 //
analyzed: yaḥ daitya indra kulam hatvā mām raktaiḥ tarpayiṣyati

original: bhujagābharaṇaṃ gṛhya sajjaṃ śaṃbhoḥ puro 'bhavat // MatsP_154.438 //
analyzed: bhujaga ābharaṇam gṛhya sajjam śaṃbhoḥ puras bhavat
śakraḥ gaja ajinam tasya vasā abhyakta agra pallavam
dadhre sarabhasam svid yat vistīrṇa mukha paṅkajam
vāyuḥ ca vipulam tīkṣṇa śṛṅgam himagiri prabham
vṛṣam vibhūṣayāmāsa hara yānam mahā ojasam
vitenuḥ nayana antaḥsthāḥ śambhoḥ sūrya anala indavaḥ

original: svāṃ dyutiṃ lokanāthasya jagataḥ karmasākṣiṇaḥ // MatsP_154.441 //
analyzed: svām dyutim loka nāthasya jagataḥ karma sākṣiṇaḥ

original: manujāsthimayīṃ mālām ābabandha ca pāṇinā // MatsP_154.442 //
analyzed: manuja asthi mayīm mālām ābabandha ca pāṇinā

original: karṇottaṃsaṃ cakāreśo vāsukiṃ takṣakaṃ svayam // MatsP_154.444 //
analyzed: karṇa uttaṃsam cakāra īśaḥ vāsukim takṣakam svayam

original: tatastu te gaṇādhīśā vinayāttatra vīrakam // MatsP_154.445 //
analyzed: tatas tu te gaṇādhīśāḥ vinayāt tatra vīrakam

sapta vāridhayaḥ tasthuḥ kartum darpaṇa vibhramam
tatas vilokita ātmānam mahā ambudhi jala udare
dharām āliṅgya jānubhyām sthāṇum provāca keśavaḥ
śobhase deva rūpeṇa jagat ānanda dāyinā
mātaraḥ prerayan kāma vadhūm vaidhavya cihnitām
kālaḥ yam iti ca ālakṣya prakāra iṅgita saṃjñayā
tatas tāḥ coditāḥ devam ūcuḥ prahasita ānanāḥ

original: ratiḥ purastava prāptā nābhāti madanojjhitā // MatsP_154.450 //
analyzed: ratiḥ puras tava prāptā nā ābhāti madana ujjhitā
tatas tām saṃnirvāya āha vāma hasta agra saṃjñayā

original: tato haro himagirikandarākṛtiṃ sitaṃ kaśāmṛduhatibhiḥ pracodayat /
analyzed: tatas haraḥ himagiri kandara ākṛtim sitam kaśā mṛdu hatibhiḥ pracodayat

original: mahāvṛṣaṃ gaṇatumulāhitekṣaṇaṃ sa bhūdharānaśaniriva prakampayan // MatsP_154.452 //
analyzed: mahā vṛṣam gaṇa tumula āhita īkṣaṇam sa bhūdharān aśaniḥ iva prakampayan
tatas hariḥ druta pada paddhatiḥ puras puraḥsarān druma nikareṣu saṃśritān

original: dharārajaḥśabalitabhūṣaṇo 'bravīt prayāta mā kuruta patho 'sya saṃkaṭam // MatsP_154.453 //
analyzed: dharā rajaḥ śabalita bhūṣaṇaḥ bravīt prayāta mā kuruta pathaḥ sya saṃkaṭam

original: prabhoḥ punaḥ prathamaniyogamūrjayan suto 'bravīd bhrukuṭimukho 'pi vīrakaḥ /
analyzed: prabhoḥ punar prathama niyogam ūrjayan sutaḥ bravīt bhrukuṭi mukhaḥ pi vīrakaḥ

original: viyaccarā viyati kimasti kāntakaṃ prayāta no dharaṇidharāvidūrataḥ // MatsP_154.454 //
analyzed: viyat carāḥ viyati kim asti kāntakam prayāta naḥ dharaṇidhara avidūrataḥ
mahā arṇavāḥ kuruta śilā upamam payaḥ suradviṣa āgamana mahā ati kardamam

original: gaṇeśvarāś capalatayā na gamyatāṃ sureśvaraiḥ sthiramatibhir nirīkṣyate // MatsP_154.455 //
analyzed: gaṇeśvarāḥ capala tayā na gamyatām sura īśvaraiḥ sthira matibhiḥ nirīkṣyate

original: na bhṛṅgiṇā svatanumavekṣya nīyate pinākinaḥ pṛthumukhamaṇḍam agrataḥ /
analyzed: na bhṛṅgiṇā sva tanum avekṣya nīyate pinākinaḥ pṛthu mukha maṇḍam agratas

original: vṛthā yamaḥ prakaṭitadantakoṭaraṃ tvamāyudhaṃ vahasi vihāya saṃbhramam // MatsP_154.456 //
analyzed: vṛthā yamaḥ prakaṭita danta koṭaram tvam āyudham vahasi vihāya saṃbhramam

original: padaṃ na yadrathaturagaiḥ puradviṣaḥ pramucyate bahutaramātṛsaṃkulam /
analyzed: padam na yat ratha turagaiḥ puradviṣaḥ pramucyate bahutara mātṛ saṃkulam

original: amī surāḥ pṛthaganuyāyibhirvṛtāḥ padātayo dviguṇapathān harapriyāḥ // MatsP_154.457 //
analyzed: amī surāḥ pṛthak anuyāyibhiḥ vṛtāḥ padātayaḥ dviguṇa pathān hara priyāḥ
sva vāhanaiḥ pavana vidhūta cāmaraiḥ cala dhvajaiḥ vrajata vihāra śālibhiḥ

original: surāḥ svakaṃ kimiti sarāgamūrjitaṃ vicāryate niyatalayatrayānugam // MatsP_154.458 //
analyzed: surāḥ svakam kim iti sa rāgam ūrjitam vicāryate niyata laya traya anugam

original: na kiṃnarair abhibhavituṃ hi śakyate vibhūṣaṇacayasamudbhavo dhvaniḥ /
analyzed: na kiṃnaraiḥ abhibhavitum hi śakyate vibhūṣaṇa caya samudbhavaḥ dhvaniḥ

original: ajātijāḥ kimiti na ṣaḍjamadhyam apṛthusvaraṃ bahutaramatra vakṣyate // MatsP_154.459 //
analyzed: ajāti jāḥ kim iti na ṣaḍja madhyam a pṛthu svaram bahutaram atra vakṣyate
gatāḥ pṛthak tayā samaya kṛtāḥ vibhinna tām

original: viśaṅkitā bhavadatibhedaśīlinaḥ prayāntyamī drutapadameva gauḍakāḥ // MatsP_154.460 //
analyzed: viśaṅkitāḥ bhavat ati bheda śīlinaḥ prayānti amī druta padam eva gauḍakāḥ

original: visaṃhatāḥ kimiti na ṣāḍgavādayaḥ svagītakair lalitapadaprayogajaiḥ /
analyzed: visaṃhatāḥ kim iti na ṣāḍgava ādayaḥ sva gītakaiḥ lalita pada prayoga jaiḥ

original: prabhoḥ puro bhavati hi yasya cākṣataṃ samudgatārthakamiti tatpratīyate // MatsP_154.461 //
analyzed: prabhoḥ puras bhavati hi yasya ca akṣatam samudgata arthakam iti tat pratīyate
amī pṛthak viracita ramya rāsakam vilāsinaḥ bahu gamaka svabhāvakam
prayuñjate giriśa yaśaḥ visāriṇam prakīrṇakam bahutara nāga jātayaḥ

original: amī kathaṃ kakubhi kathāḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ dhvananti te vividhavadhūvimiśritāḥ /
analyzed: amī katham kakubhi kathāḥ pratikṣaṇam dhvananti te vividha vadhū vimiśritāḥ

original: na jātayo dhvanimurajāsamīritā na mūrchitāḥ kimiti ca mūrchanātmakāḥ // MatsP_154.463 //
analyzed: na jātayaḥ dhvani murajā samīritāḥ na mūrchitāḥ kim iti ca mūrchana ātmakāḥ
śruti priya krama gati bheda sādhanam tata ādikam kim iti na tumbara īritam

original: na hanyate bahuvidhavādyaḍambaraṃ prakīrṇavīṇāmurajādi nāma yat // MatsP_154.464 //*
analyzed: na hanyate bahuvidha vādya ḍambaram prakīrṇa vīṇā murajā ādi nāma yat

original: itīrate girimavadhānaśālinaḥ surāsurāḥ sapadi tu vīrakājñayā /
analyzed: iti īrate girim avadhāna śālinaḥ sura asurāḥ sapadi tu vīraka ājñayā

original: niyāmitāḥ prayayuratīva harṣitāś carācaraṃ jagadakhilaṃ hyapūrayan // MatsP_154.465 //
analyzed: niyāmitāḥ prayayuḥ atīva harṣitāḥ carācaram jagat akhilam hi apūrayan
iti stanat kakubhi rasat mahārṇave stanat ghane vidalita śaila kaṃdare

original: jagatyabhūttumula ivākulīkṛtaḥ pinākinā tvaritagatena bhūdharaḥ // MatsP_154.466 //
analyzed: jagati abhūt tumulaḥ iva ākulīkṛtaḥ pinākinā tvarita gatena bhūdharaḥ
parijvalat kanaka sahasra toraṇam kvacid milat marakata veśma vedikam

original: kvacit kvacid vimalavidūravedikaṃ kvacid galajjaladhararamyanirjharam // MatsP_154.467 //
analyzed: kvacid kvacid vimala vidūra vedikam kvacid galat jaladhara ramya nirjharam
calat dhvaja pravara sahasra maṇḍitam sura druma stabaka vikīrṇa catvaram
sita asita aruṇa ruci dhātu varṇikam śriyā ujjvalam pravitata mārga gopuram
vijṛmbhita apratima dhvani vāridam sugandhibhiḥ pura pavanaiḥ manoharam
haraḥ mahā giri nagaram samāsadat kṣaṇāt iva pravara sura asura stutaḥ
tam praviśantam agāt pravilokya vyākula tām nagaram giri bhartuḥ
vyagra purandhri janam jaya yuktam dhāvita mārga jana ākula rathyam
harmya gavākṣa gata amara nārī locana nīla saroruha mālam
su prakaṭā samadṛśyata kācid sva ābharaṇa aṃśu vitāna vigūḍhā
kā api akhilīkṛta maṇḍana bhūṣā tyakta sakhī praṇayā haram aikṣat

original: kāciduvāca kalaṃ gatamānā kātaratāṃ sakhi mā kuru mūḍhe // MatsP_154.472 //
analyzed: kācid uvāca kalam gata mānā kātara tām sakhi mā kuru mūḍhe

original: dagdhamanobhava eva pinākī kāmayate svayameva vihartum /
analyzed: dagdha manobhavaḥ eva pinākī kāmayate svayam eva vihartum

original: kācidapi svayameva patantī prāha parāṃ virahaskhalitāṅgīm // MatsP_154.473 //
analyzed: kācid api svayam eva patantī prāha parām viraha skhalita aṅgīm

original: mā capale madanavyatiṣaṅgaṃ śaṃkarajaṃ skhalanena vada tvam /
analyzed: mā capale madana vyatiṣaṅgam śaṃkara jam skhalanena vada tvam
kā api kṛta vyavadhānam a dṛṣṭvā yukti vaśāt giriśaḥ hi ayam ūce

original: eṣa sa yatra sahasramakhādyā nākasadāmadhipāḥ svayamuktaiḥ /
analyzed: eṣa sa yatra sahasra makha ādyāḥ nākasadām adhipāḥ svayam uktaiḥ

original: nāmabhir indujaṭaṃ nijasevā-prāptaphalāya natāstu ghaṭante // MatsP_154.475 //
analyzed: nāmabhiḥ indu jaṭam nija sevā prāpta phalāya natāḥ tu ghaṭante

original: eṣa na caiṣa sa eṣa yadagre carmaparītatanuḥ śaśimaulī /
analyzed: eṣa na ca eṣa saḥ eṣa yad agre carma parīta tanuḥ śaśimaulī
dhāvati vajradharaḥ mararājaḥ mārgam amum vivṛtī karaṇāya
eṣa sa padma bhavaḥ yam upetya prāṃśu jaṭā mṛga carma nigūḍhaḥ

original: sapraṇayaṃ karaghaṭṭitavaktraḥ kiṃciduvāca mitaṃ śrutimūle // MatsP_154.477 //
analyzed: sa praṇayam kara ghaṭṭita vaktraḥ kiṃcid uvāca mitam śruti mūle
evam abhūt sura nāri kulānām citta visaṃṣṭhulatā guru rāgāt

original: śaṃkarasaṃśrayaṇād girijāyāj-anmaphalaṃ paramaṃ tviti cocuḥ // MatsP_154.478 //
analyzed: śaṃkara saṃśrayaṇāt girijāyāḥ janma phalam paramam tu iti ca ūcuḥ
tatas himagireḥ veśma viśvakarma niveditam
mahānīla maya stambham jvalat kāñcana kuṭṭimam
muktā jāla pariṣkāram jvalita auṣadhi dīpitam
krīḍā udyāna sahasra āḍhyam kāñcana ambuja dīrghikam
mahendra pramukhāḥ sarve surāḥ dṛṣṭvā tat adbhutam

original: netrāṇi saphalānyadya manobhiriti te dadhuḥ // MatsP_154.481 //
analyzed: netrāṇi saphalāni adya manobhiḥ iti te
vimarda kṣīṇa keyūrāḥ hariṇāḥ dvāri rodhitāḥ
kathaṃcid pramukhāḥ tatra viviśuḥ nāka vāsinaḥ
praṇatena acala indreṇa caturmukhaḥ
cakāra vidhinā sarvam vidhi mantra puraḥsaram
śarvasya pāṇigrahaṇam agni sākṣikam akṣatam

original: dātā mahībhṛtāṃ nātho hotā devaścaturmukhaḥ // MatsP_154.484 //
analyzed: dātā mahībhṛtām nāthaḥ hotā devaḥ caturmukhaḥ
varaḥ paśupatiḥ sākṣāt kanyā viśvāraṇiḥ tathā
carācarāṇi bhūtāni sura asura varāṇi ca
tatra api ete niyamataḥ hi abhavan vyagra mūrtayaḥ
mumoca abhinavān sarvān sasya śālīn rasa oṣadhīḥ
vyagrā tu pṛthivī devī sarva bhāva manoramā
gṛhītvā varuṇaḥ sarva ratnāni ābharaṇāni ca
puṇyāni ca pavitrāṇi nānā ratna mayāni tu

original: tasthau sābharaṇo devo harṣadaḥ sarvadehinām // MatsP_154.488 //
analyzed: tasthau sa ābharaṇaḥ devaḥ harṣa daḥ sarva dehinām
dhanadaḥ ca api divyāni haimāni ābharaṇāni ca
jātarūpa vicitrāṇi prayataḥ samupasthitaḥ
vāyuḥ vavau su surabhiḥ sukha saṃsparśanaḥ vibhuḥ
chatram indu kara udbhāsi susitam ca śatakratuḥ
jagrāha muditaḥ sragvī bāhubhiḥ bahu bhūṣaṇaiḥ
jaguḥ gandharva mukhyāḥ ca nanṛtuḥ ca apsaraḥ gaṇāḥ
vādayantaḥ ti madhuram jaguḥ gandharva kiṃnarāḥ

original: mūrtāśca ṛtavastatra jaguśca nanṛtuśca vai // MatsP_154.492 //
analyzed: mūrtāḥ ca ṛtavaḥ tatra jaguḥ ca nanṛtuḥ ca vai
capalāḥ ca gaṇāḥ tasthuḥ lolayantaḥ himācalam
uttiṣṭhan kramaśas ca atra viśvabhuj bhaga netra hā
cakāra audvāhikam kṛtyam patnyā saha yathocitam
datta arghaḥ giri rājena sura vṛndaiḥ vinoditaḥ

original: avasattāṃ kṣapāṃ tatra patnyā saha purāntakaḥ /
analyzed: avasat tām kṣapām tatra patnyā saha pura antakaḥ
tatas gandharva gītena nṛtyena apsarasām api
stutibhiḥ deva daityānām vibuddhaḥ vibudha adhipaḥ
āmantrya himaśaila indram prabhāte ca umayā saha
jagāma mandara girim vāyu vegena śṛṅgiṇā

original: tato gate bhagavati nīlalohite sahomayā ratimalabhanna bhūdharaḥ /
analyzed: tatas gate bhagavati nīlalohite saha umayā ratim alabhat na bhūdharaḥ

original: sabāndhavo bhavati ca kasya no mano vihvalaṃ ca jagati hi kanyakāpituḥ // MatsP_154.497 //
analyzed: sa bāndhavaḥ bhavati ca kasya naḥ manaḥ vihvalam ca jagati hi kanyakā pituḥ
jvalat maṇi sphaṭika hāṭaka utkaṭam sphuṭa dyuti sphaṭika gopuram puram

original: haro girau ciramanukalpitaṃ tadā visarjitāmaranivaho 'viśatsvakam // MatsP_154.498 //
analyzed: haraḥ girau ciram anukalpitam tadā visarjita amara nivahaḥ viśat svakam
tadā umā sahitaḥ devaḥ vijahāra bhaga akṣi hā

original: purodyāneṣu ramyeṣu vivikteṣu vaneṣu ca // MatsP_154.499 //
analyzed: pura udyāneṣu ramyeṣu vivikteṣu vaneṣu ca
su rakta hṛdayaḥ devyā makarāṅka puraḥsaraḥ

original: tato bahutithe kāle sutakāmā gireḥ sutā // MatsP_154.500 //
analyzed: tatas bahutithe kāle suta kāmā gireḥ sutā
sakhībhiḥ sahitā krīḍām cakre kṛtrima putrakaiḥ
kadācid gandha tailena gātram abhyajya śailajā
cūrṇaiḥ udvartayāmāsa malina antaritām tanum

original: tadudvartanakaṃ gṛhya naraṃ cakre gajānanam // MatsP_154.502 //
analyzed: tat udvartanakam gṛhya naram cakre gajānanam
putrakam krīḍatī devī tam ca api arpayat ambhasi
jāhnavyāḥ tu śivā sakhyāḥ tatas saḥ bhūt bṛhat vapuḥ
kāyena ati viśālena jagat āpūrayat tadā

original: putretyuvāca te devī putretyūce ca jāhnavī // MatsP_154.504 //
analyzed: putra iti uvāca te devī putra iti ūce ca jāhnavī
gāṅgeyaḥ iti devaiḥ tu pūjitaḥ bhūt gajānanaḥ
vināyaka ādhipatyam ca dadau asya pitāmahaḥ

original: punaḥ sā krīḍanaṃ cakre putrārthaṃ varavarṇinī /
analyzed: punar sā krīḍanam cakre putra artham varavarṇinī
manojñam aṅkuram rūḍham aśokasya śubha ānanā
vardhayāmāsa tam ca api kṛta saṃskāra maṅgalā
bṛhaspati mukhaiḥ vipraiḥ divaspati purogamaiḥ

original: tato devaiśca munibhiḥ proktā devī tvidaṃ vacaḥ /
analyzed: tatas devaiḥ ca munibhiḥ proktā devī tu idam vacaḥ

original: bhavāni bhavatī bhavyā sambhūtā lokabhūtaye // MatsP_154.508 //
analyzed: bhavāni bhavatī bhavyā sambhūtā loka bhūtaye
prāyas suta phalaḥ lokaḥ putra pautraiḥ ca labhyate

original: aputrāśca prajāḥ prāyo dṛśyante daivahetavaḥ // MatsP_154.509 //
analyzed: aputrāḥ ca prajāḥ prāyas dṛśyante daiva hetavaḥ
adhunā darśite mārge maryādām kartum arhasi
phalam kim bhavitā devi kalpitaiḥ taru putrakaiḥ

original: ityuktā harṣapūrṇāṅgī provācomā śubhāṃ giram // MatsP_154.510 //
analyzed: iti uktā harṣa pūrṇa aṅgī provāca umā śubhām giram

original: evaṃ nirudake deśe yaḥ kūpaṃ kārayedbudhaḥ /
analyzed: evam nirudake deśe yaḥ kūpam kārayet budhaḥ

original: bindau bindau ca toyasya vasetsaṃvatsaraṃ divi // MatsP_154.511 //
analyzed: bindau bindau ca toyasya vaset saṃvatsaram divi
daśa kūpa samā vāpī daśa vāpī samaḥ hradaḥ
daśa hrada samaḥ putraḥ daśa putra samaḥ drumaḥ

original: eṣaiva mama maryādā niyatā lokabhāvinī // MatsP_154.512 //
analyzed: eṣā eva mama maryādā niyatā loka bhāvinī
iti uktāḥ tu tatas viprāḥ bṛhaspati purogamāḥ

original: jagmuḥ svamandirāṇyeva bhavānīṃ vandya sādaram // MatsP_154.513 //
analyzed: jagmuḥ sva mandirāṇi eva bhavānīm vandya sādaram
gateṣu teṣu devaḥ pi śaṃkaraḥ parvatātmajām
pāṇinā ālambya vāmena śanais prāveśayat śubhām
citta prasāda jananam prāsādam anu gopuram
nirdhauta kaladhautam ca krīḍā guha manoramam
prakīrṇa kusuma āmoda matta ali kula kūjitam
kiṃnara udgīta saṃgīta gṛha antarita bhittikam
sugandhi dhūpa saṃghāta manaḥ prārthyam alakṣitam
krīḍat mayūra nārībhiḥ vṛtam vai tata vādibhiḥ
haṃsa saṃghāta saṃghuṣṭam sphaṭika stambha vedikam
anāvilam asaṃbhrāntyā bahuśas kiṃnara ākulam
śukaiḥ yatra abhihanyante padmarāga vinirmitāḥ
bhittayaḥ dāḍima bhrāntyā pratibimbita mauktikāḥ
tatra akṣa krīḍayā devī vihartum upacakrame
svaccha indranīla bhū bhāge krīḍane yatra dhiṣṭhitau
vapuḥ sahāya tām prāptau vinoda rasa nirvṛtau
evam prakrīḍatoḥ tatra devī śaṃkarayoḥ tadā
prādurbhavat mahā śabdaḥ tad gṛha udara gocaraḥ
tat śrutvā kautukāt devī kim etat iti śaṃkaram

original: papraccha taṃ śubhatanur haraṃ vismayapūrvakam // MatsP_154.523 //
analyzed: papraccha tam śubha tanuḥ haram vismaya pūrvakam
uvāca devīm na etat te dṛṣṭa pūrvam suvismite

original: ete gaṇeśāḥ krīḍante śaile 'sminmatpriyāḥ sadā // MatsP_154.524 //
analyzed: ete gaṇeśāḥ krīḍante śaile smin mad priyāḥ sadā
tapasā brahmacaryeṇa niyamaiḥ kṣetra sevanaiḥ

original: yairahaṃ toṣitaḥ pūrvaṃ ta ete manujottamāḥ // MatsP_154.525 //
analyzed: yaiḥ aham toṣitaḥ pūrvam te ete manuja uttamāḥ
mad samīpam anuprāptāḥ mama hṛdyāḥ śubha ānane
kāmarūpāḥ mahā utsāhāḥ mahā rūpa guṇa anvitāḥ
karmabhiḥ vismayam teṣām prayāmi bala śālinām
carācarasya jagataḥ sṛṣṭi saṃharaṇa kṣamāḥ
brahma viṣṇu indra gandharvaiḥ sa kiṃnara mahoragaiḥ
pi aham nityam na ebhiḥ virahitaḥ rame

original: hṛdyā me cārusarvāṅgi ta ete krīḍitā girau /
analyzed: hṛdyāḥ me cāru sarva aṅgi te ete krīḍitāḥ girau

original: ityuktā tu tato devī tyaktvā tadvismayākulā // MatsP_154.529 //
analyzed: iti uktā tu tatas devī tyaktvā tad vismaya ākulā
gavākṣa antaram āsādya prekṣate vismita ānanā

original: yāvantaste kṛśā dīrghā hrasvāḥ sthūlā mahodarāḥ // MatsP_154.530 //
analyzed: yāvantaḥ te kṛśāḥ dīrghāḥ hrasvāḥ sthūlāḥ mahā udarāḥ
vyāghra ibha vadanāḥ kecid kecid meṣa aja rūpiṇaḥ
aneka prāṇi rūpāḥ ca jvālā āsyāḥ kṛṣṇa piṅgalāḥ
saumyāḥ bhīmāḥ smita mukhāḥ kṛṣṇa piṅga jaṭā saṭāḥ
nānā vihaṅga vadanāḥ nānāvidha mṛga ānanāḥ
kauśeya carma vasanāḥ nagnāḥ ca anye virūpiṇaḥ
go karṇāḥ gaja karṇāḥ ca bahu vaktra īkṣaṇa udarāḥ
bahu pādāḥ bahu bhujāḥ divya nānā astra pāṇayaḥ
aneka kusuma āpīḍāḥ nānā vyāla vibhūṣaṇāḥ
vṛka ānana āyudha dharāḥ nānā kavaca bhūṣaṇāḥ
vicitra vāhana ārūḍhāḥ divya rūpāḥ viyat carāḥ
vīṇā vādya mukha udghuṣṭāḥ nānā sthānaka nartakāḥ

original: gaṇeśāṃstāṃstathā dṛṣṭvā devī provāca śaṃkaram // MatsP_154.536 //
analyzed: gaṇeśān tān tathā dṛṣṭvā devī provāca śaṃkaram

original: jagrāha ca gadāṃ divyāṃ hemajālapariṣkṛtām // MatsP_160.19 //

jaghne kumāram gadayā niṣṭapta kanaka aṅgadaḥ

original: bibheda tārakaḥ kruddhaḥ sa sainye 'suranāyakaḥ // MatsP_160.21 //

original: hato 'syadya mayā śaktyā smara śastraṃ suśikṣitam // MatsP_160.24 //

original: ityuktvā ca tataḥ śaktiṃ mumoca ditijaṃ prati /

original: saṃdhyāmupāsya yaḥ pūrvāṃ skandasya caritaṃ paṭhet /

original: sa muktaḥ kilbiṣaiḥ sarvair mahādhanapatirbhavet // MatsP_160.32 //
analyzed: sa muktaḥ kilbiṣaiḥ sarvaiḥ mahā dhanapatiḥ bhavet

original: ṛṣayo vā na māṃ śāpaiḥ śapeyuḥ prapitāmaha /

original: surahantā sunāmā ca pramatiḥ sumatirvaraḥ // MatsP_161.79 //

original: sragviṇo vāgminaḥ sarve sadaiva caritavratāḥ // MatsP_161.82 //

original: prāptaśca paramaṃ sthānaṃ sa tayoḥ pārśvamāgataḥ // MatsP_171.16 //
analyzed: prāptaḥ ca paramam sthānam sa tayoḥ pārśvam āgataḥ
tasmin api gate putre tṛtīyam asṛjat prabhuḥ
mokṣa pravṛtti kuśalam bhūrbhuvam nāmataḥ vibhum
gopati tvam samāsādya tayoḥ evā agamat gatim
evam putrāḥ trayaḥ pi ete uktāḥ śaṃbhoḥ mahātmanaḥ
tān gṛhītvā sutān tasya prayātaḥ sva arjitām gatim

original: nakṣatrāṇi ca somāya tadā vai dattavānṛṣiḥ // MatsP_171.31 //
analyzed: nakṣatrāṇi ca somāya tadā vai dattavān ṛṣiḥ

original: devī sarasvatī caiva brahmaṇā nirmitāḥ purā /

analyzed: prāpnoti vividham puṇyam viṣṇu bhaktaḥ dhanāni ca

matsyaḥ uvāca

candra arka kiraṇa uddyotam giri kūṭam iva ucchritam

śakti citra bala udagram śaṅkha cakra gadā dharam
sarva loka manaḥ kāntam sarva sattva manoharam
nāna vimāna viṭapam toyada ambu madhu sravam
vidyā ahaṃkāra sāra āḍhyam mahābhūta prarohaṇam
viśeṣa patraiḥ nicitam graha nakṣatra puṣpitam

sāgara ākāra nirhrādam rasātala mahā āśrayam

mahābhūta taraṅga ogham graha nakṣatra budbudam

jantu matsya gaṇa ākīrṇam śaila śaṅkha kulaiḥ yutam

saṃdhyā saṃkhyā ūrmi salilam suparṇa anila sevitam

śrī kīrti kānti lakṣmībhiḥ nadībhiḥ upaśobhitam

anugraha karam devam praśānti karaṇam śubham

ananta raśmibhiḥ yukte vistīrṇe meru gahvare

original: dadṛśuste sthitaṃ devaṃ divye lokamaye rathe /
