analyzed: te kṛtāñjalayaḥ sarve devāḥ śakra purogamāḥ
jayaśabdam puraskṛtya śaraṇyam śaraṇam gatāḥ

original: sa teṣāṃ tāṃ giraṃ śrutvā viṣṇurdaivatadaivatam // MatsP_172.42 //
analyzed: sa teṣām tām giram śrutvā viṣṇuḥ daivata daivatam
manaḥ cakre vināśāya dānavānām mahā mṛdhe

original: ākāśe tu sthito viṣṇur uttamaṃ vapurāsthitaḥ // MatsP_172.43 //
analyzed: ākāśe tu sthitaḥ viṣṇuḥ uttamam vapuḥ āsthitaḥ
uvāca devatāḥ sarvāḥ sapratijñam idam vacaḥ

original: śāntiṃ vrajata bhadraṃ vo mā bhaiṣṭa marutāṃ gaṇāḥ // MatsP_172.44 //
analyzed: śāntim vrajata bhadram vaḥ mā bhaiṣṭa marutām gaṇāḥ

original: jitā me dānavāḥ sarve trailokyaṃ parigṛhyatām /
analyzed: jitāḥ me dānavāḥ sarve trailokyam parigṛhyatām

original: te tasya satyasaṃdhasya viṣṇorvākyena toṣitāḥ // MatsP_172.45 //
analyzed: te tasya satya saṃdhasya viṣṇoḥ vākyena toṣitāḥ
devāḥ prītim samājagmuḥ prāśya amṛtam iva uttamam

original: tatastamaḥ saṃhṛtaṃ tad vineśuśca balāhakāḥ // MatsP_172.46 //
analyzed: tatas tamaḥ saṃhṛtam tat vineśuḥ ca balāhakāḥ

original: pravavuśca śivā vātāḥ praśāntāśca diśo daśa /
analyzed: pravavuḥ ca śivāḥ vātāḥ praśāntāḥ ca diśaḥ daśa
śuddha prabhāṇi jyotīṃṣi somaḥ cakruḥ pradakṣiṇām
na vigraham grahāḥ cakruḥ praśāntāḥ ca api sindhavaḥ
virajaskāḥ abhavan mārgāḥ nāka varga ādayaḥ trayaḥ
yathārtham ūhuḥ saritaḥ na api cukṣubhire rṇavāḥ
āsan śubhāni indriyāṇi narāṇām antarātmasu
mahā ṛṣayaḥ vīta śokāḥ vedān uccais adhīyata

original: yajñeṣu ca haviḥ pākaṃ śivamāpa ca pāvakaḥ // MatsP_172.50 //
analyzed: yajñeṣu ca haviḥ pākam śivam āpa ca pāvakaḥ
pravṛtta dharmāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ lokāḥ mudita mānasāḥ
viṣṇoḥ datta pratijñasya śrutvā ari nidhane giram
matsyapurāṇa
matsyaḥ uvāca
tatas bhayam viṣṇu vacaḥ śrutvā daityāḥ ca dānavāḥ

original: udyogaṃ vipulaṃ cakrur yuddhāya vijayāya ca // MatsP_173.1 //
analyzed: udyogam vipulam cakruḥ yuddhāya vijayāya ca
mayaḥ tu kāñcana mayam tri nalva āyatam akṣayam
catur cakram su vipulam su kalpita mahā yugam
kiṅkiṇī jāla nirghoṣam dvīpi carma pariṣkṛtam
ruciram ratna jālaiḥ ca hema jālaiḥ ca śobhitam
īhāmṛga gaṇa ākīrṇam pakṣi paṅkti virājitam
divya astra tūṇīra dharam payodhara vināditam
svakṣam ratha vara udāram su upastham gagana upamam
gadā parigha sampūrṇam mūrtimantam iva arṇavam
hema keyūra valayam svarṇa maṇḍala kūbaram
sa patāka dhvaja upetam sa ādityam iva mandaram
gaja indra ābhoga vapuṣam kvacid kesari varcasam
yuktam ṛkṣa sahasreṇa samṛddha ambuda nāditam
dīptam ākāśa gam divyam ratham para ratha arujam
adhyatiṣṭhat raṇa ākāṅkṣī merum dīptaḥ iva aṃśumān
tāram utkrośa vistāram sarvam hema mayam ratham
śaila ākāram asaṃbādham nīlāñjana caya upamam
kārṣṇāyasa mayam divyam loha īṣā ābaddha kūbaram
timira udgāri kiraṇam garjantam iva toyadam
loha jālena mahatā sa gavākṣeṇa daṃśitam

original: āyasaiḥ parighaiḥ pūrṇaṃ kṣepaṇīyaiśca mudgaraiḥ // MatsP_173.11 //
analyzed: āyasaiḥ parighaiḥ pūrṇam kṣepaṇīyaiḥ ca mudgaraiḥ
prāsaiḥ pāśaiḥ ca vitataiḥ a saṃyuktaiḥ ca kaṇṭakaiḥ
śobhitam trāsa yānaiḥ ca tomaraiḥ ca paraśvadhaiḥ
udyantam dviṣatām hetoḥ dvitīyam iva mandaram
yuktam khara sahasreṇa saḥ dhyā ārohat ratha uttamam
virocanaḥ tu saṃkruddhaḥ gadā pāṇiḥ avasthitaḥ

original: pramukhe tasya sainyasya dīptaśṛṅga ivācalaḥ // MatsP_173.14 //
analyzed: pramukhe tasya sainyasya dīpta śṛṅgaḥ iva acalaḥ
yuktam ratha sahasreṇa hayagrīvaḥ tu dānavaḥ
syandanam vāhayāmāsa sapatna anīka mardanaḥ
vyāyatam kiṣku sāhasram dhanuḥ visphārayat mahat

original: varāhaḥ pramukhe tasthau sapraroha ivācalaḥ // MatsP_173.16 //
analyzed: varāhaḥ pramukhe tasthau saprarohaḥ iva acalaḥ
kharaḥ tu vikṣaran darpāt netrābhyām roṣa jam jalam
sphurat danta uṣṭha nayanaḥ saṅgrāmam saḥ bhyakāṅkṣata
tvaṣṭā tu aṣṭa gajam ghoram yānam āsthāya dānavaḥ
vyūhitum dānava vyūham paricakrāma vīryavān
śveta śaila pratīkāśaḥ yuddhāya abhimukhe sthitaḥ
ariṣṭaḥ bali putraḥ ca variṣṭhaḥ dri śilā āyudhaḥ
yuddhāya abhimukhaḥ tasthau dharādhara vikampanaḥ
kiśoraḥ tu ati saṃharṣāt kiśoraḥ iti coditaḥ
sa balāḥ dānavāḥ ca eva saṃnahyante yathākramam
abhavat daitya sainyasya madhye raviḥ iva uditaḥ
lambaḥ tu nava megha ābhaḥ pralamba ambara bhūṣaṇaḥ
daitya vyūha gataḥ bhāti sa nīhāraḥ iva aṃśumān
svarbhānuḥ āsya yodhī tu daśana uṣṭha īkṣaṇa āyudhaḥ
hasan tiṣṭhati daityānām pramukhe sa mahā grahaḥ
anye haya gatāḥ tatra gaja skandha gatāḥ pare
siṃha vyāghra gatāḥ ca anye varāha ṛkṣeṣu ca apare
kecid khara uṣṭra yātāraḥ kecid śvāpada vāhanāḥ
pattinaḥ tu apare daityāḥ bhīṣaṇāḥ vikṛta ānanāḥ
eka pāda ardha pādāḥ ca nanṛtuḥ yuddha kāṅkṣiṇaḥ
āsphoṭayantaḥ bahavaḥ kṣveḍantaḥ ca tathā pare
hṛṣṭa śārdūla nirghoṣāḥ neduḥ dānava puṃgavāḥ
te gadā parighaiḥ ugraiḥ śilā musala pāṇayaḥ

original: bāhubhiḥ parighākārais tarjayanti sma devatāḥ // MatsP_173.28 //
analyzed: bāhubhiḥ parigha ākāraiḥ tarjayanti sma devatāḥ
pāśaiḥ prāsaiḥ ca parighaiḥ tomara aṅkuśa paṭṭiśaiḥ
cikrīḍuḥ te śataghnībhiḥ śatadhāraiḥ ca mudgaraiḥ
gaṇḍaśailaiḥ ca śailaiḥ ca parighaiḥ ca uttama āyasaiḥ

original: cakraiśca daityapravarāś cakrur ānanditaṃ balam // MatsP_173.30 //
analyzed: cakraiḥ ca daitya pravarāḥ cakruḥ ānanditam balam
etat dānava sainyam tat sarvam yuddha mada utkaṭam
devān abhimukhe tasthau megha anīkam iva uddhatam
tat adbhutam daitya sahasra gāḍham vāyu agni śaila ambuda toya kalpam
balam raṇa ogha abhyudaye bhyudīrṇam yuyutsayā unmattam iva ābabhāse
matsyapurāṇa
matsyaḥ uvāca
śrutaḥ te daitya sainyasya vistāraḥ ravinandana

original: surāṇāmapi sainyasya vistāraṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ śṛṇu // MatsP_174.1 //
analyzed: surāṇām api sainyasya vistāram vaiṣṇavam śṛṇu

original: ādityā vasavo rudrā aśvinau ca mahābalau /
analyzed: ādityāḥ vasavaḥ rudrāḥ aśvinau ca mahā balau
sa balāḥ sa anugāḥ ca eva saṃnahyanta yathākramam
puruhūtaḥ tu puratas lokapālaḥ sahasradṛś
grāmaṇīḥ sarva devānām āruroha sura dvipam
madhye ca asya rathaḥ sarva pakṣi pravara haṃsaḥ
su cāru cakra caraṇaḥ hema vajra pariṣkṛtaḥ
deva gandharva yakṣa oghaiḥ anuyātaḥ sahasraśas
dīptimadbhiḥ sadasyaiḥ ca brahmarṣibhiḥ abhiṣṭutaḥ
vajra visphūrjita udbhūtaiḥ vidyut indrāyudha uditaiḥ
yuktaḥ balāhaka gaṇaiḥ parvataiḥ iva kāmagaiḥ

original: yamārūḍhaḥ sa bhagavān paryeti sakalaṃ jagat /
analyzed: yam ārūḍhaḥ sa bhagavān paryeti sakalam jagat

original: havirdhāneṣu gāyanti viprā makhamukhe sthitāḥ // MatsP_174.7 //
analyzed: havirdhāneṣu gāyanti viprāḥ makha mukhe sthitāḥ
svarge śakra anuyāteṣu deva tūrya ninādiṣu
sundaryaḥ parinṛtyanti psarasām gaṇāḥ
ketunā nāga rājena rājamānaḥ yathā raviḥ
yuktaḥ haya sahasreṇa manaḥ māruta raṃhasā

original: sa syandanavaro bhāti gupto mātalinā tadā /
analyzed: sa syandana varaḥ bhāti guptaḥ mātalinā tadā

original: kṛtsnaḥ parivṛto merur bhāskarasyeva tejasā // MatsP_174.10 //
analyzed: kṛtsnaḥ parivṛtaḥ meruḥ bhāskarasya iva tejasā
yamaḥ tu daṇḍam udyamya kāla yuktaḥ ca mudgaram
tasthau sura gaṇa anīke daityān nādena bhīṣayan
caturbhiḥ sāgaraiḥ yuktaḥ lelihānaiḥ ca pannagaiḥ
śaṅkha mukta aṅgada dharaḥ bibhrat toya mayam vapuḥ
kāla pāśān samāvidhyan hayaiḥ śaśi kara upamaiḥ
vāyu īritaiḥ jala ākāraiḥ kurvan līlāḥ sahasraśas
pāṇḍura uddhūta vasanaḥ pravāla rucira aṅgadaḥ
maṇi śyāma uttama vapuḥ hari bhāra arpitaḥ varaḥ
varuṇaḥ pāśa dhṛk madhye deva anīkasya tasthivān
yuddha velām abhilaṣan bhinna velaḥ iva arṇavaḥ
yakṣa rākṣasa sainyena guhyakānām gaṇaiḥ api
yuktaḥ ca śaṅkha padmābhyām nidhīnām adhipaḥ prabhuḥ
rājarāja īśvaraḥ śrīmān gadā pāṇiḥ adṛśyata

original: vimānayodhī dhanado vimāne puṣpake sthitaḥ // MatsP_174.17 //
analyzed: vimāna yodhī dhanadaḥ vimāne puṣpake sthitaḥ
sa rāja rājaḥ śuśubhe yuddha arthī naravāhanaḥ

original: ukṣāṇamāsthitaḥ saṃkhye sākṣādiva śivaḥ svayam // MatsP_174.18 //
analyzed: ukṣāṇam āsthitaḥ saṃkhye sākṣāt iva śivaḥ svayam
pūrvapakṣaḥ sahasrākṣaḥ pitṛrājaḥ tu dakṣiṇaḥ

original: varuṇaḥ paścimaṃ pakṣam uttaraṃ naravāhanaḥ // MatsP_174.19 //
analyzed: varuṇaḥ paścimam pakṣam uttaram naravāhanaḥ
caturṣu yuktāḥ catvāraḥ lokapālāḥ mahā balāḥ

original: svāsu dikṣu svarakṣanta tasya devabalasya te // MatsP_174.20 //
analyzed: svāsu dikṣu su arakṣanta tasya deva balasya te
sūryaḥ sapta aśva yuktena rathena amita gāminā
śriyā jājvalyamānena dīpyamānaiḥ ca raśmibhiḥ
udaya asta ga cakreṇa meru parvata gāminā
tridiva dvāra cakreṇa tapatā lokam avyayam
sahasra raśmi yuktena bhrājamānena tejasā

original: cacāra madhye lokānāṃ dvādaśātmā dineśvaraḥ // MatsP_174.23 //
analyzed: cacāra madhye lokānām dvādaśātmā dineśvaraḥ
somaḥ śveta haye bhāti syandane śīta raśmivān
himavat toya pūrṇābhiḥ bhābhiḥ āhlādayan jagat
tam ṛkṣa pūga anugatam śiśirāṃśum dvijeśvaram
śaśa chāyā aṅkita tanum naiśasya tamasaḥ kṣayam
jyotiṣām īśvaram vyomni rasānām rasa dam prabhum
oṣadhīnām sahasrāṇām nidhānam amṛtasya ca

original: jagataḥ prathamaṃ bhāgaṃ saumyaṃ satyamayaṃ ratham /
analyzed: jagataḥ prathamam bhāgam saumyam satya mayam ratham
dadṛśuḥ dānavāḥ somam hima praharaṇam sthitam

original: yaḥ prāṇaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ pañcadhā bhidyate nṛṣu /
analyzed: yaḥ prāṇaḥ sarva bhūtānām pañcadhā bhidyate nṛṣu

original: saptadhātugato lokāṃs trīndadhāra cacāra ca // MatsP_174.28 //
analyzed: sapta dhātu gataḥ lokān trīn dadhāra cacāra ca
yam āhuḥ agni kartāram sarva prabhavam īśvaram
sapta svara gataḥ yaḥ ca nityam gīrbhiḥ udīryate
yam vadanti uttamam bhūtam yam vadanti aśarīriṇam
yam āhuḥ ākāśa gamam śīghra gam śabda yoginam

original: sa vāyuḥ sarvabhūtāyur udbhūtaḥ svena tejasā /
analyzed: sa vāyuḥ sarva bhūta āyuḥ udbhūtaḥ svena tejasā
vavau pravyathayan daityān pratilomam sa toyadaḥ
marutaḥ divya gandharvaiḥ vidyādhara gaṇaiḥ saha
cikrīḍuḥ asibhiḥ śubhraiḥ nirmuktaiḥ iva pannagaiḥ
sṛjantaḥ sarpa patayaḥ tīvra toya mayam viṣam
śara bhūtāḥ divi indrāṇām ceruḥ vyātta ānanāḥ divi
parvataiḥ ca śilā śṛṅgaiḥ śataśas ca eva pādapaiḥ

original: upatasthuḥ suragaṇāḥ prahartuṃ dānavaṃ balam // MatsP_174.34 //
analyzed: upatasthuḥ sura gaṇāḥ prahartum dānavam balam
yaḥ sa devaḥ hṛṣīkeśaḥ padmanābhaḥ trivikramaḥ
yugānta kṛṣṇavartma ābhaḥ viśvasya jagataḥ prabhuḥ
sarva yoniḥ sa madhu hā havya bhuj kratu saṃsthitaḥ
ari ghnam amara ādīnām cakram gṛhya gadā dharaḥ
arkam nāgāt iva udyantam udyamya uttama tejasā
savyena ālambya mahatīm sarva asura vināśinīm

original: kareṇa kālīṃ vapuṣā śatrukālapradāṃ gadām // MatsP_174.38 //
analyzed: kareṇa kālīm vapuṣā śatru kāla pradām gadām
anyaiḥ bhujaiḥ pradīptāni bhujaga ari dhvajaḥ prabhuḥ
dadhāra āyudha jātāni śārṅga ādīni mahā balaḥ
sa kaśyapasya ātmabhuvam dvijam bhujaga bhojanam
pavana adhika saṃpātam gagana kṣobhaṇam khagam
bhujaga indreṇa vadane niviṣṭena virājitam
amṛta ārambha nirmuktam mandara adrim iva ucchritam
deva asura vimardeṣu bahuśas dṛṣṭa vikramam
mahā indreṇa amṛtasya arthe vajreṇa kṛta lakṣaṇam
śikhinam balinam ca eva tapta kuṇḍala bhūṣaṇam
vicitra patra vasanam dhātumantam iva acalam
sphīta kroḍa avalambena śītāṃśu sama tejasā
bhogi bhoga avasaktena maṇi ratnena bhāsvatā
pakṣābhyām cāru patrābhyām āvṛtya divi līlayā
yuga ante sa indracāpābhyām toyadābhyām iva ambaram
nīla lohita pītābhiḥ patākābhiḥ alaṃkṛtam
ketu veṣa praticchannam mahā kāya niketanam
aruṇāvarajam śrīmān āruhya samare vibhuḥ
suvarṇa varṇa vapuṣā suparṇam khecara uttamam
tam anvayuḥ deva gaṇāḥ munayaḥ ca samāhitāḥ
gīrbhiḥ parama mantrābhiḥ tuṣṭuvuḥ ca janārdanam
tat vaiśravaṇa saṃśliṣṭam vaivasvata puraḥsaram
dvijarāja parikṣiptam devarāja virājitam
candra prabhābhiḥ vipulam yuddhāya samavartata
pavana āviddha nirghoṣam saṃpradīpta hutāśanam
viṣṇoḥ jiṣṇoḥ ca bhrājiṣṇoḥ tejasā tamasā āvṛtam
balam balavat udvṛttam yuddhāya samavartata
svasti astu devebhyaḥ iti bṛhaspatiḥ abhāṣata
svasti astu dānava anīke uśanāḥ vākyam ādade
matsyapurāṇa
matsyaḥ uvāca
tābhyām balābhyām saṃjajñe tumulaḥ vigrahaḥ tadā
surāṇām asurāṇām ca paraspara jaya eṣiṇām
dānavāḥ daivataiḥ sārdham nānā praharaṇa udyatāḥ

original: samīyuryudhyamānā vai parvatā iva parvataiḥ // MatsP_175.2 //
analyzed: samīyuḥ yudhyamānāḥ vai parvatāḥ iva parvataiḥ
tat sura asura saṃyuktam yuddham atyadbhutam babhau
dharma adharma samāyuktam darpeṇa vinayena ca
tatas rathaiḥ viprayuktaiḥ vāraṇaiḥ ca pracoditaiḥ
utpatadbhiḥ ca gaganam asi hastaiḥ samantataḥ
kṣipyamāṇaiḥ ca musalaiḥ saṃpatadbhiḥ ca sāyakaiḥ
cāpaiḥ visphāryamāṇaiḥ ca pātyamānaiḥ ca mudgaraiḥ
tat yuddham abhavat ghoram deva dānava saṃkulam
jagataḥ trāsa jananam yuga saṃvartaka upamam
hasta muktaiḥ ca parighaiḥ viprayuktaiḥ ca parvataiḥ
dānavāḥ samare jaghnuḥ devān indra purogamān
te vadhyamānāḥ balibhiḥ dānavaiḥ jitakāśibhiḥ

original: viṣaṇṇavadanā devā jagmurārtiṃ parāṃ mṛdhe // MatsP_175.8 //
analyzed: viṣaṇṇa vadanāḥ devāḥ jagmuḥ ārtim parām mṛdhe
te stra śūla pramathitāḥ parighaiḥ bhinna mastakāḥ

original: bhinnoraskā ditisutair vemū raktaṃ vraṇairbahu // MatsP_175.9 //
analyzed: bhinna uraskāḥ ditisutaiḥ vemuḥ raktam vraṇaiḥ bahu
veṣṭitāḥ śara jālaiḥ ca niryatnāḥ ca asuraiḥ kṛtāḥ

original: praviṣṭā dānavīṃ māyāṃ na śekuste viceṣṭitum // MatsP_175.10 //
analyzed: praviṣṭāḥ dānavīm māyām na śekuḥ te viceṣṭitum
astam gatam iva ābhāti niṣprāṇa sadṛśa ākṛti
balam surāṇām asuraiḥ niṣprayatna āyudham kṛtam
daitya cāpa cyutān ghorān chittvā vajreṇa tān śarān

original: śakro daityabalaṃ ghoraṃ viveśa bahulocanaḥ // MatsP_175.12 //
analyzed: śakraḥ daitya balam ghoram viveśa bahu locanaḥ
sa daitya pramukhān hatvā tat dānava balam mahat
tāmasena astra jālena tamaḥ bhūtam athā akarot
te nyonyam na avabudhyanta devānām vāhanāni ca
ghoreṇa tamasā āviṣṭāḥ puruhūtasya tejasā
māyā pāśaiḥ vimuktāḥ tu yatnavantaḥ sura uttamāḥ
vapūṃṣi daitya siṃhānām tamaḥ bhūtāni apātayan
apadhvastāḥ visaṃjñāḥ ca tamasā nīla varcasā
petuḥ te dānava gaṇāḥ chinna pakṣāḥ iva adrayaḥ
tad ghanībhūta daitya indram andhakāre iva arṇave
dānavam deva kadanam tamaḥ bhūtam iva abhavat
tadā asṛjat mahā māyām mayaḥ tām tāmasīm dahan
yugānta udyota jananīm sṛṣṭā āmaurveṇa vahninā

original: sā dadāha tataḥ sarvān māyā mayavikalpitā /
analyzed: sā dadāha tatas sarvān māyā maya vikalpitā
daityāḥ ca āditya vapuṣaḥ sadyas uttasthuḥ āhave
māyā maurvīm samāsādya dahyamānāḥ divaukasaḥ
bhejire candra viṣayam śītāṃśu salila pradam
te dahyamānāḥ hi aurveṇa vahninā naṣṭa cetasaḥ
śaśaṃsuḥ vajriṇam devāḥ saṃtaptāḥ śaraṇa eṣiṇaḥ

original: saṃtate māyayā sainye hanyamāne ca dānavaiḥ /
analyzed: saṃtate māyayā sainye hanyamāne ca dānavaiḥ
coditaḥ devarājena varuṇaḥ vākyam abravīt
purā brahmarṣi jaḥ śakra tapaḥ tepe su dāruṇam

original: ūrvaḥ sapūrvatejasvī sadṛśo brahmaṇo guṇaiḥ // MatsP_175.23 //
analyzed: ūrvaḥ sa pūrva tejasvī sadṛśaḥ brahmaṇaḥ guṇaiḥ
tam tapantam iva ādityam tapasā jagat avyayam
upatasthuḥ muni gaṇāḥ divyāḥ devarṣibhiḥ saha
hiraṇyakaśipuḥ ca eva dānavaḥ dānava īśvaraḥ
ṛṣim vijñāpayāmāsuḥ purā parama tejasam
ūcuḥ brahmarṣayaḥ tam tu vacanam dharma saṃhitam
ṛṣi vaṃśeṣu bhagavan chinna mūlam idam padam
ekaḥ tvam anapatyaḥ ca gotra jaḥ nyaḥ na vartate
kaumāram vratam āsthāya kleśam eva anuvartase
bahūni vipra gotrāṇi munīnām bhāvitātmanām

original: ekadehāni tiṣṭhanti viviktāni vinā prajāḥ // MatsP_175.28 //
analyzed: eka dehāni tiṣṭhanti viviktāni vinā prajāḥ
evam ucchinna mūlaiḥ ca putraiḥ naḥ nā asti kāraṇam
bhavān tu tapasā śreṣṭhaḥ prajāpāta sama dyutiḥ
tatra vartasva vaṃśāya vardhaya ātmānam ātmanā

original: tvayā dharmo 'rjitastena dvitīyāṃ kuru vai tanum // MatsP_175.30 //
analyzed: tvayā dharmaḥ rjitaḥ tena dvitīyām kuru vai tanum

original: sa evamukto munibhir munir marmasu tāḍitaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ evam uktaḥ munibhiḥ muniḥ marmasu tāḍitaḥ
jagarhe tān ṛṣi gaṇān vacanam ca idam abravīt

original: yathāyaṃ vihito dharo munīnāṃ śāśvataḥ purā /
analyzed: yathā ayam vihitaḥ dharaḥ munīnām śāśvataḥ purā

original: ārṣaṃ vai sevataḥ karma vanyamūlaphalāśinaḥ // MatsP_175.32 //
analyzed: ārṣam vai sevataḥ karma vanya mūla phala āśinaḥ
brahma yonau prasūtasya brāhmaṇasya ātma darśinaḥ
brahmacaryam su caritam brahmāṇam api cālayet
janānām vṛttayaḥ tisraḥ ye gṛha āśrama vāsinaḥ

original: asmākaṃ tu varaṃ vṛttir vanāśramanivāsinām // MatsP_175.34 //
analyzed: asmākam tu varam vṛttiḥ vana āśrama nivāsinām
abbhakṣāḥ vāyubhakṣāḥ ca dantolūkhalinaḥ tathā
aśmakuṭṭāḥ hi aśanakāḥ pañcātapa sahāḥ ca ye
ete tapasi tiṣṭhanti vrataiḥ api su duṣkaraiḥ

original: brahmacaryaṃ puraskṛtya prārthayanti parāṃ gatim // MatsP_175.36 //
analyzed: brahmacaryam puraskṛtya prārthayanti parām gatim
brahya caryāt brāhmaṇasya brāhmaṇa tvam vidhīyate

original: evamāhuḥ pare loke brahmacaryavido janāḥ // MatsP_175.37 //
analyzed: evam āhuḥ pare loke brahmacarya vidaḥ janāḥ

original: brahmacarye sthitaṃ satyaṃ brahmacarye sthitaṃ tapaḥ /
analyzed: brahmacarye sthitam satyam brahmacarye sthitam tapaḥ

original: ye sthitā brahmacarye tu brāhmaṇā divi saṃsthitāḥ // MatsP_175.38 //
analyzed: ye sthitāḥ brahmacarye tu brāhmaṇāḥ divi saṃsthitāḥ

original: nāsti yogaṃ vinā siddhir na vā siddhiṃ vinā yaśaḥ /
analyzed: nā asti yogam vinā siddhiḥ na vā siddhim vinā yaśaḥ

original: nāsti loke yaśomūlaṃ brahmacaryātparaṃ tapaḥ // MatsP_175.39 //
analyzed: na asti loke yaśaḥ mūlam brahmacaryāt param tapaḥ
yaḥ nigṛhya indriya grāmam bhūta grāmam ca pañcakam

original: brahmacaryaṃ samādhatte kimataḥ paramaṃ tapaḥ // MatsP_175.40 //
analyzed: brahmacaryam samādhatte kim atas paramam tapaḥ
ayoge keśa dharaṇam a saṃkalpa vrata kriyām

original: abrahmacarye caryā ca trayaṃ syād dambhasaṃjñakam // MatsP_175.41 //
analyzed: abrahmacarye caryā ca trayam syāt dambha saṃjñakam

original: kva dārāḥ kva ca saṃyogaḥ kva ca bhāvaviparyayaḥ /
analyzed: kva dārāḥ kva ca saṃyogaḥ kva ca bhāva viparyayaḥ

original: nanviyaṃ brahmaṇā sṛṣṭā manasā mānasī prajā // MatsP_175.42 //
analyzed: nanu iyam brahmaṇā sṛṣṭā manasā mānasī prajā
yadi asti tapasaḥ vīryam yuṣmākam vidita ātmanām
sṛjadhvam mānasān putrān prājāpatyena karmaṇā
manasā nirmitā yoniḥ ādhātavyā tapasvibhiḥ

original: na dārayogo bījaṃ vā vratamuktaṃ tapasvinām // MatsP_175.44 //
analyzed: na dāra yogaḥ bījam vā vratam uktam tapasvinām
yat idam lupta dharma artham yuṣmābhiḥ iha nirbhayaiḥ

original: vyāhṛtaṃ sadbhiratyartham asadbhiriva me matam // MatsP_175.45 //
analyzed: vyāhṛtam sadbhiḥ atyartham asadbhiḥ iva me matam
vapuḥ dīpta antarātmānam etat kṛtvā manaḥ mayam

original: dārayogaṃ vinā srakṣye putram ātmatanūruham // MatsP_175.46 //
analyzed: dāra yogam vinā srakṣye putram ātma tanūruham
evam ātmānam ātmā me dvitīyam janayiṣyati
vanyena anena vidhinā didhakṣantam iva prajāḥ
ūrvaḥ tu tapasā āviṣṭaḥ niveśya ūrum hutāśane
mamantha ekena darbheṇa sutasya prabhava araṇim
tasya ūrum sahasā bhittvā jvālā mālī hi anindhanaḥ
jagataḥ dahana ākāṅkṣī putraḥ gniḥ samapadyata
ūrvasya ūrum vinirbhidya aurvaḥ nāma antakaḥ nalaḥ
didhakṣan iva lokān trīm jajñe parama kopanaḥ
utpanna mātraḥ ca uvāca pitaram kṣīṇayā girā

original: kṣudhā me bādhate tāta jagadbhakṣye tyajasva mām // MatsP_175.51 //
analyzed: kṣudhā me bādhate tāta jagat bhakṣye tyajasva mām
tridiva ārohibhiḥ jvālaiḥ jṛmbhamāṇaḥ diśaḥ daśa
nirdahan sarva bhūtāni vavṛdhe saḥ ntakaḥ nalaḥ
etasmin antare brahmā munim ūrvam sabhājayan

original: uvāca vāryatāṃ putro jagataśca dayāṃ kuru // MatsP_175.53 //
analyzed: uvāca vāryatām putraḥ jagataḥ ca dayām kuru
asya apatyasya te vipra kariṣye sthānam uttamam

original: tathyametadvacaḥ putra śṛṇu tvaṃ vadatāṃ vara // MatsP_175.54 //
analyzed: tathyam etat vacaḥ putra śṛṇu tvam vadatām vara
ūrvaḥ uvāca
dhanyaḥ smi anugṛhītaḥ smi yat me bhagavān śiśoḥ
matim etām dadāti iha parama anugrahāya vai
prabhāta kāle samprāpte kāṅkṣitavye samāgame

original: bhagavaṃstarpitaḥ putraḥ kairhavyaiḥ prāpsyate sukham // MatsP_175.56 //
analyzed: bhagavan tarpitaḥ putraḥ kaiḥ havyaiḥ prāpsyate sukham

original: kutra cāsya nivāsaḥ syād bhojanaṃ vā kimātmakam /
analyzed: kutra ca asya nivāsaḥ syāt bhojanam vā kimātmakam
vidhāsyati iha bhagavān vīrya tulyam mahā ojasaḥ
brahmā uvāca
vaḍavāmukhe sya vasatiḥ samudre vai bhaviṣyati

original: mama yonirjalaṃ vipra tasya pītavataḥ sukham // MatsP_175.58 //
analyzed: mama yoniḥ jalam vipra tasya pītavataḥ sukham
yatra aham āsa niyatam piban vāri mayam haviḥ

original: taddhavistava putrasya visṛjāmyālayaṃ ca tat // MatsP_175.59 //
analyzed: tat haviḥ tava putrasya visṛjāmi ālayam ca tat

original: tato yugānte bhūtānām eṣa cāhaṃ ca putraka /
analyzed: tatas yuga ante bhūtānām eṣa ca aham ca putraka
sahitau vicariṣyāvaḥ niṣputrāṇām ṛṇa apahaḥ

original: eṣo 'gnir antakāle tu salilāśī mayā kṛtaḥ /
analyzed: eṣaḥ agniḥ antakāle tu salila āśī mayā kṛtaḥ
dahanaḥ sarva bhūtānām sa deva asura rakṣasām
evam astu iti tam saḥ gniḥ saṃvṛta jvāla maṇḍalaḥ
praviveśa arṇava mukham prakṣipya pitari prabhām

original: pratiyātastato brahmā ye ca sarve maharṣayaḥ /
analyzed: pratiyātaḥ tatas brahmā ye ca sarve mahā ṛṣayaḥ

original: aurvasyāgneḥ prabhāṃ jñātvā svāṃ svāṃ gatimupāśritāḥ // MatsP_175.63 //
analyzed: aurvasya agneḥ prabhām jñātvā svām svām gatim upāśritāḥ
hiraṇyakaśipuḥ dṛṣṭvā tadā tat mahat adbhutam
uccais praṇata sarva aṅgaḥ vākyam etat uvāca ha
bhagavan adbhutam idam saṃvṛttam loka sākṣikam

original: tapasā te muniśreṣṭha parituṣṭaḥ pitāmahaḥ // MatsP_175.65 //
analyzed: tapasā te muni śreṣṭha parituṣṭaḥ pitāmahaḥ

original: ahaṃ tu tava putrasya tava caiva mahāvrata /
analyzed: aham tu tava putrasya tava ca eva mahāvrata

original: bhṛtya ityavagantavyaḥ sādhyo yadiha karmaṇā // MatsP_175.66 //
analyzed: bhṛtyaḥ iti avagantavyaḥ sādhyaḥ yat iha karmaṇā
tat mām paśya samāpannam tava eva ārādhane ratam
yadi sīdet muni śreṣṭha tava eva syāt parājayaḥ
aurvaḥ uvāca
dhanyaḥ smi anugṛhītaḥ smi yasya te ham guruḥ sthitaḥ

original: nāsti me tapasānena bhayamadyeha suvrata // MatsP_175.68 //
analyzed: na asti me tapasā anena bhayam adya iha suvrata

original: tāmeva māyāṃ gṛhṇīṣva mama putreṇa nirmitām /
analyzed: tām eva māyām gṛhṇīṣva mama putreṇa nirmitām
nirindhanām agni mayīm durdharṣām pāvakaiḥ api
eṣā te svasya vaṃśasya vaśagā ari vinigrahe

original: saṃrakṣatyātmapakṣaṃ ca vipakṣaṃ ca pradhakṣyati // MatsP_175.70 //
analyzed: saṃrakṣati ātma pakṣam ca vipakṣam ca pradhakṣyati
evam astu iti tām gṛhya praṇamya muni puṃgavam

original: jagāma tridivaṃ hṛṣṭaḥ kṛtārtho dānaveśvaraḥ // MatsP_175.71 //
analyzed: jagāma tridivam hṛṣṭaḥ kṛtārthaḥ dānava īśvaraḥ
eṣā durviṣahā māyā devaiḥ api durāsadā
aurveṇa nirmitā pūrvam pāvakena ūrva sūnunā

original: tasmiṃstu vyutthite daitye nirvīryaiṣā na saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: tasmin tu vyutthite daitye nirvīryā eṣā na saṃśayaḥ

original: śāpo hyasyāḥ purā dattaḥ sṛṣṭā yenaiva tejasā // MatsP_175.73 //
analyzed: śāpaḥ hi asyāḥ purā dattaḥ sṛṣṭāḥ yena eva tejasā
yadi eṣā pratihantavyā kartavyaḥ bhagavān sukhī

original: dīyatāṃ me sakhā śakra toyayonirniśākaraḥ // MatsP_175.74 //
analyzed: dīyatām me sakhā śakra toya yoniḥ niśākaraḥ
tena aham saha saṃgamya yādobhiḥ ca samāvṛtaḥ
māyām etām haniṣyāmi tvad prasādāt na saṃśayaḥ
matsyapurāṇa
matsyaḥ uvāca
evam astu iti saṃhṛṣṭaḥ śakraḥ tridaśa vardhanaḥ
saṃdideśa agratas somam yuddhāya śiśirāyudham

original: gaccha soma sahāyatvaṃ kuru pāśadharasya vai /
analyzed: gaccha soma sahāya tvam kuru pāśa dharasya vai

original: asurāṇāṃ vināśāya jayārthaṃ ca divaukasām // MatsP_176.2 //
analyzed: asurāṇām vināśāya jaya artham ca divaukasām
tvam mattaḥ prativīryaḥ ca jyotiṣām ca īśvara īśvaraḥ

original: tvanmayaṃ sarvalokeṣu rasaṃ rasavido viduḥ // MatsP_176.3 //
analyzed: tvad mayam sarva lokeṣu rasam rasa vidaḥ viduḥ
kṣaya vṛddhī tava vyakte sāgarasya iva maṇḍale
parivartasi ahar rātram kālam jagati yojayan
loka chāyā mayam lakṣma tava aṅkaḥ śaśa saṃnibhaḥ

original: na viduḥ soma devāpi ye ca nakṣatrayonayaḥ // MatsP_176.5 //
analyzed: na viduḥ soma deva api ye ca nakṣatra yonayaḥ
tvam āditya pathāt ūrdhvam jyotiṣām ca upari sthitaḥ

original: tamaḥ protsārya mahasā bhāsayasyakhilaṃ jagat // MatsP_176.6 //
analyzed: tamaḥ protsārya mahasā bhāsayasi akhilam jagat
śveta bhānuḥ hima tanuḥ jyotiṣām adhipaḥ śaśī
adhikṛt kāla yoga ātmā iṣṭaḥ yajña rasaḥ vyayaḥ
oṣadhīśaḥ kriyāyoniḥ haraśekhara bhāj tathā
śītāṃśuḥ amṛta ādhāraḥ capalaḥ śveta vāhanaḥ

original: tvaṃ kāntiḥ kāntivapuṣāṃ tvaṃ somaḥ somapāyinām /
analyzed: tvam kāntiḥ kānti vapuṣām tvam somaḥ soma pāyinām
saumyaḥ tvam sarva bhūtānām timira ghnaḥ tvam ṛkṣa rāj
tat gaccha tvam mahā sena varuṇena varūthinā

original: śamaya tvāsurīṃ māyāṃ yayā dahyāma saṃyuge // MatsP_176.10 //
analyzed: śamaya tvā asurīm māyām yayā dahyāma saṃyuge
somaḥ uvāca
yat mām vadasi yuddha arthe devarāja vara prada
eṣa varṣāmi śiśiram daitya māyā apakarṣaṇam
etān mad śīta nirdagdhān paśya tvam hima veṣṭitān
vimāyān vimadān ca eva daitya siṃhān mahā āhave
iti uktvā tārakādhīśaḥ sa jaleśaḥ śiva udakaiḥ
plāvayāmāsa sainyāni surāṇām śānti vṛddhaye
teṣām himakara utsṛṣṭāḥ sa pāśāḥ hima vṛṣṭayaḥ

original: veṣṭayanti sma tānghorān daityānmeghagaṇā iva // MatsP_176.14 //
analyzed: veṣṭayanti sma tān ghorān daityān megha gaṇāḥ iva
